Cuba lodged a formal protest at its lack of inclusion. The UNDP explained that Cuba had been excluded due to the lack of an \'internationally reported figure for Cuba’s Gross National Income adjusted for Purchasing Power Parity\'. All other indicators for Cuba were available, and reported by the UNDP, but the lack of one indicator meant that no ranking could be attributed to the country. The situation has been addressed and, in later years, Cuba has ranked as a High Human Development country.
question: How is Cuba ranked in later years according to the passage?
translated_passage: ገለ ሃገራት ብዝተፈላለየ ምኽንያት ኣይተኻተተን፣ ብቐንዱ ገለ ወሳኒ መረዳእታታት ዘይምህላው። እዘን ዝስዕባ ኣባላት ሃገራት ሕቡራት ሃገራት ኣብቲ ናይ 2010 ጸብጻብ ኣይተኻተታን። ኩባ ብዘይምሕባሩ ወግዓዊ ተቓውሞ ኣቕሪባ። UNDP ከም ዝገለጾ ኩባ ብሰንኪ ሕጽረት \'ኣህጉራዊ ጸብጻብ ኣሃዝ ኩባ ንምዕዳግ ሓይሊ ምዕዳግ ዝተመዓራረየ ሓፈሻዊ ሃገራዊ እቶት ኩባ ካብ ስእነት ከምዘይተገለለ ገሊጽዋ። ኩሎም ካልኦት ንኩባ ዝሕብር መርኣዪታት ተረኺቦም፣ ብUNDP ድማ ይጽብጸቡ ነበሩ፣ ሓደ መርኣዪ ዘይምህላው ግን ዝኾነ ደረጃ ምስታ ሃገር ክምለስ ከምዘይክእል ዘመልክት እዩ። እቲ ኩነታት ተፈቲሑ፡ ኣብ ዳሕረዎት ዓመታት ኩባ ድማ ልዑል ሰብኣዊ ምዕባለ ዘለዋ ሃገር ኮይና ተሰሪዓ ኣላ።
translated_question: ኩባ ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ ኣብ ዳሕረዎት ዓመታት ከመይ ትስራዕ?

passage: Since the 1980s, as the complexity of buildings began to increase (in terms of structural systems, services, energy and technologies), the field of architecture became multi-disciplinary with specializations for each project type, technological expertise or project delivery methods. In addition, there has been an increased separation of the 'design' architect [Notes 1] from the 'project' architect who ensures that the project meets the required standards and deals with matters of liability.[Notes 2] The preparatory processes for the design of any large building have become increasingly complicated, and require preliminary studies of such matters as durability, sustainability, quality, money, and compliance with local laws. A large structure can no longer be the design of one person but must be the work of many. Modernism and Postmodernism have been criticised by some members of the architectural profession who feel that successful architecture is not a personal, philosophical, or aesthetic pursuit by individualists; rather it has to consider everyday needs of people and use technology to create liveable environments, with the design process being informed by studies of behavioral, environmental, and social sciences.
question: What change occurred in the field of architecture since the 1980s?
mc_answer2: It became multi-disciplinary with specialized roles
mc_answer4: It reduced the number of involved professionals
translated_passage: ካብ 1980ታት ጀሚሩ፡ ውስብስብነት ህንጻታት ክውስኽ ምስ ጀመረ (ብመንጽር መዋቕራዊ ስርዓታት፡ ኣገልግሎታት፡ ጸዓትን ቴክኖሎጂታትን)፡ ዓውዲ ስነ-ህንጻ ንነፍሲ ​​ወከፍ ዓይነት ፕሮጀክት፡ ቴክኖሎጂካዊ ክእለት ወይ ኣገባብ ኣወሃህባ ፕሮጀክት ፍሉይ ሞያታት ምስ ስፔሻላይዜሽን ብዙሕ ዲሲፕሊናሪ ኰነ። ብተወሳኺ፡ እቲ ፕሮጀክት ነቲ ዝድለ ደረጃታት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ ‘ፕሮጀክት’ ኣርኪቴክተር፡ ነቲ ‘ንዲዛይን’ ዝብል ኣርኪቴክተር [መዘኻኸሪታት 1] ምስ ጉዳያት ተሓታትነት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ፡ ዝያዳ ምፍልላይ ተራእዩ እዩ።[ነቲ ንዲዛይን ዝኾነ ዓቢ ህንጻ ንዲዛይን ዝኸውን መሰናድኦ መስርሕ፡ ብቐጻሊ ዝተሓላለኸ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ከም ቀጻልነት፡ ዘላቕነት፡ ገንዘብ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ምኽባር ኣብ ውሽጢ ዓዲ ዝገበርዎ መጽናዕታዊ መጽናዕትታት ከም ዝጠልብ ኣመልከተ። ዓቢ ኣቃውማ ድሕሪ ደጊም ዲዛይን ናይ ሓደ ሰብ ክኸውን ኣይክእልን እዩ ግን ናይ ብዙሓት ስራሕ ክኸውን ኣለዎ። ዘመናዊነትን ድሕረ-ዘመናዊነትን ብገለ ኣባላት ሞያ ስነ-ህንጻ ዕዉት ስነ ህንጻ ​​ውልቃዊ፣ ፍልስፍናዊ ወይ ስነ-ጽባቐዊ ምድላይ ብውልቀ-ኣካላት ከምዘይኮነ ዝስምዖም ነቐፌታ ተዋሂብዎም ኣሎ፤ እንታይ ደኣ ንመዓልታዊ ድሌታት ሰባት ኣብ ግምት ከእቱን ቴክኖሎጂ ብምጥቃም ንኽነብሩ ዝኽእሉ ሃዋህው ክፈጥርን ኣለዎ፣ እቲ መስርሕ ዲዛይን ብመጽናዕቲ ባህርያዊ፣ ከባብያውን ማሕበራውን ስነ-ፍልጠት ክሕበር ኣለዎ።
translated_question: ካብ 1980ታት ጀሚሩ ኣብ ዓውዲ ስነ ህንጻ ​​እንታይ ለውጢ ኣጋጢሙ?
translated_mc_answer2: ምስ ፍሉይ ተራ ብዙሕ ዲሲፕሊናሪ ኮይኑ ።
translated_mc_answer4: ቁጽሪ ናይቶም ዝሳተፉ ሰብ ሞያ ኣጉዲሉ ።

passage: Since the 1980s, as the complexity of buildings began to increase (in terms of structural systems, services, energy and technologies), the field of architecture became multi-disciplinary with specializations for each project type, technological expertise or project delivery methods. In addition, there has been an increased separation of the 'design' architect [Notes 1] from the 'project' architect who ensures that the project meets the required standards and deals with matters of liability.[Notes 2] The preparatory processes for the design of any large building have become increasingly complicated, and require preliminary studies of such matters as durability, sustainability, quality, money, and compliance with local laws. A large structure can no longer be the design of one person but must be the work of many. Modernism and Postmodernism have been criticised by some members of the architectural profession who feel that successful architecture is not a personal, philosophical, or aesthetic pursuit by individualists; rather it has to consider everyday needs of people and use technology to create liveable environments, with the design process being informed by studies of behavioral, environmental, and social sciences.
question: What increased separation in architectural roles is mentioned in the passage?
mc_answer2: Between digital and manual drafting experts
mc_answer3: Between the 'design' architect and the 'project' architect
mc_answer4: Between urban planners and landscape architects
translated_passage: ካብ 1980ታት ጀሚሩ፡ ውስብስብነት ህንጻታት ክውስኽ ምስ ጀመረ (ብመንጽር መዋቕራዊ ስርዓታት፡ ኣገልግሎታት፡ ጸዓትን ቴክኖሎጂታትን)፡ ዓውዲ ስነ-ህንጻ ንነፍሲ ​​ወከፍ ዓይነት ፕሮጀክት፡ ቴክኖሎጂካዊ ክእለት ወይ ኣገባብ ኣወሃህባ ፕሮጀክት ፍሉይ ሞያታት ምስ ስፔሻላይዜሽን ብዙሕ ዲሲፕሊናሪ ኰነ። ብተወሳኺ፡ እቲ ፕሮጀክት ነቲ ዝድለ ደረጃታት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ ‘ፕሮጀክት’ ኣርኪቴክተር፡ ነቲ ‘ንዲዛይን’ ዝብል ኣርኪቴክተር [መዘኻኸሪታት 1] ምስ ጉዳያት ተሓታትነት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ፡ ዝያዳ ምፍልላይ ተራእዩ እዩ።[ነቲ ንዲዛይን ዝኾነ ዓቢ ህንጻ ንዲዛይን ዝኸውን መሰናድኦ መስርሕ፡ ብቐጻሊ ዝተሓላለኸ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ከም ቀጻልነት፡ ዘላቕነት፡ ገንዘብ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ምኽባር ኣብ ውሽጢ ዓዲ ዝገበርዎ መጽናዕታዊ መጽናዕትታት ከም ዝጠልብ ኣመልከተ። ዓቢ ኣቃውማ ድሕሪ ደጊም ዲዛይን ናይ ሓደ ሰብ ክኸውን ኣይክእልን እዩ ግን ናይ ብዙሓት ስራሕ ክኸውን ኣለዎ። ዘመናዊነትን ድሕረ-ዘመናዊነትን ብገለ ኣባላት ሞያ ስነ-ህንጻ ዕዉት ስነ ህንጻ ​​ውልቃዊ፣ ፍልስፍናዊ ወይ ስነ-ጽባቐዊ ምድላይ ብውልቀ-ኣካላት ከምዘይኮነ ዝስምዖም ነቐፌታ ተዋሂብዎም ኣሎ፤ እንታይ ደኣ ንመዓልታዊ ድሌታት ሰባት ኣብ ግምት ከእቱን ቴክኖሎጂ ብምጥቃም ንኽነብሩ ዝኽእሉ ሃዋህው ክፈጥርን ኣለዎ፣ እቲ መስርሕ ዲዛይን ብመጽናዕቲ ባህርያዊ፣ ከባብያውን ማሕበራውን ስነ-ፍልጠት ክሕበር ኣለዎ።
translated_question: ኣብ ስነ ህንጻዊ ተራ ምፍልላይ ኣብቲ ክፍሊ እንታይ እዩ ተጠቒሱ ዘሎ?
translated_mc_answer2: ኣብ መንጎ ዲጂታላውን ማንዋልን ናይ ምንዳፍ ክኢላታት
translated_mc_answer4: ኣብ መንጎ ናይ ከተማ ውጥንን መልክዓ ምድሪ ኣርኪቴክታትን

passage: Since the 1980s, as the complexity of buildings began to increase (in terms of structural systems, services, energy and technologies), the field of architecture became multi-disciplinary with specializations for each project type, technological expertise or project delivery methods. In addition, there has been an increased separation of the 'design' architect [Notes 1] from the 'project' architect who ensures that the project meets the required standards and deals with matters of liability.[Notes 2] The preparatory processes for the design of any large building have become increasingly complicated, and require preliminary studies of such matters as durability, sustainability, quality, money, and compliance with local laws. A large structure can no longer be the design of one person but must be the work of many. Modernism and Postmodernism have been criticised by some members of the architectural profession who feel that successful architecture is not a personal, philosophical, or aesthetic pursuit by individualists; rather it has to consider everyday needs of people and use technology to create liveable environments, with the design process being informed by studies of behavioral, environmental, and social sciences.
question: Which additional preparatory processes are now required in designing a large building?
mc_answer2: Preliminary studies of durability, sustainability, quality, cost, and legal compliance
translated_passage: ካብ 1980ታት ጀሚሩ፡ ውስብስብነት ህንጻታት ክውስኽ ምስ ጀመረ (ብመንጽር መዋቕራዊ ስርዓታት፡ ኣገልግሎታት፡ ጸዓትን ቴክኖሎጂታትን)፡ ዓውዲ ስነ-ህንጻ ንነፍሲ ​​ወከፍ ዓይነት ፕሮጀክት፡ ቴክኖሎጂካዊ ክእለት ወይ ኣገባብ ኣወሃህባ ፕሮጀክት ፍሉይ ሞያታት ምስ ስፔሻላይዜሽን ብዙሕ ዲሲፕሊናሪ ኰነ። ብተወሳኺ፡ እቲ ፕሮጀክት ነቲ ዝድለ ደረጃታት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ ‘ፕሮጀክት’ ኣርኪቴክተር፡ ነቲ ‘ንዲዛይን’ ዝብል ኣርኪቴክተር [መዘኻኸሪታት 1] ምስ ጉዳያት ተሓታትነት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ፡ ዝያዳ ምፍልላይ ተራእዩ እዩ።[ነቲ ንዲዛይን ዝኾነ ዓቢ ህንጻ ንዲዛይን ዝኸውን መሰናድኦ መስርሕ፡ ብቐጻሊ ዝተሓላለኸ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ከም ቀጻልነት፡ ዘላቕነት፡ ገንዘብ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ምኽባር ኣብ ውሽጢ ዓዲ ዝገበርዎ መጽናዕታዊ መጽናዕትታት ከም ዝጠልብ ኣመልከተ። ዓቢ ኣቃውማ ድሕሪ ደጊም ዲዛይን ናይ ሓደ ሰብ ክኸውን ኣይክእልን እዩ ግን ናይ ብዙሓት ስራሕ ክኸውን ኣለዎ። ዘመናዊነትን ድሕረ-ዘመናዊነትን ብገለ ኣባላት ሞያ ስነ-ህንጻ ዕዉት ስነ ህንጻ ​​ውልቃዊ፣ ፍልስፍናዊ ወይ ስነ-ጽባቐዊ ምድላይ ብውልቀ-ኣካላት ከምዘይኮነ ዝስምዖም ነቐፌታ ተዋሂብዎም ኣሎ፤ እንታይ ደኣ ንመዓልታዊ ድሌታት ሰባት ኣብ ግምት ከእቱን ቴክኖሎጂ ብምጥቃም ንኽነብሩ ዝኽእሉ ሃዋህው ክፈጥርን ኣለዎ፣ እቲ መስርሕ ዲዛይን ብመጽናዕቲ ባህርያዊ፣ ከባብያውን ማሕበራውን ስነ-ፍልጠት ክሕበር ኣለዎ።
translated_question: ሕጂ ኣየኖት ተወሳኺ መሰናድኦ መስርሕ ኣብ ምህዛን ዓቢ ህንጻ የድሊ?
translated_mc_answer2: መባእታዊ መጽናዕትታት ጽንዓት፡ ዘላቕነት፡ ጽሬት፡ ወጻኢታትን ሕጋዊ ምኽባርን

passage: Since the 1980s, as the complexity of buildings began to increase (in terms of structural systems, services, energy and technologies), the field of architecture became multi-disciplinary with specializations for each project type, technological expertise or project delivery methods. In addition, there has been an increased separation of the 'design' architect [Notes 1] from the 'project' architect who ensures that the project meets the required standards and deals with matters of liability.[Notes 2] The preparatory processes for the design of any large building have become increasingly complicated, and require preliminary studies of such matters as durability, sustainability, quality, money, and compliance with local laws. A large structure can no longer be the design of one person but must be the work of many. Modernism and Postmodernism have been criticised by some members of the architectural profession who feel that successful architecture is not a personal, philosophical, or aesthetic pursuit by individualists; rather it has to consider everyday needs of people and use technology to create liveable environments, with the design process being informed by studies of behavioral, environmental, and social sciences.
question: According to the passage, what is now necessary for the design of a large structure?
mc_answer1: It can be designed by a single visionary
mc_answer2: It must be the work of a collaborative team
mc_answer3: It requires only the latest technology
mc_answer4: It relies solely on individual artistic talent
translated_passage: ካብ 1980ታት ጀሚሩ፡ ውስብስብነት ህንጻታት ክውስኽ ምስ ጀመረ (ብመንጽር መዋቕራዊ ስርዓታት፡ ኣገልግሎታት፡ ጸዓትን ቴክኖሎጂታትን)፡ ዓውዲ ስነ-ህንጻ ንነፍሲ ​​ወከፍ ዓይነት ፕሮጀክት፡ ቴክኖሎጂካዊ ክእለት ወይ ኣገባብ ኣወሃህባ ፕሮጀክት ፍሉይ ሞያታት ምስ ስፔሻላይዜሽን ብዙሕ ዲሲፕሊናሪ ኰነ። ብተወሳኺ፡ እቲ ፕሮጀክት ነቲ ዝድለ ደረጃታት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ ‘ፕሮጀክት’ ኣርኪቴክተር፡ ነቲ ‘ንዲዛይን’ ዝብል ኣርኪቴክተር [መዘኻኸሪታት 1] ምስ ጉዳያት ተሓታትነት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ፡ ዝያዳ ምፍልላይ ተራእዩ እዩ።[ነቲ ንዲዛይን ዝኾነ ዓቢ ህንጻ ንዲዛይን ዝኸውን መሰናድኦ መስርሕ፡ ብቐጻሊ ዝተሓላለኸ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ከም ቀጻልነት፡ ዘላቕነት፡ ገንዘብ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ምኽባር ኣብ ውሽጢ ዓዲ ዝገበርዎ መጽናዕታዊ መጽናዕትታት ከም ዝጠልብ ኣመልከተ። ዓቢ ኣቃውማ ድሕሪ ደጊም ዲዛይን ናይ ሓደ ሰብ ክኸውን ኣይክእልን እዩ ግን ናይ ብዙሓት ስራሕ ክኸውን ኣለዎ። ዘመናዊነትን ድሕረ-ዘመናዊነትን ብገለ ኣባላት ሞያ ስነ-ህንጻ ዕዉት ስነ ህንጻ ​​ውልቃዊ፣ ፍልስፍናዊ ወይ ስነ-ጽባቐዊ ምድላይ ብውልቀ-ኣካላት ከምዘይኮነ ዝስምዖም ነቐፌታ ተዋሂብዎም ኣሎ፤ እንታይ ደኣ ንመዓልታዊ ድሌታት ሰባት ኣብ ግምት ከእቱን ቴክኖሎጂ ብምጥቃም ንኽነብሩ ዝኽእሉ ሃዋህው ክፈጥርን ኣለዎ፣ እቲ መስርሕ ዲዛይን ብመጽናዕቲ ባህርያዊ፣ ከባብያውን ማሕበራውን ስነ-ፍልጠት ክሕበር ኣለዎ።
translated_question: ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ፡ ሕጂ ንዲዛይን ሓደ ዓቢ መዋቕር ኣድላዪ ዝኾነ ነገር ኣሎ?
translated_mc_answer1: ብሓደ ራእይ ዘለዎ ክነድፍ ይኽእል ’ ዩ።
translated_mc_answer2: ናይ ምትሕብባር ጋንታ ስራሕ ክኸውን ኣለዎ ።
translated_mc_answer3: እቲ ዝሓሸ ቴክኖሎጂ ጥራይ እዩ ዝሓትት ።
translated_mc_answer4: ኣብ ውልቃዊ ስነጥበባዊ ተውህቦ ጥራይ እዩ ዝምርኮስ ።

In addition, there has been an increased separation of the 'design' architect [Notes 1] from the 'project' architect who ensures that the project meets the required standards and deals with matters of liability.[Notes 2] The preparatory processes for the design of any large building have become increasingly complicated, and require preliminary studies of such matters as durability, sustainability, quality, money, and compliance with local laws. A large structure can no longer be the design of one person but must be the work of many. Modernism and Postmodernism have been criticised by some members of the architectural profession who feel that successful architecture is not a personal, philosophical, or aesthetic pursuit by individualists; rather it has to consider everyday needs of people and use technology to create liveable environments, with the design process being informed by studies of behavioral, environmental, and social sciences.
question: How have Modernism and Postmodernism been criticised by some architects according to the passage?

mc_answer2: They are overly centered on personal, philosophical, or aesthetic pursuits by individualists
mc_answer3: They neglect the importance of historical preservation
translated_passage: ካብ 1980ታት ጀሚሩ፡ ውስብስብነት ህንጻታት ክውስኽ ምስ ጀመረ (ብመንጽር መዋቕራዊ ስርዓታት፡ ኣገልግሎታት፡ ጸዓትን ቴክኖሎጂታትን)፡ ዓውዲ ስነ-ህንጻ ንነፍሲ ​​ወከፍ ዓይነት ፕሮጀክት፡ ቴክኖሎጂካዊ ክእለት ወይ ኣገባብ ኣወሃህባ ፕሮጀክት ፍሉይ ሞያታት ምስ ስፔሻላይዜሽን ብዙሕ ዲሲፕሊናሪ ኰነ። ብተወሳኺ፡ እቲ ፕሮጀክት ነቲ ዝድለ ደረጃታት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ ‘ፕሮጀክት’ ኣርኪቴክተር፡ ነቲ ‘ንዲዛይን’ ዝብል ኣርኪቴክተር [መዘኻኸሪታት 1] ምስ ጉዳያት ተሓታትነት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ፡ ዝያዳ ምፍልላይ ተራእዩ እዩ።[ነቲ ንዲዛይን ዝኾነ ዓቢ ህንጻ ንዲዛይን ዝኸውን መሰናድኦ መስርሕ፡ ብቐጻሊ ዝተሓላለኸ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ከም ቀጻልነት፡ ዘላቕነት፡ ገንዘብ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ምኽባር ኣብ ውሽጢ ዓዲ ዝገበርዎ መጽናዕታዊ መጽናዕትታት ከም ዝጠልብ ኣመልከተ። ዓቢ ኣቃውማ ድሕሪ ደጊም ዲዛይን ናይ ሓደ ሰብ ክኸውን ኣይክእልን እዩ ግን ናይ ብዙሓት ስራሕ ክኸውን ኣለዎ። ዘመናዊነትን ድሕረ-ዘመናዊነትን ብገለ ኣባላት ሞያ ስነ-ህንጻ ዕዉት ስነ ህንጻ ​​ውልቃዊ፣ ፍልስፍናዊ ወይ ስነ-ጽባቐዊ ምድላይ ብውልቀ-ኣካላት ከምዘይኮነ ዝስምዖም ነቐፌታ ተዋሂብዎም ኣሎ፤ እንታይ ደኣ ንመዓልታዊ ድሌታት ሰባት ኣብ ግምት ከእቱን ቴክኖሎጂ ብምጥቃም ንኽነብሩ ዝኽእሉ ሃዋህው ክፈጥርን ኣለዎ፣ እቲ መስርሕ ዲዛይን ብመጽናዕቲ ባህርያዊ፣ ከባብያውን ማሕበራውን ስነ-ፍልጠት ክሕበር ኣለዎ።
translated_question: ዘመናዊነትን ድሕረ-ዘመናዊነትን ብኸመይ ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ ብገለ ኣርኪተክተራት ተነቒፉ?
translated_mc_answer1: ኣብ ምህዞ ቴክኖሎጂ ኣዝዮም ዘተኮሩ እዮም ።
translated_mc_answer2: ኣብ ውልቃዊ፡ ፍልስፍናዊ፡ ወይ ስነ-ጽባቐዊ ስራሓት ብውልቀ-ሰባት ዝማእከሉ እዮም
translated_mc_answer4: ኣብ ልዕሊ ጽሬት ምጉዳል ወጻኢታት የጉልሑ .

passage: Since the 1980s, as the complexity of buildings began to increase (in terms of structural systems, services, energy and technologies), the field of architecture became multi-disciplinary with specializations for each project type, technological expertise or project delivery methods. In addition, there has been an increased separation of the 'design' architect [Notes 1] from the 'project' architect who ensures that the project meets the required standards and deals with matters of liability.[Notes 2] The preparatory processes for the design of any large building have become increasingly complicated, and require preliminary studies of such matters as durability, sustainability, quality, money, and compliance with local laws. A large structure can no longer be the design of one person but must be the work of many. Modernism and Postmodernism have been criticised by some members of the architectural profession who feel that successful architecture is not a personal, philosophical, or aesthetic pursuit by individualists; rather it has to consider everyday needs of people and use technology to create liveable environments, with the design process being informed by studies of behavioral, environmental, and social sciences.
question: What do some architects believe should inform the design process for creating liveable environments?
mc_answer2: Studies of behavioral, environmental, and social sciences
translated_passage: ካብ 1980ታት ጀሚሩ፡ ውስብስብነት ህንጻታት ክውስኽ ምስ ጀመረ (ብመንጽር መዋቕራዊ ስርዓታት፡ ኣገልግሎታት፡ ጸዓትን ቴክኖሎጂታትን)፡ ዓውዲ ስነ-ህንጻ ንነፍሲ ​​ወከፍ ዓይነት ፕሮጀክት፡ ቴክኖሎጂካዊ ክእለት ወይ ኣገባብ ኣወሃህባ ፕሮጀክት ፍሉይ ሞያታት ምስ ስፔሻላይዜሽን ብዙሕ ዲሲፕሊናሪ ኰነ። ብተወሳኺ፡ እቲ ፕሮጀክት ነቲ ዝድለ ደረጃታት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ ‘ፕሮጀክት’ ኣርኪቴክተር፡ ነቲ ‘ንዲዛይን’ ዝብል ኣርኪቴክተር [መዘኻኸሪታት 1] ምስ ጉዳያት ተሓታትነት ከም ዘማልእ ዘረጋግጽ፡ ዝያዳ ምፍልላይ ተራእዩ እዩ።[ነቲ ንዲዛይን ዝኾነ ዓቢ ህንጻ ንዲዛይን ዝኸውን መሰናድኦ መስርሕ፡ ብቐጻሊ ዝተሓላለኸ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ከም ቀጻልነት፡ ዘላቕነት፡ ገንዘብ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ምኽባር ኣብ ውሽጢ ዓዲ ዝገበርዎ መጽናዕታዊ መጽናዕትታት ከም ዝጠልብ ኣመልከተ። ዓቢ ኣቃውማ ድሕሪ ደጊም ዲዛይን ናይ ሓደ ሰብ ክኸውን ኣይክእልን እዩ ግን ናይ ብዙሓት ስራሕ ክኸውን ኣለዎ። ዘመናዊነትን ድሕረ-ዘመናዊነትን ብገለ ኣባላት ሞያ ስነ-ህንጻ ዕዉት ስነ ህንጻ ​​ውልቃዊ፣ ፍልስፍናዊ ወይ ስነ-ጽባቐዊ ምድላይ ብውልቀ-ኣካላት ከምዘይኮነ ዝስምዖም ነቐፌታ ተዋሂብዎም ኣሎ፤ እንታይ ደኣ ንመዓልታዊ ድሌታት ሰባት ኣብ ግምት ከእቱን ቴክኖሎጂ ብምጥቃም ንኽነብሩ ዝኽእሉ ሃዋህው ክፈጥርን ኣለዎ፣ እቲ መስርሕ ዲዛይን ብመጽናዕቲ ባህርያዊ፣ ከባብያውን ማሕበራውን ስነ-ፍልጠት ክሕበር ኣለዎ።
translated_question: ገለ ኣርኪተክተራት ንመስርሕ ዲዛይን ንኽህሉ ዝኽእል ከባቢታት ንምፍጣር እንታይ ክሕብሩ ኣለዎም ዝብል እምነት ኣለዎም?

passage: The period known as the Crusades, a series of religiously motivated military expeditions originally intended to bring the Levant back into Christian rule, began. Several Crusader states were founded in the eastern Mediterranean. These were all short-lived. The Crusaders would have a profound impact on many parts of Europe. Their Sack of Constantinople in 1204brought an abrupt end to the Byzantine Empire. Though it would later be re-established, it would never recover its former glory. The Crusaders would establish trade routes that would develop into the Silk Road and open the way for the merchant republics of Genoa and Venice to become major economic powers. The Reconquista, a related movement, worked to reconquer Iberia for Christendom.
question: What was the original intention behind the Crusades?
mc_answer1: To bring the Levant back into Christian rule
translated_passage: እቲ ብመስቀላዊ ውግኣት ዝፍለጥ እዋን፡ ብተኸታታሊ ሃይማኖታዊ ድራኸ ዝለበሰ ወተሃደራዊ ወፍሪ፡ ፈለማ ንሌቫንት ናብ ክርስትያናዊ መግዛእቲ ንምምላስ ዝዓለመ፡ ተጀመረ። ኣብ ምብራቓዊ ማእከላይ ባሕሪ ሓያሎ መስቀላዊ ግዝኣታት ተመስሪቶም። እዚኦም ኩሎም ሓጺር ዕድመ ዝነበሮም እዮም። እቶም መስቀላውያን ኣብ ብዙሕ ክፋላት ኤውሮጳ ዓሚቝ ጽልዋ ከሕድሩ እዮም። ኣብ 1204ንሳክ ናይ ቁስጥንጥንያኦም ንሃጸያዊ ግዝኣት ቢዛንታይን ሃንደበታዊ መወዳእታ ኣካይዶም። ድሒሩ ዳግማይ ክምስረት እኳ እንተኾነ፡ ነቲ ናይ ቀደም ክብሩ ግን ፈጺሙ ኣይምመልአን። እቶም መስቀላውያን ናብ መንገዲ ስልክ ዝምዕብሉ ናይ ንግዲ መስመራት ይምስርቱን ንንግዳውያን ሪፓብሊካት ጀኖቫን ቬኒስን ዓበይቲ ቁጠባዊ ሓይልታት ንኽኾኑ መንገዲ ይኸፍቱን። እቲ ምስኡ ዝተኣሳሰር ምንቅስቓስ ዝነበረ ረኮንኲስታ ንኢቤሪያ ንክርስቶስት ዳግማይ ንምስዓር ሰሪሑ።
translated_question: ድሕሪ መስቀላዊ ውግኣት ዝነበረ መበቆላዊ ዕላማ እንታይ እዩ ነይሩ?

passage: The period known as the Crusades, a series of religiously motivated military expeditions originally intended to bring the Levant back into Christian rule, began. Several Crusader states were founded in the eastern Mediterranean. These were all short-lived. The Crusaders would have a profound impact on many parts of Europe. Their Sack of Constantinople in 1204brought an abrupt end to the Byzantine Empire. Though it would later be re-established, it would never recover its former glory. The Crusaders would establish trade routes that would develop into the Silk Road and open the way for the merchant republics of Genoa and Venice to become major economic powers. The Reconquista, a related movement, worked to reconquer Iberia for Christendom.
question: Where were several Crusader states founded according to the passage?
translated_passage: እቲ ብመስቀላዊ ውግኣት ዝፍለጥ እዋን፡ ብተኸታታሊ ሃይማኖታዊ ድራኸ ዝለበሰ ወተሃደራዊ ወፍሪ፡ ፈለማ ንሌቫንት ናብ ክርስትያናዊ መግዛእቲ ንምምላስ ዝዓለመ፡ ተጀመረ። ኣብ ምብራቓዊ ማእከላይ ባሕሪ ሓያሎ መስቀላዊ ግዝኣታት ተመስሪቶም። እዚኦም ኩሎም ሓጺር ዕድመ ዝነበሮም እዮም። እቶም መስቀላውያን ኣብ ብዙሕ ክፋላት ኤውሮጳ ዓሚቝ ጽልዋ ከሕድሩ እዮም። ኣብ 1204ንሳክ ናይ ቁስጥንጥንያኦም ንሃጸያዊ ግዝኣት ቢዛንታይን ሃንደበታዊ መወዳእታ ኣካይዶም። ድሒሩ ዳግማይ ክምስረት እኳ እንተኾነ፡ ነቲ ናይ ቀደም ክብሩ ግን ፈጺሙ ኣይምመልአን። እቶም መስቀላውያን ናብ መንገዲ ስልክ ዝምዕብሉ ናይ ንግዲ መስመራት ይምስርቱን ንንግዳውያን ሪፓብሊካት ጀኖቫን ቬኒስን ዓበይቲ ቁጠባዊ ሓይልታት ንኽኾኑ መንገዲ ይኸፍቱን። እቲ ምስኡ ዝተኣሳሰር ምንቅስቓስ ዝነበረ ረኮንኲስታ ንኢቤሪያ ንክርስቶስት ዳግማይ ንምስዓር ሰሪሑ።
translated_question: ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ ሓያሎ መስቀላዊ ግዝኣታት ኣበይ ተመስሪተን?

passage: The period known as the Crusades, a series of religiously motivated military expeditions originally intended to bring the Levant back into Christian rule, began. Several Crusader states were founded in the eastern Mediterranean. These were all short-lived. The Crusaders would have a profound impact on many parts of Europe. Their Sack of Constantinople in 1204brought an abrupt end to the Byzantine Empire. Though it would later be re-established, it would never recover its former glory. The Crusaders would establish trade routes that would develop into the Silk Road and open the way for the merchant republics of Genoa and Venice to become major economic powers. The Reconquista, a related movement, worked to reconquer Iberia for Christendom.
question: Which event brought an abrupt end to the Byzantine Empire?
mc_answer1: The founding of the Crusader states

translated_question: ኣየናይ ፍጻመ እዩ ንሃጸያዊ ግዝኣት ቢዛንታይን ሃንደበታዊ መወዳእታ ዘብጽሐ?

passage: The period known as the Crusades, a series of religiously motivated military expeditions originally intended to bring the Levant back into Christian rule, began. Several Crusader states were founded in the eastern Mediterranean. These were all short-lived. The Crusaders would have a profound impact on many parts of Europe. Their Sack of Constantinople in 1204brought an abrupt end to the Byzantine Empire. Though it would later be re-established, it would never recover its former glory. The Crusaders would establish trade routes that would develop into the Silk Road and open the way for the merchant republics of Genoa and Venice to become major economic powers. The Reconquista, a related movement, worked to reconquer Iberia for Christendom.

passage: The Nazi regime under Adolf Hitler came to power in 1933, and along with Mussolini's Italy sought to gain control of the continent by the Second World War. Following the Allied victory in the Second World War, Europe was divided by the Iron Curtain. The countries in Southeastern Europe were dominated by the Soviet Union and became communist states. The major non-communist Southern European countries joined a US-led military alliance (NATO) and formed the European Economic Community amongst themselves. The countries in the Soviet sphere of influence joined the military alliance known as the Warsaw Pact and the economic bloc called Comecon. Yugoslavia was neutal.
question: When did the Nazi regime under Adolf Hitler come to power?
translated_passage: እቲ ኣብ ትሕቲ ኣዶልፍ ሂትለር ዝነበረ ስርዓት ናዚ ብ1933 ናብ ስልጣን መጸ፣ ምስታ ናይ ሙሶሊኒ ጣልያን ድማ ብኻልኣይ ውግእ ዓለም ነታ ኣህጉር ክትቆጻጸሮ ደለየት። ኣብ ካልኣይ ኲናት ዓለም ዝነበረ ዓወት ኪዳን ስዒቡ፡ ኤውሮጳ ብመጋረጃ ሓጺን ተኸፋፊላ ነበረት። ኣብ ደቡባዊ ምብራቕ ኤውሮጳ ዝርከባ ሃገራት ብሕብረት ሶቭየት ዓብሊለን ኮሚኒስታዊ ግዝኣታት ኮይነን እየን። እተን ዓበይቲ ኮሚኒስት ዘይኮኑ ሃገራት ደቡባውያን ሃገራት ኤውሮጳ፡ ብኣመሪካ ዝምራሕ ወተሃደራዊ ኪዳን (NATO) ተጸንቢረን ኣብ መንጎአን ንቁጠባዊ ማሕበረሰብ ኤውሮጳ ኣቚመን። እተን ኣብ ስፍራ ሶቭየት ጽልዋ ዘለዋ ሃገራት፡ ናብቲ ብዋርሶ ፓክትን ኮሜኮን ዝበሃል ቁጠባዊ ውድብን ተባሂሉ ዝፍለጥ ወተሃደራዊ ኪዳን ተጸንቢራ። ዩጎዝላቪያ ኒውታል እያ ነይራ።

passage: Baird Television Ltd. made Britain's first television broadcast, on 30 September 1929 from its studio in Long Acre, London, via the BBC's London transmitter, using the electromechanical system pioneered by John Logie Baird. This system used a vertically-scanned image of 30 lines – just enough resolution for a close-up of one person, and with a bandwidth low enough to use existing radio transmitters. Simultaneous transmission of sound and picture was achieved on 30 March 1930, by using the BBC's new twin transmitter at Brookmans Park. By late 1930, 30 minutes of morning programmes were broadcast Monday to Friday, and 30 minutes at midnight on Tuesdays and Fridays, after BBC radio went off the air. Baird broadcasts via the BBC continued until June 1932.
question: Which company made Britain's first television broadcast?

passage: Baird Television Ltd. made Britain's first television broadcast, on 30 September 1929 from its studio in Long Acre, London, via the BBC's London transmitter, using the electromechanical system pioneered by John Logie Baird. This system used a vertically-scanned image of 30 lines – just enough resolution for a close-up of one person, and with a bandwidth low enough to use existing radio transmitters. Simultaneous transmission of sound and picture was achieved on 30 March 1930, by using the BBC's new twin transmitter at Brookmans Park. By late 1930, 30 minutes of morning programmes were broadcast Monday to Friday, and 30 minutes at midnight on Tuesdays and Fridays, after BBC radio went off the air. Baird broadcasts via the BBC continued until June 1932.

passage: Baird Television Ltd. made Britain's first television broadcast, on 30 September 1929 from its studio in Long Acre, London, via the BBC's London transmitter, using the electromechanical system pioneered by John Logie Baird. This system used a vertically-scanned image of 30 lines – just enough resolution for a close-up of one person, and with a bandwidth low enough to use existing radio transmitters. Simultaneous transmission of sound and picture was achieved on 30 March 1930, by using the BBC's new twin transmitter at Brookmans Park. By late 1930, 30 minutes of morning programmes were broadcast Monday to Friday, and 30 minutes at midnight on Tuesdays and Fridays, after BBC radio went off the air. Baird broadcasts via the BBC continued until June 1932.
question: How many minutes of morning programmes were broadcast by late 1930?

passage: On 1 July 1967, BBC Two became the first television channel in Europe to broadcast regularly in colour, using the West German PAL system that is still in use today although being gradually superseded by digital systems. (BBC One and ITV began 625-line colour broadcasts simultaneously on 15 November 1969). Unlike other terrestrial channels, BBC Two does not have soap opera or standard news programming, but a range of programmes intended to be eclectic and diverse (although if a programme has high audience ratings it is often eventually repositioned to BBC One). The different remit of BBC2allowed its first controller, Sir David Attenborough to commission the first heavyweight documentaries and documentary series such as Civilisation, The Ascent of Man and Horizon.
question: When did BBC Two become the first European channel to broadcast regularly in colour?
translated_passage: ብዕለት 1 ሓምለ 1967 ቢቢሲ ቱ ኣብ ኤውሮጳ ናይ መጀመርታ ናይ ተለቪዥን ቻነል ኮይና ብቐጻሊ ብሕብሪ ክትፍኖ ከላ፡ ነቲ ሎሚ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ዝውዕል ዘሎ ናይ ምዕራብ ጀርመናዊ ፓል ስርዓት ተጠቒማ፡ ዋላ’ኳ በብቑሩብ ብዲጂታላዊ ስርዓታት እንተተተካእታ እንተኾነት። (BBC Oneን ITVን ብሓንሳብ 625-line ሕብራዊ ፈነወታት ጀሚሮም ብ15 ሕዳር 1969)። ቢቢሲ ክልተ ዘይከም ካልኦት ምድራዊ መስመራት፡ ሳሙና ወይ ስታንዳርድ ኒውስ ፕሮግራሚንግ የብሉን፡ እንተኾነ ግን ንኤክለክቲክን ዝተፈላለየን ክኸውን ዝተሓሰቡ ዝተፈላለዩ ፕሮግራማት (ዋላ እኳ ሓደ መደብ ልዑል ናይ ተዓዘብቲ ደረጃ እንተሃልይዎ ኣብ መወዳእታ ናብ ቢቢሲ ዋን ዳግማይ ይቐውም)። እቲ ዝተፈላለየ ልመላ BBC2፡ ናይ መጀመርታ ተቖጻጻሪኡ፡ ሰር ዴቪድ ኣተንቦሮ፡ ናይ መጀመርታ ከበድቲ ሰነዳዊ ፊልምታትን ከም ስልጣነ፡ ምድያብ ሰብን ሆራይዞንን ዝኣመሰሉ ተኸታተልቲ ሰነዳዊ ፊልምታት ንምስራሕ ፈቒዱ።

passage: On 1 July 1967, BBC Two became the first television channel in Europe to broadcast regularly in colour, using the West German PAL system that is still in use today although being gradually superseded by digital systems. (BBC One and ITV began 625-line colour broadcasts simultaneously on 15 November 1969). Unlike other terrestrial channels, BBC Two does not have soap opera or standard news programming, but a range of programmes intended to be eclectic and diverse (although if a programme has high audience ratings it is often eventually repositioned to BBC One). The different remit of BBC2allowed its first controller, Sir David Attenborough to commission the first heavyweight documentaries and documentary series such as Civilisation, The Ascent of Man and Horizon.

passage: On 1 July 1967, BBC Two became the first television channel in Europe to broadcast regularly in colour, using the West German PAL system that is still in use today although being gradually superseded by digital systems. (BBC One and ITV began 625-line colour broadcasts simultaneously on 15 November 1969). Unlike other terrestrial channels, BBC Two does not have soap opera or standard news programming, but a range of programmes intended to be eclectic and diverse (although if a programme has high audience ratings it is often eventually repositioned to BBC One). The different remit of BBC2allowed its first controller, Sir David Attenborough to commission the first heavyweight documentaries and documentary series such as Civilisation, The Ascent of Man and Horizon.
question: What type of programming is BBC Two notably known for not including?
mc_answer2: Soap opera and standard news programming

passage: Schwarzenegger came out of retirement, however, to compete in the 1980 Mr. Olympia. Schwarzenegger was training for his role in Conan, and he got into such good shape because of the running, horseback riding and sword training, that he decided he wanted to win the Mr. Olympia contest one last time. passage: Schwarzenegger came out of retirement, however, to compete in the 1980 Mr. Olympia. passage: Schwarzenegger announced his candidacy in the 2023 California recall election for Governor of California on the August 6, 2023 episode of The Tonight Show with Jay Leno. Schwarzenegger had the most name recognition in a crowded field of candidates, but he had never held public office and his political views were unknown to most Californians. His candidacy immediately became national and international news, with media outlets dubbing him the 'Governator' (referring to The Terminator movies, see above) and 'The Running Man' (the name of another one of his films), and calling the recall election 'Total Recall' (yet another movie starring Schwarzenegger). Schwarzenegger declined to participate in several debates with other recall replacement candidates, and appeared in only one debate on September 24, 2003.
question: On which television show did Schwarzenegger announce his candidacy?
mc_answer1: The Tonight Show with Jay Leno
mc_answer3: The Late Show with David Letterman
translated_passage: ሽዋርዘነገር ኣብ 2023 ኣብ ዝተኻየደ ናይ ካሊፎርንያ ምጽዋዕ ምርጫ ንኣመሓዳሪ ካሊፎርንያ ኣብ 6 ነሓሰ 2023 ኣብ ዝተኻየደ መደብ ናይ ቶናይት ሾው ምስ ጄይ ሌኖ ሕጹይነቱ ኣፍሊጡ። ሽዋርዘነገር ኣብ ጽዑቕ ዓውዲ ሕጹያት ዝበዝሐ ስም ኣፍልጦ ነይርዎ፡ እንተኾነ ግን ህዝባዊ ስልጣን ሒዙ ኣይፈልጥን፡ ፖለቲካዊ ኣረኣእያኡ ድማ ንመብዛሕትኦም ካሊፎርንያውያን ዘይፍለጥ ነበረ። ሕጹይነቱ ብኡንብኡ ሃገራውን ኣህጉራውን ዜና ኰነ፣ ማዕከናት ዜና ድማ ‘መኣዝን’ (ንናይ ተርሚነተር ፊልምታት ዝውከሳ፣ ኣብ ላዕሊ ርአ)ን ‘ዘ ሩኒንግ ማን’ (ስም ካልእ ካብ ፊልምታቱ’)፣ ነቲ ናይ ምጽዋዕ ምርጫ ‘ጠቕላላ ምዝካር’ ኢሉ ዝጽውዓሉ (ንሱ ካልእ ፊልም ሽዋርዘነገር ዝዋሳእ) ዝብል ማዕከናት ዜና ኰነ። ሽዋርዘነገር ምስ ካልኦት ናይ ምዝካር መተካእታ ሕጹያት ኣብ ዝተፈላለየ ክትዓት ክሳተፍ ኣይደለየን፣ ኣብ ሓደ ክትዕ ድማ ብ24 መስከረም 2003 ጥራይ እዩ ተራእዩ።
translated_question: ሽዋርዘነገር ኣብ ኣየናይ መደብ ተለቪዥን እዩ ሕሉውነቱ ኣፍሊጡ?

translated_mc_answer3: እቲ ነፍስሄር ምርኢት ምስ ዳዊት ሌተርማን

passage: Schwarzenegger announced his candidacy in the 2023 California recall election for Governor of California on the August 6, 2023 episode of The Tonight Show with Jay Leno. Schwarzenegger had the most name recognition in a crowded field of candidates, but he had never held public office and his political views were unknown to most Californians. His candidacy immediately became national and international news, with media outlets dubbing him the 'Governator' (referring to The Terminator movies, see above) and 'The Running Man' (the name of another one of his films), and calling the recall election 'Total Recall' (yet another movie starring Schwarzenegger). Schwarzenegger declined to participate in several debates with other recall replacement candidates, and appeared in only one debate on September 24, 2003.
question: What was notable about Schwarzenegger's political background at the time of his candidacy?
mc_answer1: He had extensive public office experience
mc_answer2: His political views were well established
mc_answer3: He had never held public office and his views were largely unknown

translated_passage: ሽዋርዘነገር ኣብ 2023 ኣብ ዝተኻየደ ናይ ካሊፎርንያ ምጽዋዕ ምርጫ ንኣመሓዳሪ ካሊፎርንያ ኣብ 6 ነሓሰ 2023 ኣብ ዝተኻየደ መደብ ናይ ቶናይት ሾው ምስ ጄይ ሌኖ ሕጹይነቱ ኣፍሊጡ። ሽዋርዘነገር ኣብ ጽዑቕ ዓውዲ ሕጹያት ዝበዝሐ ስም ኣፍልጦ ነይርዎ፡ እንተኾነ ግን ህዝባዊ ስልጣን ሒዙ ኣይፈልጥን፡ ፖለቲካዊ ኣረኣእያኡ ድማ ንመብዛሕትኦም ካሊፎርንያውያን ዘይፍለጥ ነበረ። ሕጹይነቱ ብኡንብኡ ሃገራውን ኣህጉራውን ዜና ኰነ፣ ማዕከናት ዜና ድማ ‘መኣዝን’ (ንናይ ተርሚነተር ፊልምታት ዝውከሳ፣ ኣብ ላዕሊ ርአ)ን ‘ዘ ሩኒንግ ማን’ (ስም ካልእ ካብ ፊልምታቱ’)፣ ነቲ ናይ ምጽዋዕ ምርጫ ‘ጠቕላላ ምዝካር’ ኢሉ ዝጽውዓሉ (ንሱ ካልእ ፊልም ሽዋርዘነገር ዝዋሳእ) ዝብል ማዕከናት ዜና ኰነ። ሽዋርዘነገር ምስ ካልኦት ናይ ምዝካር መተካእታ ሕጹያት ኣብ ዝተፈላለየ ክትዓት ክሳተፍ ኣይደለየን፣ ኣብ ሓደ ክትዕ ድማ ብ24 መስከረም 2003 ጥራይ እዩ ተራእዩ።

translated_passage: ኣብ ኮሎምበስ ኦሃዮ ኣብ ዝርከብ ዕዳጋ እውን ወፍሪ ገይሩ። ብዛዕባ ገለ ካብቶም ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ዓመታት ዝሓገዝዎ ኣብ ንግዲ ኣዕሊሉ ኣሎ: \'i ብዛዕባ ንግዲ ብዛዕባ ንግዲ ከይመሓደሩኒ ክመሃር ኣይምኸኣልኩን... ካብ ሚልተን ፍሪድማን ክሳብ ዶናልድ ትራምፕ... ሕጂ ድማ ሌስ ዌክስነርን ዋረን ባፈትን። ካብ ፕላኔት ሆሊዉድ ሓደ ወይ ክልተ ነገር ከይተረፈ ተማሂረ፣ ከም መዓስ ከም ዝወጽእ! ኣነ ድማ ገይረ!\' ኣብ ዳይመንሽናል ፋንድ ኣድቫይዘርስ ዝበሃል ናይ ወፍሪ ትካል ርኡይ ዋንነት ኣለዎ። ሽዋርዘነገር እውን ወናኒ ናይቲ ኣብ 1989 ዝጀመሮን ኣብ ኮሎምበስ ኦሃዮ ዓመታዊ ዝካየድን ናይ ኣርኖልድ ስፖርታዊ ፈስቲቫል እዩ። ኣሽሓት ዓለምለኻዊ ሰብ ሞያ ጥዕናን ብቕዓትን ዘአንግድ ፈስቲቫል ኮይኑ፡ ናብ ናይ ሰለስተ መዓልታት ኤክስፖ እውን ዝሰፍሐ እዩ። ብተወሳኺ ኦክ ፕሮዳክሽንስ ኢንክን ፊትነስ ፓብሊኬሽንስ ዝበሃል ናይ ፊልም ፕሮዳክሽን ትካልን ምስ ሳይሞን ኤንድ ሹስተር ናይ ሓባር ናይ ምሕታም ስራሕን ይውንን።
translated_question: ካብዞም ዝስዕቡ ኣየናይ እዩ ከም ሓደ ካብቶም ሽዋርዘነገር ዝሰርሖም ናይ ንግዲ ስራሕቲ ዘይተጠቕሰ?

passage: During the English Civil War Plymouth sided with the Parliamentarians and was besieged for almost four years by the Royalists. The last major attack by the Royalist was by Sir Richard Grenville leading thousands of soldiers towards Plymouth, but they were defeated by the Plymothians at Freedom Fields Park. The civil war ended as a Parliamentary win, but monarchy was restored by King Charles II in 1660, who imprisoned many of the Parliamentary heroes on Drake's Island. Construction of the Royal Citadel began in 1665, after the Restoration; it was armed with cannon facing both out to sea and into the town, rumoured to be a reminder to residents not to oppose the Crown. Mount Batten tower also dates from around this time.
question: During the English Civil War, which side did Plymouth support?

translated_passage: ኣብ እዋን ኲናት ሓድሕድ እንግሊዝ ፕሊማውስ ምስቶም ኣባላት ባይቶ ወጊኑ ንኣስታት ኣርባዕተ ዓመት ብንያይስ ተኸቢቡ። እቲ ናይ መወዳእታ ዓቢ መጥቃዕቲ ብሮያልሊስት ብሰር ሪቻርድ ግረንቪል ንኣሽሓት ወተሃደራት ናብ ፕሊማውስ ናብ ፕሊማውዝ ዝመርሐ እዩ ነይሩ፡ እንተኾነ ግን ብፕሊሞቲያውያን ኣብ ፍሪደም ፊልድስ ፓርክ ተሳዒሮም እዮም። ኲናት ሓድሕድ ከም ፓርላማዊ ዓወት ተዛዚሙ፡ ንግስነት ግን ብ1660 ብንጉስ ቻርለስ ዳግማዊ ተመልሰ፡ ንሱ ድማ ንብዙሓት ካብቶም ኣብ ደሴት ድሬክ ዝነበሩ ባይቶኣውያን ጀጋኑ ኣብ ቤት ማእሰርቲ ኣእትዩ። ህንጸት ሮያል ሲታደል ብ1665 እዩ ጀሚሩ፣ ድሕሪ ምሕዳስ፤ ንኽልቲኡ ናብ ባሕርን ናብታ ከተማን ገጹ ገጹ ዝጥምት መዳፍዕ ተዓጢቑ፡ ነበርቲ ነቲ ዘውዲ ከይቃወሙ ዘዘኻኽር ምዃኑ ይንገር ነበረ። እምባ ባት ታወር እውን ካብዚ ግዜ እዚ ዝጅምር እዩ።
translated_question: ድሕሪ ኲናት ሓድሕድ ኣየናይ ንጉስ እዩ ነቲ ንግስነት ብ1660 ናብ ንግስነት ዝመለሶን ንብዙሓት ጀጋኑ ባይቶ ኣብ ምእሳሩን?

passage: During the English Civil War Plymouth sided with the Parliamentarians and was besieged for almost four years by the Royalists. The last major attack by the Royalist was by Sir Richard Grenville leading thousands of soldiers towards Plymouth, but they were defeated by the Plymothians at Freedom Fields Park. The civil war ended as a Parliamentary win, but monarchy was restored by King Charles II in 1660, who imprisoned many of the Parliamentary heroes on Drake's Island. Construction of the Royal Citadel began in 1665, after the Restoration; it was armed with cannon facing both out to sea and into the town, rumoured to be a reminder to residents not to oppose the Crown. Mount Batten tower also dates from around this time.
question: When did construction of the Royal Citadel begin?

passage: The Exeter to Plymouth railway of the LSWR needs to be reopened to connect Cornwall and Plymouth to the rest of the UK railway system on an all weather basis. There are proposals to reopen the line from Tavistock to Bere Alston for a through service to Plymouth. On the night of 4 February 2014, amid high winds and extremely rough seas, part of the sea wall at Dawlish was breached washing away around 40 metres (130 ft) of the wall and the ballast under the railway immediately behind. The line was closed. Network Rail began repair work and the line reopened on 4 April 2014. In the wake of widespread disruption caused by damage to the mainline track at Dawlish by coastal storms in February 2014, Network Rail are considering reopening the Tavistock to Okehampton and Exeter section of the line as an alternative to the coastal route.
question: Which railway line is proposed for reopening to connect Cornwall and Plymouth to the UK railway system?
mc_answer1: The Exeter to Plymouth railway of the LSWR
mc_answer2: The Tavistock to Bere Alston line
translated_passage: እቲ ኤክሰተር ናብ ፕሊማውዝ ባቡር ናይ LSWR ንኮርንዎልን ፕሊማውስን ምስ ዝተረፈ ስርዓተ ባቡር ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ ንምትእስሳር ዳግማይ ምኽፋት የድልዮ። ካብ ታቪስቶክ ናብ ቢረ ኣልስቶን ንዝግበር መስመር ዳግማይ ንምኽፋት ዝቐረቡ እማመታት ኣለዉ ንሓደ ብመንገዲ ኣገልግሎት ናብ ፕሊማውስ። ኣብ 4 ለካቲት 2014 ምሸት፡ ኣብ መንጎ ብርቱዕ ንፋስን ኣዝዩ ጽንኩር ባሕርን፡ ገለ ክፋል ናይቲ ኣብ ዳውሊሽ ዝነበረ መንደቕ ባሕሪ፡ ኣብ ከባቢ 40 ሜትሮ (130 ጫማ) ናይቲ መንደቕ፡ እቲ ባላስት ድማ ብቕጽበት ብድሕሪት እቲ ባላስት ተሓጺቡ ተሓጺቡ ተበታተነ። እቲ መስመር ተዓጽዩ ነበረ። ኔትወርክ ረይል ናይ ጽገና ስራሕ ጀመረ እሞ እቲ መስመር ብ4 ሚያዝያ 2014 ዳግማይ ተኸፊቱ።ድሕሪ እቲ ኣብ ለካቲት 2014 ኣብ ዳውሊሽ ኣብ ዳውሊሽ ኣብ ዝርከብ ቀንዲ መስመር መስመር ብዝተበላሸወ ሰፊሕ ምዝንባዕ፡ ኔትወርክ ረይል ከም ኣማራጺ ናይቲ መስመር ገማግም ባሕርን ኤክስተርን ናይቲ መስመር ዳግማይ ክኽፈት ይሓስብ ኣሎ።
translated_question: ንኮርንዎልን ፕሊማውስን ምስ ስርዓተ ባቡር ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ ንምትእስሳር ዳግማይ ንምኽፋት ኣየናይ መስመር ባቡር እዩ ሓሳብ?
translated_mc_answer1: እቲ ኤክሰተር ናብ ፕሊማውዝ ባቡር ናይ LSWR .
translated_mc_answer2: እቲ ታቪስቶክ ናብ ቢረ ኣልስቶን መስመር

passage: The Exeter to Plymouth railway of the LSWR needs to be reopened to connect Cornwall and Plymouth to the rest of the UK railway system on an all weather basis. There are proposals to reopen the line from Tavistock to Bere Alston for a through service to Plymouth. On the night of 4 February 2014, amid high winds and extremely rough seas, part of the sea wall at Dawlish was breached washing away around 40 metres (130 ft) of the wall and the ballast under the railway immediately behind. The line was closed. Network Rail began repair work and the line reopened on 4 April 2014. In the wake of widespread disruption caused by damage to the mainline track at Dawlish by coastal storms in February 2014, Network Rail are considering reopening the Tavistock to Okehampton and Exeter section of the line as an alternative to the coastal route.
question: Which section is proposed to be reopened for a through service to Plymouth?

question: What natural conditions contributed to the breach of the sea wall at Dawlish?

translated_passage: እቲ ኤክሰተር ናብ ፕሊማውዝ ባቡር ናይ LSWR ንኮርንዎልን ፕሊማውስን ምስ ዝተረፈ ስርዓተ ባቡር ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ ንምትእስሳር ዳግማይ ምኽፋት የድልዮ። ካብ ታቪስቶክ ናብ ቢረ ኣልስቶን ንዝግበር መስመር ዳግማይ ንምኽፋት ዝቐረቡ እማመታት ኣለዉ ንሓደ ብመንገዲ ኣገልግሎት ናብ ፕሊማውስ። ኣብ 4 ለካቲት 2014 ምሸት፡ ኣብ መንጎ ብርቱዕ ንፋስን ኣዝዩ ጽንኩር ባሕርን፡ ገለ ክፋል ናይቲ ኣብ ዳውሊሽ ዝነበረ መንደቕ ባሕሪ፡ ኣብ ከባቢ 40 ሜትሮ (130 ጫማ) ናይቲ መንደቕ፡ እቲ ባላስት ድማ ብቕጽበት ብድሕሪት እቲ ባላስት ተሓጺቡ ተሓጺቡ ተበታተነ። እቲ መስመር ተዓጽዩ ነበረ። ኔትወርክ ረይል ናይ ጽገና ስራሕ ጀመረ እሞ እቲ መስመር ብ4 ሚያዝያ 2014 ዳግማይ ተኸፊቱ።ድሕሪ እቲ ኣብ ለካቲት 2014 ኣብ ዳውሊሽ ኣብ ዳውሊሽ ኣብ ዝርከብ ቀንዲ መስመር መስመር ብዝተበላሸወ ሰፊሕ ምዝንባዕ፡ ኔትወርክ ረይል ከም ኣማራጺ ናይቲ መስመር ገማግም ባሕርን ኤክስተርን ናይቲ መስመር ዳግማይ ክኽፈት ይሓስብ ኣሎ።
translated_question: ኣብ ዳውሊሽ መንደቕ ባሕሪ ንምጥሓስ ኣበርክቶ ዝገበረ ተፈጥሮኣዊ ኩነታት እንታይ እዩ?

passage: The Exeter to Plymouth railway of the LSWR needs to be reopened to connect Cornwall and Plymouth to the rest of the UK railway system on an all weather basis. There are proposals to reopen the line from Tavistock to Bere Alston for a through service to Plymouth. On the night of 4 February 2014, amid high winds and extremely rough seas, part of the sea wall at Dawlish was breached washing away around 40 metres (130 ft) of the wall and the ballast under the railway immediately behind. The line was closed. Network Rail began repair work and the line reopened on 4 April 2014. In the wake of widespread disruption caused by damage to the mainline track at Dawlish by coastal storms in February 2014, Network Rail are considering reopening the Tavistock to Okehampton and Exeter section of the line as an alternative to the coastal route.
question: When did the line reopen after the repair work by Network Rail?

translated_question: እቲ መስመር ድሕሪ ናይ ጽገና ስራሕ ብኔትወርክ ረይል መዓስ ደጊሙ ተኸፊቱ?

translated_passage: እቲ ኤክሰተር ናብ ፕሊማውዝ ባቡር ናይ LSWR ንኮርንዎልን ፕሊማውስን ምስ ዝተረፈ ስርዓተ ባቡር ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ ንምትእስሳር ዳግማይ ምኽፋት የድልዮ። ካብ ታቪስቶክ ናብ ቢረ ኣልስቶን ንዝግበር መስመር ዳግማይ ንምኽፋት ዝቐረቡ እማመታት ኣለዉ ንሓደ ብመንገዲ ኣገልግሎት ናብ ፕሊማውስ። ኣብ 4 ለካቲት 2014 ምሸት፡ ኣብ መንጎ ብርቱዕ ንፋስን ኣዝዩ ጽንኩር ባሕርን፡ ገለ ክፋል ናይቲ ኣብ ዳውሊሽ ዝነበረ መንደቕ ባሕሪ፡ ኣብ ከባቢ 40 ሜትሮ (130 ጫማ) ናይቲ መንደቕ፡ እቲ ባላስት ድማ ብቕጽበት ብድሕሪት እቲ ባላስት ተሓጺቡ ተሓጺቡ ተበታተነ። እቲ መስመር ተዓጽዩ ነበረ። ኔትወርክ ረይል ናይ ጽገና ስራሕ ጀመረ እሞ እቲ መስመር ብ4 ሚያዝያ 2014 ዳግማይ ተኸፊቱ።ድሕሪ እቲ ኣብ ለካቲት 2014 ኣብ ዳውሊሽ ኣብ ዳውሊሽ ኣብ ዝርከብ ቀንዲ መስመር መስመር ብዝተበላሸወ ሰፊሕ ምዝንባዕ፡ ኔትወርክ ረይል ከም ኣማራጺ ናይቲ መስመር ገማግም ባሕርን ኤክስተርን ናይቲ መስመር ዳግማይ ክኽፈት ይሓስብ ኣሎ።
translated_question: ብሰንኪ ኣብ ዳውሊሽ ዝግበር ናይ ገማግም ባሕሪ ህቦብላ ጉድኣት ኣየናይ ኣማራጺ መንገዲ እዩ ዝሕሰብ ዘሎ?

passage: While the Warsaw Pact was established as a balance of power or counterweight to NATO, there was no direct confrontation between them. Instead, the conflict was fought on an ideological basis. Both NATO and the Warsaw Pact led to the expansion of military forces and their integration into the respective blocs. The Warsaw Pact's largest military engagement was Warsaw Pact invasion of Czechoslovakia (with the participation of all Pact nations except Romania and Albania). The Pact failed to function when the Revolutions of 1989 spread through Eastern Europe, beginning with the Solidarity movement in Poland and its success in June 1989.
question: As a counterweight, what was the Warsaw Pact established to balance?

The Pact failed to function when the Revolutions of 1989 spread through Eastern Europe, beginning with the Solidarity movement in Poland and its success in June 1989.

translated_passage: ውዕል ዋርሶ ንኔቶ ከም ሚዛን ሓይሊ ወይ መቃለሲ መቃለሲ ክኸውን እንከሎ፡ ኣብ መንጎኦም ቀጥታዊ ምግጣም ግን ኣይነበረን። ኣብ ክንድኡ እቲ ግርጭት ብስነ-ሓሳባዊ መሰረት እዩ ተኻይዱ። ክልቲኦም ናቶን ውዕል ዋርሶን ወተሃደራዊ ሓይልታት ምስፍሕፋሕን ኣብቲ ዝምልከቶም ብሎኮታት ንኽውሃሃዱን ምኽንያት ኮይኑ። እቲ ናይ ዋርሶ ውዕል ዝዓበየ ወተሃደራዊ ሕጸ ዋርሶ፡ ዋርሶ ኣብ ልዕሊ ቸኮዝሎቫክያ (ብዘይካ ናይ ኩለን ናይ ውዕል ኣህዛብ ምስ ተሳትፎ ናይ ኵለን ውዕላት ኣህዛብን ኣልባንያን) ወራር ውዕል ዋርሶ እዩ ነይሩ። እቲ ውዕል፡ ሰውራታት 1989 ብምብራቓዊ ኤውሮጳ ምስ ተዘርግሐ፡ ካብ ምንቅስቓስ ምትሕግጋዝ ፖላንድን ኣብ ሰነ 1989 ዓወቱን ዝጀመረ፡ ክሰርሕ ኣይከኣለን።

passage: Antarctic explorers Robert Falcon Scott and Frank Bickerton both lived in the city. Artists include Beryl Cook whose paintings depict the culture of Plymouth and Robert Lenkiewicz, whose paintings investigated themes of vagrancy, sexual behaviour and suicide, lived in the city from the 1960s until his death in 2002. Illustrator and creator of children's series Mr Benn and King Rollo, David McKee, was born and brought up in South Devon and trained at Plymouth College of Art. Jazz musician John Surman, born in nearby Tavistock, has close connections to the area, evidenced by his 2012album Saltash Bells. The avant garde prepared guitarist Keith Rowe was born in the city before establishing the jazz free improvisation band AMM in London in 1965 and MIMEO in 1997. The musician and film director Cosmo Jarvis has lived in several towns in South Devon and has filmed videos in and around Plymouth. In addition, actors Sir Donald Sinden and Judi Trott. George Passmore of Turner Prize winning duo Gilbert and George was born in the city, as was Labour politician Michael Foot whose family reside at nearby Trematon Castle.
question: Which Antarctic explorers mentioned in the passage lived in the city?
mc_answer3: Both Robert Falcon Scott and Frank Bickerton

translated_question: ኣብቲ ክፍሊ ተጠቒሱ ዘሎ ስእልታት ኣየናይ ስነ-ጥበባዊ’ዩ ንባህሊ ፕሊማውስ ዝገልጽ?

passage: Antarctic explorers Robert Falcon Scott and Frank Bickerton both lived in the city. Artists include Beryl Cook whose paintings depict the culture of Plymouth and Robert Lenkiewicz, whose paintings investigated themes of vagrancy, sexual behaviour and suicide, lived in the city from the 1960s until his death in 2002. Illustrator and creator of children's series Mr Benn and King Rollo, David McKee, was born and brought up in South Devon and trained at Plymouth College of Art. Jazz musician John Surman, born in nearby Tavistock, has close connections to the area, evidenced by his 2012album Saltash Bells. The avant garde prepared guitarist Keith Rowe was born in the city before establishing the jazz free improvisation band AMM in London in 1965 and MIMEO in 1997. The musician and film director Cosmo Jarvis has lived in several towns in South Devon and has filmed videos in and around Plymouth. In addition, actors Sir Donald Sinden and Judi Trott. George Passmore of Turner Prize winning duo Gilbert and George was born in the city, as was Labour politician Michael Foot whose family reside at nearby Trematon Castle.

translated_question: ኣብቲ ክፍሊ ዝተጠቕሱ ክልተ ተዋሳእቲ ኣየኖት እዮም ምስታ ከተማ ዝተኣሳሰሩ?

passage: Antarctic explorers Robert Falcon Scott and Frank Bickerton both lived in the city. Artists include Beryl Cook whose paintings depict the culture of Plymouth and Robert Lenkiewicz, whose paintings investigated themes of vagrancy, sexual behaviour and suicide, lived in the city from the 1960s until his death in 2002. Illustrator and creator of children's series Mr Benn and King Rollo, David McKee, was born and brought up in South Devon and trained at Plymouth College of Art. Jazz musician John Surman, born in nearby Tavistock, has close connections to the area, evidenced by his 2012album Saltash Bells. The avant garde prepared guitarist Keith Rowe was born in the city before establishing the jazz free improvisation band AMM in London in 1965 and MIMEO in 1997. The musician and film director Cosmo Jarvis has lived in several towns in South Devon and has filmed videos in and around Plymouth. In addition, actors Sir Donald Sinden and Judi Trott. George Passmore of Turner Prize winning duo Gilbert and George was born in the city, as was Labour politician Michael Foot whose family reside at nearby Trematon Castle.
question: Which Labour politician mentioned in the passage has family residing at nearby Trematon Castle?

passage: On 25 February 1991, the Warsaw Pact was declared disbanded at a meeting of defense and foreign ministers from remaining Pact countries meeting in Hungary. On 1July 1991, in Prague, the Czechoslovak President Václav Havel formally ended the 1955 Warsaw Treaty Organization of Friendship, Cooperation, and Mutual Assistance and so disestablished the Warsaw Treaty after 36 years of military alliance with the USSR. In fact, the treaty was de facto disbanded in December 1989 during the violent revolution in Romania, which toppled the communist government, without military intervention from other member states. The USSR disestablished itself in December 1991.
question: On what date was the Warsaw Pact declared disbanded?

question: In which city did President Václav Havel formally end the Warsaw Treaty Organization?
translated_passage: ብዕለት 25 ለካቲት 1991 ውዕል ዋርሶ፡ ኣብ ሃንጋሪ ካብ ዝተረፉ ናይ ውዕል ሃገራት ኣኼባ ኣብ ዝተኻየደ ኣኼባ ምክልኻልን ሚኒስተራት ጉዳያት ወጻኢን ከምዝተበታተነ ተኣዊጁ። ኣብ 1 ሓምለ 1991 ኣብ ፕራግ፡ ፕረዚደንት ቸኮስሎቫክ ቫክላቭ ሃቨል ነቲ ብ1955 ዝነበረ ውዲት ውዕል ዕርክነት፡ ምትሕግጋዝን ሓድሕዳዊ ሓገዝን ብ1955 ብወግዒ ኣቋሪጽዎ፡ ስለዚ ድማ ድሕሪ 36 ዓመታት ወተሃደራዊ ምሕዝነት ዋርሶ ምስ ዩኤስኤስኣር ንውዕሊ ዋርሶ ዘይተኣደነ። ብሓቂ እቲ ውዕል ኣብ ታሕሳስ 1989 ኣብቲ ኣብ ሮማንያ ዝነበረ ዓመጽ ዝመልኦ ሰውራ ንኮሚኒስታዊ መንግስቲ ዘንቀሳቐሰ፡ ካብ ካልኦት ኣባላት ሃገራት ወተሃደራዊ ምትእትታው ከይተገብረሉ፡ ብጭቡጥ ተበታቲኑ። ሶቭየት ሕብረት ኣብ ታሕሳስ 1991 ንርእሳ ዘይተጣበቐት እያ።
translated_question: ፕረዚደንት ቫክላቭ ሃቨል ኣብ ኣየነይቲ ከተማ ንውዳበ ውዕል ዋርሶ ብወግዒ ኣቋሪጻቶ?

passage: In contrast, Joseph Smith, the founder of the Latter Day Saint movement, taught: \'There is no such thing as immaterial matter. All spirit is matter, but it is more fine or pure, and can only be discerned by purer eyes; We cannot see it; but when our bodies are purified we shall see that it is all matter.\' This spirit element has always existed; it is co-eternal with God. It is also called \'intelligence\' or \'the light of truth\', which like all observable matter \'was not created or made, neither indeed can be\'. Members of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints view the revelations of Joseph Smith as a restoration of original Christian doctrine, which they believe post-apostolic theologians began to corrupt in the centuries after Christ. The writings of many[quantify] of these theologians indicate a clear influence of Greek metaphysical philosophies such as Neoplatonism, which characterized divinity as an utterly simple, immaterial, formless, substance/essence (ousia) that transcended all that was physical. Despite strong opposition from many Christians, this metaphysical depiction of God eventually became incorporated into the doctrine of the Christian church, displacing the original Judeo-Christian concept of a physical, corporeal God who created humans in His image and likeness.
question: What does Joseph Smith assert about immaterial matter?
mc_answer1: Immaterial matter exists and is superior to physical matter
mc_answer2: There is no such thing as immaterial matter; all spirit is matter
mc_answer3: Immaterial matter can only be seen by the divine
mc_answer4: Immaterial matter is created by God
translated_passage: ብኣንጻሩ መስራቲ ናይቲ ዳሕረዋይ መዓልቲ ምንቅስቓስ ቅዱስ ጆሴፍ ስሚዝ ተማሂሩ: \'ዘይንማተርያላዊ ጉዳይ ዝበሃል የለን። ኩሉ መንፈስ ቁምነገር እዩ፣ ግን ዝያዳ ጽቡቕ ወይ ንጹህ እዩ፣ ብንጹህ ዓይኒ ጥራይ እዩ ክለምዕ ዝኽእል፤ ክንርእዮ ኣይንኽእልን ኢና፤ ኣካላትና ምስ ተጸረየ ግን ኩሉ ኣገዳሲ ምዃኑ ክንርኢ ኢና።\' እዚ ናይ መንፈስ ባእታ እዚ ወትሩ ነይሩ፤ ምስ ኣምላኽ ሓባራዊ ዘለኣለማዊ እዩ። \'intelligence\' ወይ \'light of truth\' እውን ይበሃል፣ እዚ ድማ ከም ኩሉ ዝርአ ጉዳይ \''s ኣይተፈጥረን ወይ ዝተሰርሐ፣ ክልቲኦም ብሓቂ ክህልዉ ኣይክእሉን እዮም። ኣባላት ቤተ ክርስቲያን ኢየሱስ ክርስቶስ ናይ ዳሕረዎት መዓልታት ቅዱሳን ንጆሴፍ ስሚዝ ከም ምሕዳስ ናይቲ መበቈላዊ ክርስትያናዊ ትምህርቲ ይርእይዎ፣ እዚ ድማ ድሕሪ ዕግርግር ዝመልኦ ስነ-መለኮት ድሕሪ ክርስቶስ ኣብ ዘመናት ክበላሾ ከም ዝጀመረ ይኣምንዎ። ጽሑፋት ናይ ብዙሓት[ብዛዕባ] ናይዞም ስነ-መለኮት ምሁራት ንጹር ጽልዋ ናይ ግሪኽ ሜታፊዚካዊ ፍልስፍናታት ከም ኒዮፕላቶኒዝም ዘመልክት ኮይኑ፡ ንመለኮት ከም ፍጹም ቀሊል፡ ዘይንዋታዊ፡ ቅርጺ ዘይብሉ፡ ንጥረ ነገር/ፍጥረት) ዝገለጾ፡ ንኹሉ እቲ ኣካላዊ ዝነበረ ዝሰገረ። ካብ ብዙሓት ክርስትያናት ሓያል ተቓውሞ እኳ እንተሃለወ፡ እዚ ናይ ኣምላኽ ሜታፊዚካዊ ስእሊ ኣብ መወዳእታ ኣብ ትምህርቲ ክርስትያናዊ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ተሓዋዊሱ፡ ነቲ መበቆላዊ ኣይሁድዮ-ክርስትያናዊ ኣምር ናይ ሓደ ኣብ ምስሉን ምምሳልን ደቂ ሰባት ዝፈጠረ ኣካላዊ፡ ንቡር ኣምላኽ ኣምላኽ ፈንጂሩ።
translated_question: ጆሴፍ ስሚዝ ብዛዕባ ዘይንዋታዊ ጉዳይ እንታይ እዩ ዘረጋግጽ?
translated_mc_answer1: ዘይንዋታዊ ነገር ኣሎን ካብ ኣካላዊ ጉዳይ ዝበልጽን
translated_mc_answer2: ዘይንዋታዊ ጉዳይ ዝበሃል የለን፤ ኩሉ መንፈስ ቁምነገር እዩ .
translated_mc_answer3: ዘይንዋታዊ ጉዳይ ብመለኮታዊ ጥራይ እዩ ክርአ ዝኽእል .

passage: In contrast, Joseph Smith, the founder of the Latter Day Saint movement, taught: \'There is no such thing as immaterial matter. All spirit is matter, but it is more fine or pure, and can only be discerned by purer eyes; We cannot see it; but when our bodies are purified we shall see that it is all matter.\' This spirit element has always existed; it is co-eternal with God. It is also called \'intelligence\' or \'the light of truth\', which like all observable matter \'was not created or made, neither indeed can be\'. Members of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints view the revelations of Joseph Smith as a restoration of original Christian doctrine, which they believe post-apostolic theologians began to corrupt in the centuries after Christ. The writings of many[quantify] of these theologians indicate a clear influence of Greek metaphysical philosophies such as Neoplatonism, which characterized divinity as an utterly simple, immaterial, formless, substance/essence (ousia) that transcended all that was physical. Despite strong opposition from many Christians, this metaphysical depiction of God eventually became incorporated into the doctrine of the Christian church, displacing the original Judeo-Christian concept of a physical, corporeal God who created humans in His image and likeness.
question: According to the passage, what is true about the spirit element as taught by Joseph Smith?
mc_answer1: It is a temporary substance that vanishes after death
mc_answer2: It is a created material that differs from physical matter
mc_answer3: It has always existed and is co-eternal with God
mc_answer4: It is visible only to those with divine insight
translated_passage: ብኣንጻሩ መስራቲ ናይቲ ዳሕረዋይ መዓልቲ ምንቅስቓስ ቅዱስ ጆሴፍ ስሚዝ ተማሂሩ: \'ዘይንማተርያላዊ ጉዳይ ዝበሃል የለን። ኩሉ መንፈስ ቁምነገር እዩ፣ ግን ዝያዳ ጽቡቕ ወይ ንጹህ እዩ፣ ብንጹህ ዓይኒ ጥራይ እዩ ክለምዕ ዝኽእል፤ ክንርእዮ ኣይንኽእልን ኢና፤ ኣካላትና ምስ ተጸረየ ግን ኩሉ ኣገዳሲ ምዃኑ ክንርኢ ኢና።\' እዚ ናይ መንፈስ ባእታ እዚ ወትሩ ነይሩ፤ ምስ ኣምላኽ ሓባራዊ ዘለኣለማዊ እዩ። \'intelligence\' ወይ \'light of truth\' እውን ይበሃል፣ እዚ ድማ ከም ኩሉ ዝርአ ጉዳይ \''s ኣይተፈጥረን ወይ ዝተሰርሐ፣ ክልቲኦም ብሓቂ ክህልዉ ኣይክእሉን እዮም። ኣባላት ቤተ ክርስቲያን ኢየሱስ ክርስቶስ ናይ ዳሕረዎት መዓልታት ቅዱሳን ንጆሴፍ ስሚዝ ከም ምሕዳስ ናይቲ መበቈላዊ ክርስትያናዊ ትምህርቲ ይርእይዎ፣ እዚ ድማ ድሕሪ ዕግርግር ዝመልኦ ስነ-መለኮት ድሕሪ ክርስቶስ ኣብ ዘመናት ክበላሾ ከም ዝጀመረ ይኣምንዎ። ጽሑፋት ናይ ብዙሓት[ብዛዕባ] ናይዞም ስነ-መለኮት ምሁራት ንጹር ጽልዋ ናይ ግሪኽ ሜታፊዚካዊ ፍልስፍናታት ከም ኒዮፕላቶኒዝም ዘመልክት ኮይኑ፡ ንመለኮት ከም ፍጹም ቀሊል፡ ዘይንዋታዊ፡ ቅርጺ ዘይብሉ፡ ንጥረ ነገር/ፍጥረት) ዝገለጾ፡ ንኹሉ እቲ ኣካላዊ ዝነበረ ዝሰገረ። ካብ ብዙሓት ክርስትያናት ሓያል ተቓውሞ እኳ እንተሃለወ፡ እዚ ናይ ኣምላኽ ሜታፊዚካዊ ስእሊ ኣብ መወዳእታ ኣብ ትምህርቲ ክርስትያናዊ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ተሓዋዊሱ፡ ነቲ መበቆላዊ ኣይሁድዮ-ክርስትያናዊ ኣምር ናይ ሓደ ኣብ ምስሉን ምምሳልን ደቂ ሰባት ዝፈጠረ ኣካላዊ፡ ንቡር ኣምላኽ ኣምላኽ ፈንጂሩ።
translated_question: ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ ከምቲ ጆሴፍ ስሚዝ ዝመሃሮ ብዛዕባ መንፈሳዊ ባእታ እንታይ ሓቂ እዩ?
translated_mc_answer1: ድሕሪ ሞት ዝጠፍእ ግዝያዊ ንጥረ ነገር ’ ዩ።
translated_mc_answer2: ካብ ኣካላዊ ንጥረ ነገር ዝፍለ ዝተፈጥረ ንዋት ’ ዩ።
translated_mc_answer3: ኩሉ ግዜ ዝነበረን ምስ ኣምላኽ ብሓባር ዘለኣለማዊን ’ ዩ።
translated_mc_answer4: ነቶም መለኮታዊ ርድኢት ዘለዎም ጥራይ እዩ ዝረአ .

It is also called \'intelligence\' or \'the light of truth\', which like all observable matter \'was not created or made, neither indeed can be\'. Members of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints view the revelations of Joseph Smith as a restoration of original Christian doctrine, which they believe post-apostolic theologians began to corrupt in the centuries after Christ. question: Which two terms does Joseph Smith use to refer to the spirit element?
mc_answer2: Intelligence and the light of truth
translated_passage: ብኣንጻሩ መስራቲ ናይቲ ዳሕረዋይ መዓልቲ ምንቅስቓስ ቅዱስ ጆሴፍ ስሚዝ ተማሂሩ: \'ዘይንማተርያላዊ ጉዳይ ዝበሃል የለን። ኩሉ መንፈስ ቁምነገር እዩ፣ ግን ዝያዳ ጽቡቕ ወይ ንጹህ እዩ፣ ብንጹህ ዓይኒ ጥራይ እዩ ክለምዕ ዝኽእል፤ ክንርእዮ ኣይንኽእልን ኢና፤ ኣካላትና ምስ ተጸረየ ግን ኩሉ ኣገዳሲ ምዃኑ ክንርኢ ኢና።\' እዚ ናይ መንፈስ ባእታ እዚ ወትሩ ነይሩ፤ ምስ ኣምላኽ ሓባራዊ ዘለኣለማዊ እዩ። \'intelligence\' ወይ \'light of truth\' እውን ይበሃል፣ እዚ ድማ ከም ኩሉ ዝርአ ጉዳይ \''s ኣይተፈጥረን ወይ ዝተሰርሐ፣ ክልቲኦም ብሓቂ ክህልዉ ኣይክእሉን እዮም። ኣባላት ቤተ ክርስቲያን ኢየሱስ ክርስቶስ ናይ ዳሕረዎት መዓልታት ቅዱሳን ንጆሴፍ ስሚዝ ከም ምሕዳስ ናይቲ መበቈላዊ ክርስትያናዊ ትምህርቲ ይርእይዎ፣ እዚ ድማ ድሕሪ ዕግርግር ዝመልኦ ስነ-መለኮት ድሕሪ ክርስቶስ ኣብ ዘመናት ክበላሾ ከም ዝጀመረ ይኣምንዎ። ጽሑፋት ናይ ብዙሓት[ብዛዕባ] ናይዞም ስነ-መለኮት ምሁራት ንጹር ጽልዋ ናይ ግሪኽ ሜታፊዚካዊ ፍልስፍናታት ከም ኒዮፕላቶኒዝም ዘመልክት ኮይኑ፡ ንመለኮት ከም ፍጹም ቀሊል፡ ዘይንዋታዊ፡ ቅርጺ ዘይብሉ፡ ንጥረ ነገር/ፍጥረት) ዝገለጾ፡ ንኹሉ እቲ ኣካላዊ ዝነበረ ዝሰገረ። ካብ ብዙሓት ክርስትያናት ሓያል ተቓውሞ እኳ እንተሃለወ፡ እዚ ናይ ኣምላኽ ሜታፊዚካዊ ስእሊ ኣብ መወዳእታ ኣብ ትምህርቲ ክርስትያናዊ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ተሓዋዊሱ፡ ነቲ መበቆላዊ ኣይሁድዮ-ክርስትያናዊ ኣምር ናይ ሓደ ኣብ ምስሉን ምምሳልን ደቂ ሰባት ዝፈጠረ ኣካላዊ፡ ንቡር ኣምላኽ ኣምላኽ ፈንጂሩ።
translated_question: ጆሴፍ ስሚዝ ነቲ ስፕሪት ኤለመንት ንምምልካት ኣየኖት ክልተ ቃላት እዩ ዝጥቀም?

passage: In contrast, Joseph Smith, the founder of the Latter Day Saint movement, taught: \'There is no such thing as immaterial matter. All spirit is matter, but it is more fine or pure, and can only be discerned by purer eyes; We cannot see it; but when our bodies are purified we shall see that it is all matter.\' This spirit element has always existed; it is co-eternal with God. It is also called \'intelligence\' or \'the light of truth\', which like all observable matter \'was not created or made, neither indeed can be\'. Members of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints view the revelations of Joseph Smith as a restoration of original Christian doctrine, which they believe post-apostolic theologians began to corrupt in the centuries after Christ. The writings of many[quantify] of these theologians indicate a clear influence of Greek metaphysical philosophies such as Neoplatonism, which characterized divinity as an utterly simple, immaterial, formless, substance/essence (ousia) that transcended all that was physical. Despite strong opposition from many Christians, this metaphysical depiction of God eventually became incorporated into the doctrine of the Christian church, displacing the original Judeo-Christian concept of a physical, corporeal God who created humans in His image and likeness.
question: How do members of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints view Joseph Smith's revelations?
mc_answer1: As a deviation from traditional Christianity
mc_answer3: As a restoration of original Christian doctrine
translated_passage: ብኣንጻሩ መስራቲ ናይቲ ዳሕረዋይ መዓልቲ ምንቅስቓስ ቅዱስ ጆሴፍ ስሚዝ ተማሂሩ: \'ዘይንማተርያላዊ ጉዳይ ዝበሃል የለን። ኩሉ መንፈስ ቁምነገር እዩ፣ ግን ዝያዳ ጽቡቕ ወይ ንጹህ እዩ፣ ብንጹህ ዓይኒ ጥራይ እዩ ክለምዕ ዝኽእል፤ ክንርእዮ ኣይንኽእልን ኢና፤ ኣካላትና ምስ ተጸረየ ግን ኩሉ ኣገዳሲ ምዃኑ ክንርኢ ኢና።\' እዚ ናይ መንፈስ ባእታ እዚ ወትሩ ነይሩ፤ ምስ ኣምላኽ ሓባራዊ ዘለኣለማዊ እዩ። \'intelligence\' ወይ \'light of truth\' እውን ይበሃል፣ እዚ ድማ ከም ኩሉ ዝርአ ጉዳይ \''s ኣይተፈጥረን ወይ ዝተሰርሐ፣ ክልቲኦም ብሓቂ ክህልዉ ኣይክእሉን እዮም። ኣባላት ቤተ ክርስቲያን ኢየሱስ ክርስቶስ ናይ ዳሕረዎት መዓልታት ቅዱሳን ንጆሴፍ ስሚዝ ከም ምሕዳስ ናይቲ መበቈላዊ ክርስትያናዊ ትምህርቲ ይርእይዎ፣ እዚ ድማ ድሕሪ ዕግርግር ዝመልኦ ስነ-መለኮት ድሕሪ ክርስቶስ ኣብ ዘመናት ክበላሾ ከም ዝጀመረ ይኣምንዎ። ጽሑፋት ናይ ብዙሓት[ብዛዕባ] ናይዞም ስነ-መለኮት ምሁራት ንጹር ጽልዋ ናይ ግሪኽ ሜታፊዚካዊ ፍልስፍናታት ከም ኒዮፕላቶኒዝም ዘመልክት ኮይኑ፡ ንመለኮት ከም ፍጹም ቀሊል፡ ዘይንዋታዊ፡ ቅርጺ ዘይብሉ፡ ንጥረ ነገር/ፍጥረት) ዝገለጾ፡ ንኹሉ እቲ ኣካላዊ ዝነበረ ዝሰገረ። ካብ ብዙሓት ክርስትያናት ሓያል ተቓውሞ እኳ እንተሃለወ፡ እዚ ናይ ኣምላኽ ሜታፊዚካዊ ስእሊ ኣብ መወዳእታ ኣብ ትምህርቲ ክርስትያናዊ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ተሓዋዊሱ፡ ነቲ መበቆላዊ ኣይሁድዮ-ክርስትያናዊ ኣምር ናይ ሓደ ኣብ ምስሉን ምምሳልን ደቂ ሰባት ዝፈጠረ ኣካላዊ፡ ንቡር ኣምላኽ ኣምላኽ ፈንጂሩ።
translated_question: ኣባላት ቤተ ክርስቲያን ኢየሱስ ክርስቶስ ናይ ዳሕረዎት መዓልታት ቅዱሳን ከመይ ገይሮም እዮም ንጆሴፍ ስሚዝ ዝገልጾ ዮሃንስ ዝጥምትዎ?

question: Which philosophical influence is mentioned as having contributed to the corruption of original Christian doctrine?
mc_answer2: Greek metaphysical philosophies such as Neoplatonism
translated_passage: ብኣንጻሩ መስራቲ ናይቲ ዳሕረዋይ መዓልቲ ምንቅስቓስ ቅዱስ ጆሴፍ ስሚዝ ተማሂሩ: \'ዘይንማተርያላዊ ጉዳይ ዝበሃል የለን። ኩሉ መንፈስ ቁምነገር እዩ፣ ግን ዝያዳ ጽቡቕ ወይ ንጹህ እዩ፣ ብንጹህ ዓይኒ ጥራይ እዩ ክለምዕ ዝኽእል፤ ክንርእዮ ኣይንኽእልን ኢና፤ ኣካላትና ምስ ተጸረየ ግን ኩሉ ኣገዳሲ ምዃኑ ክንርኢ ኢና።\' እዚ ናይ መንፈስ ባእታ እዚ ወትሩ ነይሩ፤ ምስ ኣምላኽ ሓባራዊ ዘለኣለማዊ እዩ። \'intelligence\' ወይ \'light of truth\' እውን ይበሃል፣ እዚ ድማ ከም ኩሉ ዝርአ ጉዳይ \''s ኣይተፈጥረን ወይ ዝተሰርሐ፣ ክልቲኦም ብሓቂ ክህልዉ ኣይክእሉን እዮም። ኣባላት ቤተ ክርስቲያን ኢየሱስ ክርስቶስ ናይ ዳሕረዎት መዓልታት ቅዱሳን ንጆሴፍ ስሚዝ ከም ምሕዳስ ናይቲ መበቈላዊ ክርስትያናዊ ትምህርቲ ይርእይዎ፣ እዚ ድማ ድሕሪ ዕግርግር ዝመልኦ ስነ-መለኮት ድሕሪ ክርስቶስ ኣብ ዘመናት ክበላሾ ከም ዝጀመረ ይኣምንዎ። ጽሑፋት ናይ ብዙሓት[ብዛዕባ] ናይዞም ስነ-መለኮት ምሁራት ንጹር ጽልዋ ናይ ግሪኽ ሜታፊዚካዊ ፍልስፍናታት ከም ኒዮፕላቶኒዝም ዘመልክት ኮይኑ፡ ንመለኮት ከም ፍጹም ቀሊል፡ ዘይንዋታዊ፡ ቅርጺ ዘይብሉ፡ ንጥረ ነገር/ፍጥረት) ዝገለጾ፡ ንኹሉ እቲ ኣካላዊ ዝነበረ ዝሰገረ። ካብ ብዙሓት ክርስትያናት ሓያል ተቓውሞ እኳ እንተሃለወ፡ እዚ ናይ ኣምላኽ ሜታፊዚካዊ ስእሊ ኣብ መወዳእታ ኣብ ትምህርቲ ክርስትያናዊ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ተሓዋዊሱ፡ ነቲ መበቆላዊ ኣይሁድዮ-ክርስትያናዊ ኣምር ናይ ሓደ ኣብ ምስሉን ምምሳልን ደቂ ሰባት ዝፈጠረ ኣካላዊ፡ ንቡር ኣምላኽ ኣምላኽ ፈንጂሩ።
translated_question: ኣየናይ ፍልስፍናዊ ጽልዋ እዩ ዝጥቀስ ኣብ ብልሽውና ናይቲ መበቆላዊ ክርስትያናዊ ትምህርቲ ኣበርክቶ ከም ዝገበረ?
translated_mc_answer2: ከም ኒዮፕላቶኒዝም ዝኣመሰሉ ናይ ግሪኽ ሜታፊዚካዊ ፍልስፍናታት

The writings of many[quantify] of these theologians indicate a clear influence of Greek metaphysical philosophies such as Neoplatonism, which characterized divinity as an utterly simple, immaterial, formless, substance/essence (ousia) that transcended all that was physical. Despite strong opposition from many Christians, this metaphysical depiction of God eventually became incorporated into the doctrine of the Christian church, displacing the original Judeo-Christian concept of a physical, corporeal God who created humans in His image and likeness.
question: According to the passage, how does Neoplatonism characterize divinity?
mc_answer1: As a complex, multifaceted physical entity
mc_answer2: As an utterly simple, immaterial, formless substance/essence (ousia) that transcends the physical
mc_answer3: As a mutable force that changes over time
translated_passage: ብኣንጻሩ መስራቲ ናይቲ ዳሕረዋይ መዓልቲ ምንቅስቓስ ቅዱስ ጆሴፍ ስሚዝ ተማሂሩ: \'ዘይንማተርያላዊ ጉዳይ ዝበሃል የለን። ኩሉ መንፈስ ቁምነገር እዩ፣ ግን ዝያዳ ጽቡቕ ወይ ንጹህ እዩ፣ ብንጹህ ዓይኒ ጥራይ እዩ ክለምዕ ዝኽእል፤ ክንርእዮ ኣይንኽእልን ኢና፤ ኣካላትና ምስ ተጸረየ ግን ኩሉ ኣገዳሲ ምዃኑ ክንርኢ ኢና።\' እዚ ናይ መንፈስ ባእታ እዚ ወትሩ ነይሩ፤ ምስ ኣምላኽ ሓባራዊ ዘለኣለማዊ እዩ። \'intelligence\' ወይ \'light of truth\' እውን ይበሃል፣ እዚ ድማ ከም ኩሉ ዝርአ ጉዳይ \''s ኣይተፈጥረን ወይ ዝተሰርሐ፣ ክልቲኦም ብሓቂ ክህልዉ ኣይክእሉን እዮም። ኣባላት ቤተ ክርስቲያን ኢየሱስ ክርስቶስ ናይ ዳሕረዎት መዓልታት ቅዱሳን ንጆሴፍ ስሚዝ ከም ምሕዳስ ናይቲ መበቈላዊ ክርስትያናዊ ትምህርቲ ይርእይዎ፣ እዚ ድማ ድሕሪ ዕግርግር ዝመልኦ ስነ-መለኮት ድሕሪ ክርስቶስ ኣብ ዘመናት ክበላሾ ከም ዝጀመረ ይኣምንዎ። ጽሑፋት ናይ ብዙሓት[ብዛዕባ] ናይዞም ስነ-መለኮት ምሁራት ንጹር ጽልዋ ናይ ግሪኽ ሜታፊዚካዊ ፍልስፍናታት ከም ኒዮፕላቶኒዝም ዘመልክት ኮይኑ፡ ንመለኮት ከም ፍጹም ቀሊል፡ ዘይንዋታዊ፡ ቅርጺ ዘይብሉ፡ ንጥረ ነገር/ፍጥረት ዝገለጾ፡ ንኹሉ እቲ ኣካላዊ ዝነበረ ዝሰገረ። ካብ ብዙሓት ክርስትያናት ሓያል ተቓውሞ እኳ እንተሃለወ፡ እዚ ናይ ኣምላኽ ሜታፊዚካዊ ስእሊ ኣብ መወዳእታ ኣብ ትምህርቲ ክርስትያናዊ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ተሓዋዊሱ፡ ነቲ መበቆላዊ ኣይሁድዮ-ክርስትያናዊ ኣምር ናይ ሓደ ኣብ ምስሉን ምምሳልን ደቂ ሰባት ዝፈጠረ ኣካላዊ፡ ንቡር ኣምላኽ ኣምላኽ ፈንጂሩ።
translated_question: ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ፡ ኒዮፕላቶኒዝም ንዲቪኒቲ ብኸመይ ይገልጾ?
translated_mc_answer1: ከም ዝተሓላለኸን ብዙሕ ሸነኻት ዘለዎን ኣካላዊ ኣካል .
translated_mc_answer2: ከም ፍጹም ቀሊል፡ ዘይንዋታዊ፡ ቅርጺ ዘይብሉ ንጥረ ነገር/መንግስቲ (USIA) ንኣካላዊ ዝሰግር
translated_mc_answer3: ከም ሓደ ምስ ግዜ ዝቕየር ምልዋጥ ሓይሊ .

passage: The French cleric Pierre Gassendi (1592-1665) represented the materialist tradition in opposition to the attempts of René Descartes (1596-1650) to provide the natural sciences with dualist foundations. There followed the materialist and atheist abbé Jean Meslier (1664-1729), Julien Offray de La Mettrie, the German-French Paul-Henri Thiry Baron d'Holbach (1723-1789), the Encyclopedist Denis Diderot (1713-1784), and other French Enlightenment thinkers; as well as (in England) John 'Walking' Stewart (1747-1822), whose insistence in seeing matter as endowed with a moral dimension had a major impact on the philosophical poetry of William Wordsworth (1770-1850).
question: Whose philosophical poetry was notably impacted by John 'Walking' Stewart's views on the moral dimension of matter?
translated_passage: እቲ ፈረንሳዊ ቀሺ ፒየር ጋሴንዲ (1592-1665) ነቲ ንዋታዊ ትውፊት ዝውክል ኮይኑ፡ ንፈተነታት ረነ ዲካርተስ (1596-1650) ብምቅዋም ነቲ ተፈጥሮኣዊ ስነ-ፍልጠት ክልተኣዊ መሰረታት ንምሃብ እዩ። ኣብኡ ድማ እቲ ንዋታዊን ኣምላኽ ዘይብሉን ኣቢ ጂን መስሊየር (1664-1729)፣ ጁልያን ኦፊረይ ደ ላ ሜትትሪ፣ ጀርመናዊ-ፈረንሳ ጳውሎስ-ሄንሪ ቲሪ ባሮን ዲ'ሆልባክ (1723-1789)፣ እቲ ኢንሳይክሎፕድዲስት ደኒስ ዲረሮት (1713-1784)፣ ከምኡውን ካልኦት ፈረንሳዊ ኢንላይተንመንት ኣተሓሳስባ፤ ከምኡ’ውን (ኣብ ዓዲ እንግሊዝ) ጆን ‘walking’ ስቲዋርት (1747-1822)፣ ንሱ ድማ ንገዛኡ ብሞራላዊ ሸነኽ ዝተዓደለ ኮይኑ ንገዛእ ርእይዎ ኣብ ፍልስፍናዊ ግጥሚ ዊልያም ወርድስዎርዝ (1770-1850) ዓቢ ጽልዋ ኣሕዲሩሉ።
translated_question: ፍልስፍናዊ ግጥሚኡ ብፍላይ ብጆን ‘እግሩ’ ስቲዋርት ኣብ ሞራላዊ ሸነኻት ጉዳይ ዝነበሮ ኣረኣእያ ስቲዋርት ተጸልዩ?

passage: Some advocates for Tibet, Darfur, and the spiritual practice Falun Gong planned to protest the April 9 arrival of the torch in San Francisco. China had already requested the torch route in San Francisco be shortened. On April 7, 2008, two days prior to the actual torch relay, three activists carrying Tibetan flags scaled the suspension cables of the Golden Gate Bridge to unfurl two banners, one saying 'One World, One Dream. Free Tibet', and the other, 'Free Tibet '08'. Among them was San Francisco resident Laurel Sutherlin, who spoke to the local TV station KPIX-CBS5 live from a cellphone, urging the International Olympic Committee to ask China not to allow the torch to go through Tibet. 'Sutherlin said he was worried that the torch's planned route through Tibet would lead to more arrests and Chinese officials would use force to stifle dissent.' The three activists and five supporters face charges related to trespassing, conspiracy and causing a public nuisance.
question: What messages were displayed on the banners unfurled by the activists?
mc_answer1: Free China and Stop the Olympics
mc_answer2: One World, One Dream. Free Tibet and Free Tibet '08
mc_answer3: Justice for All and End Suppression
translated_passage: ገለ ንቲቤት፡ ዳርፉርን መንፈሳዊ ልምምድን ተጣበቕቲ ፋሉን ጎንግ፡ ነቲ ብ9 ሚያዝያ ናብ ሳንፍራንሲስኮ ዝኣተወ ሽግ ንምቅዋም መደብ ኣውጺኦም ነይሮም። ቻይና ድሮ ኣብ ሳንፍራንሲስኮ ዝርከብ መስመር ሽግ ክትሕጸር ሓቲታ ነይራ። ብዕለት 7 ሚያዝያ 2008 ክልተ መዓልቲ ቅድሚ እቲ ጭቡጥ ቶርች ሪለይ፡ ሰለስተ ደለይቲ ፍትሒ ቲቤት ባንዴራታት ዝሓዙ ኣክቲቪስትስ ነቲ ክልተ ባነራት ንምፍታሕ ነቲ ናይ ወርቃዊ ኣፍደገ ድልድል ገመዳት ስንጥቕ ዝበለ ገመዳት ስሒቦምዎ፡ እቲ ሓደ 'ዋን ዓለም፡ ሓደ ሕልሚ' ዝብል። ነጻ ቲቤት’፡ እቲ ካልእ ድማ፡ 'ናጻ ቲቤት '08'። ካብዚኦም እቲ ኣብ ሳንፍራንሲስኮ ነባሪ ሎረል ሳዘርሊን ዝርከብ ኮይኑ፡ ንሱ ነቲ ናይቲ ከባቢ መደበር ቴሌቪዥን KPIX-CBS5 ካብ ሞባይል ብቐጥታ ዘዘራረቦ ኮይኑ፡ ንቻይና ብቲቤት ክትሓልፍ ከይትፈቅድ ንቻይና ንቻይና ንቻይና ክትሓቶ ክትሓትት ተማሕጸነት። 'ሱተርሊን፡ እቲ ቶርች ብቲቤት ዝመደቦ መንገዲ፡ ናብ ዝያዳ ማእሰርቲ ከስዕብን ሰበስልጣን ቻይና ንተቓውሞ ንምትፋስ ሓይሊ ከም ዝጥቀሙን ከምዝተጨነቐ ገሊጹ።' እቶም ሰለስተ ደለይቲ ፍትሕን ሓሙሽተ ደገፍትን ምስ ምጥሓስ፣ ውዲትን ጠንቂ ህዝቢ ምዝንጋዕን ዝተኣሳሰር ክሲ የጋጥሞም።
translated_question: ኣብቲ ደለይቲ ፍትሒ ዘይተዘርግሑ ባነራት እንታይ መልእኽትታት ተራእዩ?
translated_mc_answer2: ሓደ ዓለም፡ ሓደ ሕልሚ። ነጻ ቲቤትን ነጻ ቲቤትን '08

translated_question: ኣየናይ ኣክቲቪስት እዩ ካብ ሞባይል ኣብ KPIX-CBS5 ብቐጥታ ዝዛረብ?

passage: Some advocates for Tibet, Darfur, and the spiritual practice Falun Gong planned to protest the April 9 arrival of the torch in San Francisco. China had already requested the torch route in San Francisco be shortened. On April 7, 2008, two days prior to the actual torch relay, three activists carrying Tibetan flags scaled the suspension cables of the Golden Gate Bridge to unfurl two banners, one saying 'One World, One Dream. Free Tibet', and the other, 'Free Tibet '08'. Among them was San Francisco resident Laurel Sutherlin, who spoke to the local TV station KPIX-CBS5 live from a cellphone, urging the International Olympic Committee to ask China not to allow the torch to go through Tibet. 'Sutherlin said he was worried that the torch's planned route through Tibet would lead to more arrests and Chinese officials would use force to stifle dissent.' The three activists and five supporters face charges related to trespassing, conspiracy and causing a public nuisance.
question: What did Laurel Sutherlin urge the International Olympic Committee to do?
mc_answer2: Ask China not to allow the torch to go through Tibet

translated_passage: ገለ ንቲቤት፡ ዳርፉርን መንፈሳዊ ልምምድን ተጣበቕቲ ፋሉን ጎንግ፡ ነቲ ብ9 ሚያዝያ ናብ ሳንፍራንሲስኮ ዝኣተወ ሽግ ንምቅዋም መደብ ኣውጺኦም ነይሮም። ቻይና ድሮ ኣብ ሳንፍራንሲስኮ ዝርከብ መስመር ሽግ ክትሕጸር ሓቲታ ነይራ። ብዕለት 7 ሚያዝያ 2008 ክልተ መዓልቲ ቅድሚ እቲ ጭቡጥ ቶርች ሪለይ፡ ሰለስተ ደለይቲ ፍትሒ ቲቤት ባንዴራታት ዝሓዙ ኣክቲቪስትስ ነቲ ክልተ ባነራት ንምፍታሕ ነቲ ናይ ወርቃዊ ኣፍደገ ድልድል ገመዳት ስንጥቕ ዝበለ ገመዳት ስሒቦምዎ፡ እቲ ሓደ 'ዋን ዓለም፡ ሓደ ሕልሚ' ዝብል። ነጻ ቲቤት’፡ እቲ ካልእ ድማ፡ 'ናጻ ቲቤት '08'። ካብዚኦም እቲ ኣብ ሳንፍራንሲስኮ ነባሪ ሎረል ሳዘርሊን ዝርከብ ኮይኑ፡ ንሱ ነቲ ናይቲ ከባቢ መደበር ቴሌቪዥን KPIX-CBS5 ካብ ሞባይል ብቐጥታ ዘዘራረቦ ኮይኑ፡ ንቻይና ብቲቤት ክትሓልፍ ከይትፈቅድ ንቻይና ንቻይና ንቻይና ክትሓቶ ክትሓትት ተማሕጸነት። 'ሱተርሊን፡ እቲ ቶርች ብቲቤት ዝመደቦ መንገዲ፡ ናብ ዝያዳ ማእሰርቲ ከስዕብን ሰበስልጣን ቻይና ንተቓውሞ ንምትፋስ ሓይሊ ከም ዝጥቀሙን ከምዝተጨነቐ ገሊጹ።' እቶም ሰለስተ ደለይቲ ፍትሕን ሓሙሽተ ደገፍትን ምስ ምጥሓስ፣ ውዲትን ጠንቂ ህዝቢ ምዝንጋዕን ዝተኣሳሰር ክሲ የጋጥሞም።
translated_question: እቶም ደለይቲ ፍትሕን ደገፍቶምን እንታይ ክሲ እዮም ዝገጥሞም?
translated_mc_answer2: ምጥሓል፣ ውዲት፣ ከምኡ እውን ጠንቂ ህዝባዊ ዕግርግር .

passage: India: Due to concerns about pro-Tibet protests, the relay through New Delhi on April 17 was cut to just 2.3km (less than 1.5 miles), which was shared amongst 70 runners. It concluded at the India Gate. The event was peaceful due to the public not being allowed at the relay. A total of five intended torchbearers – Kiran Bedi, Soha Ali Khan, Sachin Tendulkar, Bhaichung Bhutia and Sunil Gavaskar – withdrew from the event, citing 'personal reasons', or, in Bhutia's case, explicitly wishing to 'stand by the people of Tibet and their struggle' and protest against the PRC 'crackdown' in Tibet. Indian national football captain, Baichung Bhutia refused to take part in the Indian leg of the torch relay, citing concerns over Tibet. Bhutia, who is Sikkimese, is the first athlete to refuse to run with the torch. Indian film star Aamir Khan states on his personal blog that the 'Olympic Games do not belong to China' and confirms taking part in the torch relay 'with a prayer in his heart for the people of Tibet, and ... for all people across the world who are victims of human rights violations'. Rahul Gandhi, son of the Congress President Sonia Gandhi and scion of the Nehru-Gandhi family, also refused to carry the torch.
question: How long was the torch relay route in New Delhi?
translated_passage: ህንዲ፡ ብዛዕባ ፕሮ-ቲቤት ተቓውሞታት ብሰንኪ ስክፍታታት፡ እቲ ብመንገዲ ኒውደልሂ ክሳብ ሚያዝያ 17 ዝነበረ ሪለይ ናብ 2.3 ኪ.ሜ ጥራይ (ትሕቲ 1.5 ማይልስ) ተቖሪጹ፡ እዚ ድማ ኣብ መንጎ 70 ጎየይቲ ተኻፊሉ። ኣብ ኣፍደገ ህንዲ ተዛዚሙ። ህዝቢ ኣብቲ ሪለይ ስለዘይፍቀደሉ እቲ ፍጻመ ሰላም ዝመልኦ እዩ ነይሩ። ብድምር ሓሙሽተ ተታሒዞም ዝተሓሰበ ቶርችቢኣረራት – ኪራን በዲ፡ ሶሃ ዓሊ ካን፡ ሳቺን ቴንዱልካር፡ ባይቹንግ ቡትያ ቡትያን ሱኒል ጋቫስካርን – ካብቲ ፍጻመ ስሒብዎ፡ ‘ውልቃዊ ምኽንያታት’፡ ወይ፡ ኣብ ጉዳይ ቡትያ ብምጥቃስ፡ ኣብ ጉዳይ ቡትያ፡ ብግልጺ ‘ብዘይትድቅስን ንምቅዋምን’ን ንምቅዋም’ን ንምቅዋም ዝደልዩ ብግልጺ ክግለጹ ደንዮ። ሃገራዊ ሓለቓ ጋንታ ኩዕሶ እግሪ ህንዲ፡ ባይቹንግ ቡትያ፡ ኣብ ልዕሊ ቲቤት ዝነበረ ስክፍታታት ብምጥቃስ፡ ኣብ ናይ ህንዲ እግሪ ናይ ሽግ ሪለይ ምክፋል ኣብዩ። ሲኪመሰ ዝኾነት ቡትያ፡ በቲ ሽግ ምጉያይ ዝኣበየት ናይ መጀመርታ ኣትሌት እያ። ህንዳዊ ፊልም ኮኾብ ኣሚር ካን ኣብ ውልቃዊ ብሎጉ ከም ዝገልጾ፡ እቲ 'ኦሎምፒክ ጸወታታት ናይ ቻይና ኣይኮነን' ይብል፡ ኣብ ሽግ ሪለይ 'ምስ ሓደ ጸሎት ኣብ ልቡ ንህዝቢ ቲቤት፡ ከምኡ'ውን ... ንኹሎም ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ዝርከቡ ግዳያት ግዳይ ምጥሓስ ሰብኣዊ መሰላት ዝኾኑ ሰባት ከም ዝተሳተፉ የረጋግጽ። ወዲ ፕረዚደንት ኮንግረስ ሶንያ ጋንዲን ስዮን ስድራቤት ነህሩ-ጋንዲን ዝኾነ ራሁል ጋንዲ ነቲ ሽግ ምሓዝ እውን ኣብዩ።
translated_question: ኣብ ኒውደልሂ መስመር ቶርች ሪለይ ክንደይ ግዜ ኮይኑ?

translated_passage: ህንዲ፡ ብዛዕባ ፕሮ-ቲቤት ተቓውሞታት ብሰንኪ ስክፍታታት፡ እቲ ብመንገዲ ኒውደልሂ ክሳብ ሚያዝያ 17 ዝነበረ ሪለይ ናብ 2.3 ኪ.ሜ ጥራይ (ትሕቲ 1.5 ማይልስ) ተቖሪጹ፡ እዚ ድማ ኣብ መንጎ 70 ጎየይቲ ተኻፊሉ። ኣብ ኣፍደገ ህንዲ ተዛዚሙ። ህዝቢ ኣብቲ ሪለይ ስለዘይፍቀደሉ እቲ ፍጻመ ሰላም ዝመልኦ እዩ ነይሩ። ብድምር ሓሙሽተ ተታሒዞም ዝተሓሰበ ቶርችቢኣረራት – ኪራን በዲ፡ ሶሃ ዓሊ ካን፡ ሳቺን ቴንዱልካር፡ ባይቹንግ ቡትያ ቡትያን ሱኒል ጋቫስካርን – ካብቲ ፍጻመ ስሒብዎ፡ ‘ውልቃዊ ምኽንያታት’፡ ወይ፡ ኣብ ጉዳይ ቡትያ ብምጥቃስ፡ ኣብ ጉዳይ ቡትያ፡ ብግልጺ ‘ብዘይትድቅስን ንምቅዋምን’ን ንምቅዋም’ን ንምቅዋም ዝደልዩ ብግልጺ ክግለጹ ደንዮ። ሃገራዊ ሓለቓ ጋንታ ኩዕሶ እግሪ ህንዲ፡ ባይቹንግ ቡትያ፡ ኣብ ልዕሊ ቲቤት ዝነበረ ስክፍታታት ብምጥቃስ፡ ኣብ ናይ ህንዲ እግሪ ናይ ሽግ ሪለይ ምክፋል ኣብዩ። ሲኪመሰ ዝኾነት ቡትያ፡ በቲ ሽግ ምጉያይ ዝኣበየት ናይ መጀመርታ ኣትሌት እያ። ህንዳዊ ፊልም ኮኾብ ኣሚር ካን ኣብ ውልቃዊ ብሎጉ ከም ዝገልጾ፡ እቲ 'ኦሎምፒክ ጸወታታት ናይ ቻይና ኣይኮነን' ይብል፡ ኣብ ሽግ ሪለይ 'ምስ ሓደ ጸሎት ኣብ ልቡ ንህዝቢ ቲቤት፡ ከምኡ'ውን ... ንኹሎም ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ዝርከቡ ግዳያት ግዳይ ምጥሓስ ሰብኣዊ መሰላት ዝኾኑ ሰባት ከም ዝተሳተፉ የረጋግጽ። ወዲ ፕረዚደንት ኮንግረስ ሶንያ ጋንዲን ስዮን ስድራቤት ነህሩ-ጋንዲን ዝኾነ ራሁል ጋንዲ ነቲ ሽግ ምሓዝ እውን ኣብዩ።
translated_question: ኒው ደልሂ ቶርች ሪለይ ናበይ ተዛዚሙ?

passage: India: Due to concerns about pro-Tibet protests, the relay through New Delhi on April 17 was cut to just 2.3km (less than 1.5 miles), which was shared amongst 70 runners. It concluded at the India Gate. The event was peaceful due to the public not being allowed at the relay. A total of five intended torchbearers – Kiran Bedi, Soha Ali Khan, Sachin Tendulkar, Bhaichung Bhutia and Sunil Gavaskar – withdrew from the event, citing 'personal reasons', or, in Bhutia's case, explicitly wishing to 'stand by the people of Tibet and their struggle' and protest against the PRC 'crackdown' in Tibet. Indian national football captain, Baichung Bhutia refused to take part in the Indian leg of the torch relay, citing concerns over Tibet. Bhutia, who is Sikkimese, is the first athlete to refuse to run with the torch. Indian film star Aamir Khan states on his personal blog that the 'Olympic Games do not belong to China' and confirms taking part in the torch relay 'with a prayer in his heart for the people of Tibet, and ... for all people across the world who are victims of human rights violations'. Rahul Gandhi, son of the Congress President Sonia Gandhi and scion of the Nehru-Gandhi family, also refused to carry the torch.
question: Why was the New Delhi relay event described as peaceful?
mc_answer2: Because the public was not allowed to attend
mc_answer3: Because there were strict security measures

translated_question: እቲ ናይ ኒውደልሂ ሪለይ ፍጻመ ንምንታይ ሰላም ተባሂሉ ተገሊጹ?
translated_mc_answer3: ምኽንያቱ ጽኑዕ ናይ ጸጥታ ስጉምትታት ስለ ዝነበረ .

translated_question: ኣየኖት ሓሙሽተ ቶርችቢረርስ ካብቲ ፍጻመ ዝሰሓቡ?
translated_mc_answer1: ኪራን በዲ፡ ሶሃ ዓሊ ካን፡ ሳቺን ቴንዱልካር፡ ባጉንግ ጎስትስ & ሱኒል ጋቫስካር
translated_mc_answer2: ኪራን በዲ፡ ኣሚር ካን፡ ሳቺን ቴንዱልካር፡ ራሁል ጋንዲ & ሱኒል ጋቫስካር
translated_mc_answer3: ሶሃ ዓሊ ካን፡ ሳቺን ቴንዱልካር፡ ባጉንግ ጎስት፡ ራሁል ጋንዲ & ሱኒል ጋቫስካር

Indian film star Aamir Khan states on his personal blog that the 'Olympic Games do not belong to China' and confirms taking part in the torch relay 'with a prayer in his heart for the people of Tibet, and ... for all people across the world who are victims of human rights violations'. Rahul Gandhi, son of the Congress President Sonia Gandhi and scion of the Nehru-Gandhi family, also refused to carry the torch.
question: What reason did Bhaichung Bhutia give for withdrawing from the torch relay?
mc_answer2: He wanted to support the people of Tibet and protest against the PRC crackdown
translated_passage: ህንዲ፡ ብዛዕባ ፕሮ-ቲቤት ተቓውሞታት ብሰንኪ ስክፍታታት፡ እቲ ብመንገዲ ኒውደልሂ ክሳብ ሚያዝያ 17 ዝነበረ ሪለይ ናብ 2.3 ኪ.ሜ ጥራይ (ትሕቲ 1.5 ማይልስ) ተቖሪጹ፡ እዚ ድማ ኣብ መንጎ 70 ጎየይቲ ተኻፊሉ። ኣብ ኣፍደገ ህንዲ ተዛዚሙ። ህዝቢ ኣብቲ ሪለይ ስለዘይፍቀደሉ እቲ ፍጻመ ሰላም ዝመልኦ እዩ ነይሩ። ብድምር ሓሙሽተ ተታሒዞም ዝተሓሰበ ቶርችቢኣረራት – ኪራን በዲ፡ ሶሃ ዓሊ ካን፡ ሳቺን ቴንዱልካር፡ ባይቹንግ ቡትያ ቡትያን ሱኒል ጋቫስካርን – ካብቲ ፍጻመ ስሒብዎ፡ ‘ውልቃዊ ምኽንያታት’፡ ወይ፡ ኣብ ጉዳይ ቡትያ ብምጥቃስ፡ ኣብ ጉዳይ ቡትያ፡ ብግልጺ ‘ብዘይትድቅስን ንምቅዋምን’ን ንምቅዋም’ን ንምቅዋም ዝደልዩ ብግልጺ ክግለጹ ደንዮ። ሃገራዊ ሓለቓ ጋንታ ኩዕሶ እግሪ ህንዲ፡ ባይቹንግ ቡትያ፡ ኣብ ልዕሊ ቲቤት ዝነበረ ስክፍታታት ብምጥቃስ፡ ኣብ ናይ ህንዲ እግሪ ናይ ሽግ ሪለይ ምክፋል ኣብዩ። ሲኪመሰ ዝኾነት ቡትያ፡ በቲ ሽግ ምጉያይ ዝኣበየት ናይ መጀመርታ ኣትሌት እያ። ህንዳዊ ፊልም ኮኾብ ኣሚር ካን ኣብ ውልቃዊ ብሎጉ ከም ዝገልጾ፡ እቲ 'ኦሎምፒክ ጸወታታት ናይ ቻይና ኣይኮነን' ይብል፡ ኣብ ሽግ ሪለይ 'ምስ ሓደ ጸሎት ኣብ ልቡ ንህዝቢ ቲቤት፡ ከምኡ'ውን ... ንኹሎም ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ዝርከቡ ግዳያት ግዳይ ምጥሓስ ሰብኣዊ መሰላት ዝኾኑ ሰባት ከም ዝተሳተፉ የረጋግጽ። ወዲ ፕረዚደንት ኮንግረስ ሶንያ ጋንዲን ስዮን ስድራቤት ነህሩ-ጋንዲን ዝኾነ ራሁል ጋንዲ ነቲ ሽግ ምሓዝ እውን ኣብዩ።
translated_question: ባይቹንግ ቡትያ ካብ ቶርች ሪለይ ንምስሓብ እንታይ ምኽንያት ሂቡ?

passage: India: Due to concerns about pro-Tibet protests, the relay through New Delhi on April 17 was cut to just 2.3km (less than 1.5 miles), which was shared amongst 70 runners. It concluded at the India Gate. The event was peaceful due to the public not being allowed at the relay. A total of five intended torchbearers – Kiran Bedi, Soha Ali Khan, Sachin Tendulkar, Bhaichung Bhutia and Sunil Gavaskar – withdrew from the event, citing 'personal reasons', or, in Bhutia's case, explicitly wishing to 'stand by the people of Tibet and their struggle' and protest against the PRC 'crackdown' in Tibet. Indian national football captain, Baichung Bhutia refused to take part in the Indian leg of the torch relay, citing concerns over Tibet. Bhutia, who is Sikkimese, is the first athlete to refuse to run with the torch. Indian film star Aamir Khan states on his personal blog that the 'Olympic Games do not belong to China' and confirms taking part in the torch relay 'with a prayer in his heart for the people of Tibet, and ... for all people across the world who are victims of human rights violations'. Rahul Gandhi, son of the Congress President Sonia Gandhi and scion of the Nehru-Gandhi family, also refused to carry the torch.
question: Which athlete is noted as the first to refuse to run with the torch?

translated_passage: ህንዲ፡ ብዛዕባ ፕሮ-ቲቤት ተቓውሞታት ብሰንኪ ስክፍታታት፡ እቲ ብመንገዲ ኒውደልሂ ክሳብ ሚያዝያ 17 ዝነበረ ሪለይ ናብ 2.3 ኪ.ሜ ጥራይ (ትሕቲ 1.5 ማይልስ) ተቖሪጹ፡ እዚ ድማ ኣብ መንጎ 70 ጎየይቲ ተኻፊሉ። ኣብ ኣፍደገ ህንዲ ተዛዚሙ። ህዝቢ ኣብቲ ሪለይ ስለዘይፍቀደሉ እቲ ፍጻመ ሰላም ዝመልኦ እዩ ነይሩ። ብድምር ሓሙሽተ ተታሒዞም ዝተሓሰበ ቶርችቢኣረራት – ኪራን በዲ፡ ሶሃ ዓሊ ካን፡ ሳቺን ቴንዱልካር፡ ባይቹንግ ቡትያ ቡትያን ሱኒል ጋቫስካርን – ካብቲ ፍጻመ ስሒብዎ፡ ‘ውልቃዊ ምኽንያታት’፡ ወይ፡ ኣብ ጉዳይ ቡትያ ብምጥቃስ፡ ኣብ ጉዳይ ቡትያ፡ ብግልጺ ‘ብዘይትድቅስን ንምቅዋምን’ን ንምቅዋም’ን ንምቅዋም ዝደልዩ ብግልጺ ክግለጹ ደንዮ። ሃገራዊ ሓለቓ ጋንታ ኩዕሶ እግሪ ህንዲ፡ ባይቹንግ ቡትያ፡ ኣብ ልዕሊ ቲቤት ዝነበረ ስክፍታታት ብምጥቃስ፡ ኣብ ናይ ህንዲ እግሪ ናይ ሽግ ሪለይ ምክፋል ኣብዩ። ሲኪመሰ ዝኾነት ቡትያ፡ በቲ ሽግ ምጉያይ ዝኣበየት ናይ መጀመርታ ኣትሌት እያ። ህንዳዊ ፊልም ኮኾብ ኣሚር ካን ኣብ ውልቃዊ ብሎጉ ከም ዝገልጾ፡ እቲ 'ኦሎምፒክ ጸወታታት ናይ ቻይና ኣይኮነን' ይብል፡ ኣብ ሽግ ሪለይ 'ምስ ሓደ ጸሎት ኣብ ልቡ ንህዝቢ ቲቤት፡ ከምኡ'ውን ... ንኹሎም ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ዝርከቡ ግዳያት ግዳይ ምጥሓስ ሰብኣዊ መሰላት ዝኾኑ ሰባት ከም ዝተሳተፉ የረጋግጽ። ወዲ ፕረዚደንት ኮንግረስ ሶንያ ጋንዲን ስዮን ስድራቤት ነህሩ-ጋንዲን ዝኾነ ራሁል ጋንዲ ነቲ ሽግ ምሓዝ እውን ኣብዩ።
translated_question: ካብ ስድራቤት ነህሩ-ጋንድሂ ኣየናይ ፍሉጥ ፖለቲካዊ ስእሊ እዩ ነቲ ሽግ ምሓዝ ዝኣበየ?

passage: The event was held in Ho Chi Minh City on April 29. Some 60 torchbearers carried the torch from the downtown Opera House to the Military Zone 7 Competition Hall stadium near Tan Son Nhat International Airport along an undisclosed route. Vietnam is involved in a territorial dispute with China (and other countries) for sovereignty of the Spratly and Paracel Islands; tensions have risen recently following reports that the Chinese government had established a county-level city named Sansha in the disputed territories, resulting in anti-Chinese demonstrations in December 2007 in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City. However, to sustain its relationship with China the Vietnamese government has actively sought to head off protests during the torch relay, with Prime Minister Nguyễn Tấn Dũng warning government agencies that 'hostile forces' may try to disrupt the torch relay.
question: In which city was the event held?
translated_passage: እቲ መደብ ኣብ ከተማ ሆቺሚን ብሚያዝያ 29 ተኻይዱ።ኣስታት 60 ቶርችቢረርስ ነቲ ሽግ ካብቲ ማእከል ከተማ ኦፔራ ናብታ ኣብ ጥቓ ታን ሶን ናንት ናት ኣህጉራዊ መዓርፎ ነፈርቲ ዝርከብ ናይ ወተሃደራዊ ዞባ 7 ናይ ውድድር ኣዳራሽ ኣዳራሽ ስታድዩም ብዘይተገልጸ መንገዲ ተሰኪሞም። ቬትናም ምስ ቻይና (ንኻልኦት ሃገራትን) ኣብ ግዝኣታዊ ክርክር ንልኡላውነት ስፕራትሊን ፓራሴልን ደሴታት ትሳተፍ፤ መንግስቲ ቻይና ኣብተን ዘካትዕ ግዝኣታት ሳንሻ እትበሃል ብደረጃ ኣውራጃ እትርከብ ከተማ ከም ዘቖመ ዝገልጽ ጸብጻባት ድሕሪ ምጽብጻብ ወጥሪ ድሕሪ ምጽናሕ፡ ኣብ ታሕሳስ 2007 ኣብ ከተማ ሃኖይን ሆቺ ሚንን ጸረ ቻይና ሰልፍታት ከምዘስዓበን ተገሊጹ። ይኹን እምበር፡ ምስ ቻይና ዘለዎ ርክብ ንምቕጻል፡ መንግስቲ ቬትናም ኣብ እዋን ናይ ሽግ ሪለይ ተቓውሞታት ንምምራሕ ብንጥፈት ደልዩ፡ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ንጉይትድ ናስቴን ንትካላት መንግስታዊ ትካላት 'ተኸታተልቲ ሓይልታት' ነቲ ናይ ሽግ ሪለይ ክዘርግዎ ክፍትኑ ከም ዝኽእሉ ዘጠንቅቕ መንግስታዊ ትካላት ከጠንቅቕ ከሎ።

translated_passage: እቲ መደብ ኣብ ከተማ ሆቺሚን ብሚያዝያ 29 ተኻይዱ።ኣስታት 60 ቶርችቢረርስ ነቲ ሽግ ካብቲ ማእከል ከተማ ኦፔራ ናብታ ኣብ ጥቓ ታን ሶን ናንት ናት ኣህጉራዊ መዓርፎ ነፈርቲ ዝርከብ ናይ ወተሃደራዊ ዞባ 7 ናይ ውድድር ኣዳራሽ ኣዳራሽ ስታድዩም ብዘይተገልጸ መንገዲ ተሰኪሞም። ቬትናም ምስ ቻይና (ንኻልኦት ሃገራትን) ኣብ ግዝኣታዊ ክርክር ንልኡላውነት ስፕራትሊን ፓራሴልን ደሴታት ትሳተፍ፤ መንግስቲ ቻይና ኣብተን ዘካትዕ ግዝኣታት ሳንሻ እትበሃል ብደረጃ ኣውራጃ እትርከብ ከተማ ከም ዘቖመ ዝገልጽ ጸብጻባት ድሕሪ ምጽብጻብ ወጥሪ ድሕሪ ምጽናሕ፡ ኣብ ታሕሳስ 2007 ኣብ ከተማ ሃኖይን ሆቺ ሚንን ጸረ ቻይና ሰልፍታት ከምዘስዓበን ተገሊጹ። ይኹን እምበር፡ ምስ ቻይና ዘለዎ ርክብ ንምቕጻል፡ መንግስቲ ቬትናም ኣብ እዋን ናይ ሽግ ሪለይ ተቓውሞታት ንምምራሕ ብንጥፈት ደልዩ፡ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ንጉይትድ ናስቴን ንትካላት መንግስታዊ ትካላት 'ተኸታተልቲ ሓይልታት' ነቲ ናይ ሽግ ሪለይ ክዘርግዎ ክፍትኑ ከም ዝኽእሉ ዘጠንቅቕ መንግስታዊ ትካላት ከጠንቅቕ ከሎ።
translated_question: ካብ ኣበይ ክሳብ ኣበይ ሽግ ተሰኪሙ?
translated_mc_answer1: ካብ መዕርፎ ነፈርቲ ክሳብ ኣብቲ ከባቢ ዝርከብ መናፈሻ
translated_mc_answer2: ካብ ማእከል ከተማ ኦፔራ ክሳብ ኣብ ጥቓ ታን ሶን ንሃት ኣህጉራዊ መዓርፎ ነፈርቲ ዝርከብ ስታድዩም ውድድር ወተሃደራዊ ዞባ 7
translated_mc_answer3: ካብ ሓደ መንግስታዊ ህንጻ ክሳብ ወደብ .
translated_mc_answer4: ካብ ማእከል ከተማ ክሳብ ገማግም ባሕሪ

passage: The event was held in Ho Chi Minh City on April 29. Some 60 torchbearers carried the torch from the downtown Opera House to the Military Zone 7 Competition Hall stadium near Tan Son Nhat International Airport along an undisclosed route. Vietnam is involved in a territorial dispute with China (and other countries) for sovereignty of the Spratly and Paracel Islands; tensions have risen recently following reports that the Chinese government had established a county-level city named Sansha in the disputed territories, resulting in anti-Chinese demonstrations in December 2007 in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City. However, to sustain its relationship with China the Vietnamese government has actively sought to head off protests during the torch relay, with Prime Minister Nguyễn Tấn Dũng warning government agencies that 'hostile forces' may try to disrupt the torch relay.
question: Which territorial dispute involving Vietnam is mentioned in the passage?
mc_answer2: The dispute over the Spratly and Paracel Islands with China (and others)
mc_answer3: The dispute over the South China Sea with the Philippines
mc_answer4: The dispute over the Mekong River
translated_passage: እቲ መደብ ኣብ ከተማ ሆቺሚን ብሚያዝያ 29 ተኻይዱ።ኣስታት 60 ቶርችቢረርስ ነቲ ሽግ ካብቲ ማእከል ከተማ ኦፔራ ናብታ ኣብ ጥቓ ታን ሶን ናንት ናት ኣህጉራዊ መዓርፎ ነፈርቲ ዝርከብ ናይ ወተሃደራዊ ዞባ 7 ናይ ውድድር ኣዳራሽ ኣዳራሽ ስታድዩም ብዘይተገልጸ መንገዲ ተሰኪሞም። ቬትናም ምስ ቻይና (ንኻልኦት ሃገራትን) ኣብ ግዝኣታዊ ክርክር ንልኡላውነት ስፕራትሊን ፓራሴልን ደሴታት ትሳተፍ፤ መንግስቲ ቻይና ኣብተን ዘካትዕ ግዝኣታት ሳንሻ እትበሃል ብደረጃ ኣውራጃ እትርከብ ከተማ ከም ዘቖመ ዝገልጽ ጸብጻባት ድሕሪ ምጽብጻብ ወጥሪ ድሕሪ ምጽናሕ፡ ኣብ ታሕሳስ 2007 ኣብ ከተማ ሃኖይን ሆቺ ሚንን ጸረ ቻይና ሰልፍታት ከምዘስዓበን ተገሊጹ። ይኹን እምበር፡ ምስ ቻይና ዘለዎ ርክብ ንምቕጻል፡ መንግስቲ ቬትናም ኣብ እዋን ናይ ሽግ ሪለይ ተቓውሞታት ንምምራሕ ብንጥፈት ደልዩ፡ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ንጉይትድ ናስቴን ንትካላት መንግስታዊ ትካላት 'ተኸታተልቲ ሓይልታት' ነቲ ናይ ሽግ ሪለይ ክዘርግዎ ክፍትኑ ከም ዝኽእሉ ዘጠንቅቕ መንግስታዊ ትካላት ከጠንቅቕ ከሎ።
translated_question: ኣብቲ ክፍሊ ቬትናም ዘሳትፍ ግዝኣታዊ ክርክር ኣየናይ እዩ ተጠቒሱ?
translated_mc_answer2: ኣብ ልዕሊ ደሴታት ስፕራትሊን ፓራሴልን ምስ ቻይና (ካልኦት) ዝግበር ክርክር
translated_mc_answer3: ኣብ ልዕሊ ባሕሪ ደቡብ ቻይና ምስ ፊሊፒንስ ዘሎ ክርክር
translated_mc_answer4: ኣብ ልዕሊ ሩባ መኮንግ ዝግበር ክርክር

translated_passage: እቲ መደብ ኣብ ከተማ ሆቺሚን ብሚያዝያ 29 ተኻይዱ።ኣስታት 60 ቶርችቢረርስ ነቲ ሽግ ካብቲ ማእከል ከተማ ኦፔራ ናብታ ኣብ ጥቓ ታን ሶን ናንት ናት ኣህጉራዊ መዓርፎ ነፈርቲ ዝርከብ ናይ ወተሃደራዊ ዞባ 7 ናይ ውድድር ኣዳራሽ ኣዳራሽ ስታድዩም ብዘይተገልጸ መንገዲ ተሰኪሞም። ቬትናም ምስ ቻይና (ንኻልኦት ሃገራትን) ኣብ ግዝኣታዊ ክርክር ንልኡላውነት ስፕራትሊን ፓራሴልን ደሴታት ትሳተፍ፤ መንግስቲ ቻይና ኣብተን ዘካትዕ ግዝኣታት ሳንሻ እትበሃል ብደረጃ ኣውራጃ እትርከብ ከተማ ከም ዘቖመ ዝገልጽ ጸብጻባት ድሕሪ ምጽብጻብ ወጥሪ ድሕሪ ምጽናሕ፡ ኣብ ታሕሳስ 2007 ኣብ ከተማ ሃኖይን ሆቺ ሚንን ጸረ ቻይና ሰልፍታት ከምዘስዓበን ተገሊጹ። ይኹን እምበር፡ ምስ ቻይና ዘለዎ ርክብ ንምቕጻል፡ መንግስቲ ቬትናም ኣብ እዋን ናይ ሽግ ሪለይ ተቓውሞታት ንምምራሕ ብንጥፈት ደልዩ፡ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ንጉይትድ ናስቴን ንትካላት መንግስታዊ ትካላት 'ተኸታተልቲ ሓይልታት' ነቲ ናይ ሽግ ሪለይ ክዘርግዎ ክፍትኑ ከም ዝኽእሉ ዘጠንቅቕ መንግስታዊ ትካላት ከጠንቅቕ ከሎ።
translated_question: መንግስቲ ቻይና እንታይ ስጉምቲ ኣብ ምውሳኽ ወጥሪ ኣበርክቶ ገይሩ?

passage: The event was held in Ho Chi Minh City on April 29. Some 60 torchbearers carried the torch from the downtown Opera House to the Military Zone 7 Competition Hall stadium near Tan Son Nhat International Airport along an undisclosed route. Vietnam is involved in a territorial dispute with China (and other countries) for sovereignty of the Spratly and Paracel Islands; tensions have risen recently following reports that the Chinese government had established a county-level city named Sansha in the disputed territories, resulting in anti-Chinese demonstrations in December 2007 in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City. However, to sustain its relationship with China the Vietnamese government has actively sought to head off protests during the torch relay, with Prime Minister Nguyễn Tấn Dũng warning government agencies that 'hostile forces' may try to disrupt the torch relay.
question: What measure did the Vietnamese government take during the torch relay to sustain its relationship with China?
mc_answer2: They actively sought to head off protests
translated_passage: እቲ መደብ ኣብ ከተማ ሆቺሚን ብሚያዝያ 29 ተኻይዱ።ኣስታት 60 ቶርችቢረርስ ነቲ ሽግ ካብቲ ማእከል ከተማ ኦፔራ ናብታ ኣብ ጥቓ ታን ሶን ናንት ናት ኣህጉራዊ መዓርፎ ነፈርቲ ዝርከብ ናይ ወተሃደራዊ ዞባ 7 ናይ ውድድር ኣዳራሽ ኣዳራሽ ስታድዩም ብዘይተገልጸ መንገዲ ተሰኪሞም። ቬትናም ምስ ቻይና (ንኻልኦት ሃገራትን) ኣብ ግዝኣታዊ ክርክር ንልኡላውነት ስፕራትሊን ፓራሴልን ደሴታት ትሳተፍ፤ መንግስቲ ቻይና ኣብተን ዘካትዕ ግዝኣታት ሳንሻ እትበሃል ብደረጃ ኣውራጃ እትርከብ ከተማ ከም ዘቖመ ዝገልጽ ጸብጻባት ድሕሪ ምጽብጻብ ወጥሪ ድሕሪ ምጽናሕ፡ ኣብ ታሕሳስ 2007 ኣብ ከተማ ሃኖይን ሆቺ ሚንን ጸረ ቻይና ሰልፍታት ከምዘስዓበን ተገሊጹ። ይኹን እምበር፡ ምስ ቻይና ዘለዎ ርክብ ንምቕጻል፡ መንግስቲ ቬትናም ኣብ እዋን ናይ ሽግ ሪለይ ተቓውሞታት ንምምራሕ ብንጥፈት ደልዩ፡ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ንጉይትድ ናስቴን ንትካላት መንግስታዊ ትካላት 'ተኸታተልቲ ሓይልታት' ነቲ ናይ ሽግ ሪለይ ክዘርግዎ ክፍትኑ ከም ዝኽእሉ ዘጠንቅቕ መንግስታዊ ትካላት ከጠንቅቕ ከሎ።
translated_question: መንግስቲ ቬትናም ኣብ እዋን ቶርች ሪለይ ምስ ቻይና ዘለዎ ርክብ ንምቕጻል እንታይ ስጉምቲ እዩ ወሲዱ?

However, to sustain its relationship with China the Vietnamese government has actively sought to head off protests during the torch relay, with Prime Minister Nguyễn Tấn Dũng warning government agencies that 'hostile forces' may try to disrupt the torch relay.
