translated_question: ‘ተመዝገብቲ ሓይልታት’ ነቲ ናይ ሽግ ሪለይ ንምዝራግ ክጽዕሩ ከም ዝኽእሉ መን ኣጠንቂቑ?

passage: When people say that the genome of a sexually reproducing species has been 'sequenced', typically they are referring to a determination of the sequences of one set of autosomes and one of each type of sex chromosome, which together represent both of the possible sexes. Even in species that exist in only one sex, what is described as a 'genome sequence' may be a composite read from the chromosomes of various individuals. Colloquially, the phrase 'genetic makeup' is sometimes used to signify the genome of a particular individual or organism.[citation needed] The study of the global properties of genomes of related organisms is usually referred to as genomics, which distinguishes it from genetics which generally studies the properties of single genes or groups of genes.
question: What does it typically mean when the genome of a sexually reproducing species is said to have been 'sequenced'?
mc_answer1: It means that the entire genetic information of every individual is mapped
mc_answer2: It refers to determining the sequences of one set of autosomes and one of each type of sex chromosome
mc_answer3: It implies that only the mitochondrial DNA has been sequenced
mc_answer4: It means that only the sex chromosomes have been sequenced
translated_passage: ሰባት ጂኖም ናይ ሓደ ብጾታዊ ርክብ ዝፍጠሩ ዓይነታት 'ተኸታታሊ' ኮይኑ ክብሉ ከለዉ፡ ብተለምዶ ንመደባት ሓደ ስብስብ ኣውቶዞማትን ሓደ ካብ ነፍሲ ወከፍ ዓይነት ጾታዊ ክሮሞዞምን ምውሳን ይጠቕሱ ኣለዉ፡ እዚ ድማ ብሓባር ንኽልቲኦም ክልቲኦም ክልቲኦም ክህልዉ ዝኽእሉ ጾታታት ዝውክል እዩ። ኣብ ሓደ ጾታ ጥራይ ኣብ ዝርከቡ ዓሌታት’ውን እንተኾነ፡ እቲ ‘ጂኖም መስርዕ’ ተባሂሉ ዝግለጽ፡ ካብ ክሮሞዞማት ዝተፈላለዩ ውልቀሰባት ዝተዋሃሃደ ንባብ ክኸውን ይኽእል። ብኮሎክዋሊ፡ እቲ ‘ጀነቲካዊ መመላኽዒ’ ዝብል ሓረግ ሓደ ሓደ ግዜ ንጂኖም ናይ ሓደ ፍሉይ ውልቀ-ሰብ ወይ ፍጡር ንምምልካት ይጥቀመሉ።[ክልተ-መግለጺ የድልዮ] መጽናዕቲ ዓለማዊ ባህርያት ጂኖም ናይ ተዛመድቲ ፍጥረታት መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ጂኖሚክስ ተባሂሉ ይጽዋዕ፡ እዚ ድማ ካብቲ ብሓፈሻ ባህርያት ንጽል ጂናት ወይ ጉጅለታት ጂናት ዘጽንዕ ጀነቲክስ ዝፈልዮ እዩ።
translated_question: ብተለምዶ ጂኖም ናይ ሓደ ብጾታዊ ርክብ ዝባዛሕ ዓይነት ዓሳ 'ተኸታታሊ' ከምዝነበረ ክግለጽ ከሎ እንታይ ማለት እዩ?
translated_mc_answer1: ምሉእ ጀነቲካዊ ሓበሬታ ናይ ነፍሲ ወከፍ ውልቀ ሰብ ኣብ ካርታ ተቐሚጡ ማለት እዩ ።
translated_mc_answer2: ንሱ ድማ ንመሳክርቲ ናይ ሓደ ስብስብ ኣውቶዞማትን ሓደ ካብ ነፍሲ ወከፍ ዓይነት ጾታዊ ክሮሞዞምን ምውሳን የመልክት ።
translated_mc_answer3: እቲ ናይ ማይቶኮንድርያል ዲኤንኤ ጥራይ ከም ዝተኸታተለ ዘመልክት ምዃኑ ዘመልክት ’ ዩ።
translated_mc_answer4: ናይ ጾታዊ ርክብ ክሮሞዞማት ጥራይ እዮም ተኸታቲሎም .

translated_question: ኣብ ሓደ ጾታ ጥራይ ኣብ ዝርከቡ ዓሌታት፡ ‘ጂኖም መስርዕ’ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ እንታይ ይውክል?

Colloquially, the phrase 'genetic makeup' is sometimes used to signify the genome of a particular individual or organism.[citation needed] The study of the global properties of genomes of related organisms is usually referred to as genomics, which distinguishes it from genetics which generally studies the properties of single genes or groups of genes.

translated_passage: ሰባት ጂኖም ናይ ሓደ ብጾታዊ ርክብ ዝፍጠሩ ዓይነታት 'ተኸታታሊ' ኮይኑ ክብሉ ከለዉ፡ ብተለምዶ ንመደባት ሓደ ስብስብ ኣውቶዞማትን ሓደ ካብ ነፍሲ ወከፍ ዓይነት ጾታዊ ክሮሞዞምን ምውሳን ይጠቕሱ ኣለዉ፡ እዚ ድማ ብሓባር ንኽልቲኦም ክልቲኦም ክልቲኦም ክህልዉ ዝኽእሉ ጾታታት ዝውክል እዩ። ኣብ ሓደ ጾታ ጥራይ ኣብ ዝርከቡ ዓሌታት’ውን እንተኾነ፡ እቲ ‘ጂኖም መስርዕ’ ተባሂሉ ዝግለጽ፡ ካብ ክሮሞዞማት ዝተፈላለዩ ውልቀሰባት ዝተዋሃሃደ ንባብ ክኸውን ይኽእል። ብኮሎክዋሊ፡ እቲ ‘ጀነቲካዊ መመላኽዒ’ ዝብል ሓረግ ሓደ ሓደ ግዜ ንጂኖም ናይ ሓደ ፍሉይ ውልቀ-ሰብ ወይ ፍጡር ንምምልካት ይጥቀመሉ።[ክልተ-መግለጺ የድልዮ] መጽናዕቲ ዓለማዊ ባህርያት ጂኖም ናይ ተዛመድቲ ፍጥረታት መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ጂኖሚክስ ተባሂሉ ይጽዋዕ፡ እዚ ድማ ካብቲ ብሓፈሻ ባህርያት ንጽል ጂናት ወይ ጉጅለታት ጂናት ዘጽንዕ ጀነቲክስ ዝፈልዮ እዩ።
translated_question: ሓደ ሓደ ግዜ ንጂኖም ናይ ሓደ ፍሉይ ውልቀሰብ ንምምልካት እንታይ ዓይነት ናይ ኮሎክያል ሓረግ ይጥቀመሉ?

passage: When people say that the genome of a sexually reproducing species has been 'sequenced', typically they are referring to a determination of the sequences of one set of autosomes and one of each type of sex chromosome, which together represent both of the possible sexes. Even in species that exist in only one sex, what is described as a 'genome sequence' may be a composite read from the chromosomes of various individuals. Colloquially, the phrase 'genetic makeup' is sometimes used to signify the genome of a particular individual or organism.[citation needed] The study of the global properties of genomes of related organisms is usually referred to as genomics, which distinguishes it from genetics which generally studies the properties of single genes or groups of genes.
question: What does the study of 'genomics' focus on according to the passage?
mc_answer2: The global properties of genomes of related organisms
mc_answer4: The inheritance patterns of specific genes

translated_question: መጽናዕቲ ‘ጂኖሚክስ’ ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ እንታይ የድህብ?

question: How does genomics differ from genetics as described in the passage?
mc_answer1: Genomics examines whole genomes, while genetics studies single genes or groups of genes

mc_answer3: The sum of all genetic mutations
mc_answer4: Only the inherited traits from the mother
translated_passage: ሰባት ጂኖም ናይ ሓደ ብጾታዊ ርክብ ዝፍጠሩ ዓይነታት 'ተኸታታሊ' ኮይኑ ክብሉ ከለዉ፡ ብተለምዶ ንመደባት ሓደ ስብስብ ኣውቶዞማትን ሓደ ካብ ነፍሲ ወከፍ ዓይነት ጾታዊ ክሮሞዞምን ምውሳን ይጠቕሱ ኣለዉ፡ እዚ ድማ ብሓባር ንኽልቲኦም ክልቲኦም ክልቲኦም ክህልዉ ዝኽእሉ ጾታታት ዝውክል እዩ። ኣብ ሓደ ጾታ ጥራይ ኣብ ዝርከቡ ዓሌታት’ውን እንተኾነ፡ እቲ ‘ጂኖም መስርዕ’ ተባሂሉ ዝግለጽ፡ ካብ ክሮሞዞማት ዝተፈላለዩ ውልቀሰባት ዝተዋሃሃደ ንባብ ክኸውን ይኽእል። ብኮሎክዋሊ፡ እቲ ‘ጀነቲካዊ መመላኽዒ’ ዝብል ሓረግ ሓደ ሓደ ግዜ ንጂኖም ናይ ሓደ ፍሉይ ውልቀ-ሰብ ወይ ፍጡር ንምምልካት ይጥቀመሉ።[ክልተ-መግለጺ የድልዮ] መጽናዕቲ ዓለማዊ ባህርያት ጂኖም ናይ ተዛመድቲ ፍጥረታት መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ጂኖሚክስ ተባሂሉ ይጽዋዕ፡ እዚ ድማ ካብቲ ብሓፈሻ ባህርያት ንጽል ጂናት ወይ ጉጅለታት ጂናት ዘጽንዕ ጀነቲክስ ዝፈልዮ እዩ።
translated_question: ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ፡ እቲ ናይ ዕግርግር ሓረግ ‘ጀነቲካዊ መመላኽዒ’ እንታይ ዘመልክት እዩ?
translated_mc_answer1: ሓፈሻዊ ጀነቲካዊ ውህደት ናይ ሓደ ዓይነት እንስሳ .
translated_mc_answer2: ጂኖም ናይ ሓደ ፍሉይ ውልቀ ሰብ ወይ ፍጡር .
translated_mc_answer4: ካብ ኣደ ዝውረስ ባህርያት ጥራይ እዩ .

passage: The coverage of the events by the media came under scrutiny during the relay. Chinese media coverage of the torch relay has been distinct in a number of ways from coverage elsewhere. Western reporters in Beijing have described Chinese media coverage as partial and censored (for example when Chinese media did not broadcast Reporters Without Borders' disruption of the torch lighting ceremony), whereas Chinese netizens have in turn accused Western media coverage of being biased. The French newspaper Libération was criticised by the Chinese State press agency Xinhua for its allegedly biased reporting; Xinhua suggested that Libération needed 'a stinging slap in the face' for having 'insulted the Olympic flame' and 'supported a handful of saboteurs'.
question: How did Western reporters in Beijing describe Chinese media coverage of the torch relay?
translated_passage: ሽፋን ናይቲ ብማዕከናት ዜና ዝካየዱ ፍጻመታት ኣብ እዋን ሪለይ ኣብ ትሕቲ ምጽራይ ኣትዩ። ቻይናዊ ማዕከናት ዜና ሽፋናት ቶርች ሪለይ ብዝተፈላለየ መንገዲ ካብ ሽፋን ኣብ ካልእ ቦታታት ብዝተፈላለዩ መንገድታት ፍሉይ ኮይኑ ኣሎ። ኣብ ቤጂንግ ዝርከቡ ምዕራባውያን ሪፖርተራት፡ ሽፋን ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይና ከፊላዊን ሳንሱርን ክብሉ ገሊጾም ኣለዉ (ንኣብነት፡ ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይናውያን ንሪፖርተራት ብዘይ ዶባት ብዛዕባ ስነ-ስርዓት መብራህቲ ሽግ ምዝንባዕ ከየፍሕሱ እንከለዉ)፡ ቻይናውያን ኔትዘርስ ግን ብግዲኦም ሽፋን ማዕከናት ዜና ወገናዊ ምዃኑ ከሲሶም ኣለዉ። እታ ናይ ፈረንሳ ጋዜጣ ሊበሬሽን ብኤጀንሲ ፕረስ ግዝኣት ቻይና ሺንሁዋ ብሰንኪ ወገናዊ ጸብጻብ ብዝበሎ ነቐፌታ፤ ሺንሁዋ፡ 'ንሃልሃልታ ኦሎምፒክ ኣጽኒዑ'፡ 'ንኣጻብዕቲ ዝቑጸሩ ሳቦተርስ ዝደገፈ'፡ 'ኣብ ገጹ ዝንቀሳቐሱ ምጭብባጥ' ከምዘድሊ ሓሳብ ኣቕረበ።
translated_question: ኣብ ቤጂንግ ዝርከቡ ምዕራባውያን ሪፖርተራት፡ ንሽፋን ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይና ናይ ቶርች ሪለይ ብኸመይ ገሊጾም?

passage: The coverage of the events by the media came under scrutiny during the relay. Chinese media coverage of the torch relay has been distinct in a number of ways from coverage elsewhere. Western reporters in Beijing have described Chinese media coverage as partial and censored (for example when Chinese media did not broadcast Reporters Without Borders' disruption of the torch lighting ceremony), whereas Chinese netizens have in turn accused Western media coverage of being biased. The French newspaper Libération was criticised by the Chinese State press agency Xinhua for its allegedly biased reporting; Xinhua suggested that Libération needed 'a stinging slap in the face' for having 'insulted the Olympic flame' and 'supported a handful of saboteurs'.
question: Which event did Chinese media reportedly not broadcast as mentioned in the passage?
mc_answer1: The torch lighting ceremony by the IOC
mc_answer2: Reporters Without Borders' disruption of the torch lighting ceremony
mc_answer3: The Olympic torch relay in Beijing
mc_answer4: A protest against the torch relay
translated_passage: ሽፋን ናይቲ ብማዕከናት ዜና ዝካየዱ ፍጻመታት ኣብ እዋን ሪለይ ኣብ ትሕቲ ምጽራይ ኣትዩ። ቻይናዊ ማዕከናት ዜና ሽፋናት ቶርች ሪለይ ብዝተፈላለየ መንገዲ ካብ ሽፋን ኣብ ካልእ ቦታታት ብዝተፈላለዩ መንገድታት ፍሉይ ኮይኑ ኣሎ። ኣብ ቤጂንግ ዝርከቡ ምዕራባውያን ሪፖርተራት፡ ሽፋን ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይና ከፊላዊን ሳንሱርን ክብሉ ገሊጾም ኣለዉ (ንኣብነት፡ ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይናውያን ንሪፖርተራት ብዘይ ዶባት ብዛዕባ ስነ-ስርዓት መብራህቲ ሽግ ምዝንባዕ ከየፍሕሱ እንከለዉ)፡ ቻይናውያን ኔትዘርስ ግን ብግዲኦም ሽፋን ማዕከናት ዜና ወገናዊ ምዃኑ ከሲሶም ኣለዉ። እታ ናይ ፈረንሳ ጋዜጣ ሊበሬሽን ብኤጀንሲ ፕረስ ግዝኣት ቻይና ሺንሁዋ ብሰንኪ ወገናዊ ጸብጻብ ብዝበሎ ነቐፌታ፤ ሺንሁዋ፡ 'ንሃልሃልታ ኦሎምፒክ ኣጽኒዑ'፡ 'ንኣጻብዕቲ ዝቑጸሩ ሳቦተርስ ዝደገፈ'፡ 'ኣብ ገጹ ዝንቀሳቐሱ ምጭብባጥ' ከምዘድሊ ሓሳብ ኣቕረበ።
translated_question: ከምቲ ኣብቲ ክፍሊ ዝተጠቕሰ ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይና ኣየኖት ፍጻመ ከምዘይተፈነዋ ይንገር?
translated_mc_answer2: ዶባት ብዘይ ምዝንባዕ ስነ ስርዓት መብራህቲ ሽግ ሪፖርተራት
translated_mc_answer3: ኣብ ቤጂንግ ዝርከብ ናይ ኦሎምፒክ ሽግ ሪለይ

mc_answer1: That it was too supportive of China
translated_passage: ሽፋን ናይቲ ብማዕከናት ዜና ዝካየዱ ፍጻመታት ኣብ እዋን ሪለይ ኣብ ትሕቲ ምጽራይ ኣትዩ። ቻይናዊ ማዕከናት ዜና ሽፋናት ቶርች ሪለይ ብዝተፈላለየ መንገዲ ካብ ሽፋን ኣብ ካልእ ቦታታት ብዝተፈላለዩ መንገድታት ፍሉይ ኮይኑ ኣሎ። ኣብ ቤጂንግ ዝርከቡ ምዕራባውያን ሪፖርተራት፡ ሽፋን ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይና ከፊላዊን ሳንሱርን ክብሉ ገሊጾም ኣለዉ (ንኣብነት፡ ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይናውያን ንሪፖርተራት ብዘይ ዶባት ብዛዕባ ስነ-ስርዓት መብራህቲ ሽግ ምዝንባዕ ከየፍሕሱ እንከለዉ)፡ ቻይናውያን ኔትዘርስ ግን ብግዲኦም ሽፋን ማዕከናት ዜና ወገናዊ ምዃኑ ከሲሶም ኣለዉ። እታ ናይ ፈረንሳ ጋዜጣ ሊበሬሽን ብኤጀንሲ ፕረስ ግዝኣት ቻይና ሺንሁዋ ብሰንኪ ወገናዊ ጸብጻብ ብዝበሎ ነቐፌታ፤ ሺንሁዋ፡ 'ንሃልሃልታ ኦሎምፒክ ኣጽኒዑ'፡ 'ንኣጻብዕቲ ዝቑጸሩ ሳቦተርስ ዝደገፈ'፡ 'ኣብ ገጹ ዝንቀሳቐሱ ምጭብባጥ' ከምዘድሊ ሓሳብ ኣቕረበ።

translated_passage: ሽፋን ናይቲ ብማዕከናት ዜና ዝካየዱ ፍጻመታት ኣብ እዋን ሪለይ ኣብ ትሕቲ ምጽራይ ኣትዩ። ቻይናዊ ማዕከናት ዜና ሽፋናት ቶርች ሪለይ ብዝተፈላለየ መንገዲ ካብ ሽፋን ኣብ ካልእ ቦታታት ብዝተፈላለዩ መንገድታት ፍሉይ ኮይኑ ኣሎ። ኣብ ቤጂንግ ዝርከቡ ምዕራባውያን ሪፖርተራት፡ ሽፋን ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይና ከፊላዊን ሳንሱርን ክብሉ ገሊጾም ኣለዉ (ንኣብነት፡ ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይናውያን ንሪፖርተራት ብዘይ ዶባት ብዛዕባ ስነ-ስርዓት መብራህቲ ሽግ ምዝንባዕ ከየፍሕሱ እንከለዉ)፡ ቻይናውያን ኔትዘርስ ግን ብግዲኦም ሽፋን ማዕከናት ዜና ወገናዊ ምዃኑ ከሲሶም ኣለዉ። እታ ናይ ፈረንሳ ጋዜጣ ሊበሬሽን ብኤጀንሲ ፕረስ ግዝኣት ቻይና ሺንሁዋ ብሰንኪ ወገናዊ ጸብጻብ ብዝበሎ ነቐፌታ፤ ሺንሁዋ፡ 'ንሃልሃልታ ኦሎምፒክ ኣጽኒዑ'፡ 'ንኣጻብዕቲ ዝቑጸሩ ሳቦተርስ ዝደገፈ'፡ 'ኣብ ገጹ ዝንቀሳቐሱ ምጭብባጥ' ከምዘድሊ ሓሳብ ኣቕረበ።
translated_question: እታ ብዚንሁዋ ዝመጸት ጋዜጣ ኣየናይ ፈረንሳ እያ ብሰንኪ ጸብጻቡ?

passage: The coverage of the events by the media came under scrutiny during the relay. Chinese media coverage of the torch relay has been distinct in a number of ways from coverage elsewhere. Western reporters in Beijing have described Chinese media coverage as partial and censored (for example when Chinese media did not broadcast Reporters Without Borders' disruption of the torch lighting ceremony), whereas Chinese netizens have in turn accused Western media coverage of being biased. The French newspaper Libération was criticised by the Chinese State press agency Xinhua for its allegedly biased reporting; Xinhua suggested that Libération needed 'a stinging slap in the face' for having 'insulted the Olympic flame' and 'supported a handful of saboteurs'.
question: What did Xinhua suggest Libération deserved for its allegedly biased reporting?
mc_answer2: A stinging slap in the face
translated_passage: ሽፋን ናይቲ ብማዕከናት ዜና ዝካየዱ ፍጻመታት ኣብ እዋን ሪለይ ኣብ ትሕቲ ምጽራይ ኣትዩ። ቻይናዊ ማዕከናት ዜና ሽፋናት ቶርች ሪለይ ብዝተፈላለየ መንገዲ ካብ ሽፋን ኣብ ካልእ ቦታታት ብዝተፈላለዩ መንገድታት ፍሉይ ኮይኑ ኣሎ። ኣብ ቤጂንግ ዝርከቡ ምዕራባውያን ሪፖርተራት፡ ሽፋን ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይና ከፊላዊን ሳንሱርን ክብሉ ገሊጾም ኣለዉ (ንኣብነት፡ ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይናውያን ንሪፖርተራት ብዘይ ዶባት ብዛዕባ ስነ-ስርዓት መብራህቲ ሽግ ምዝንባዕ ከየፍሕሱ እንከለዉ)፡ ቻይናውያን ኔትዘርስ ግን ብግዲኦም ሽፋን ማዕከናት ዜና ወገናዊ ምዃኑ ከሲሶም ኣለዉ። እታ ናይ ፈረንሳ ጋዜጣ ሊበሬሽን ብኤጀንሲ ፕረስ ግዝኣት ቻይና ሺንሁዋ ብሰንኪ ወገናዊ ጸብጻብ ብዝበሎ ነቐፌታ፤ ሺንሁዋ፡ 'ንሃልሃልታ ኦሎምፒክ ኣጽኒዑ'፡ 'ንኣጻብዕቲ ዝቑጸሩ ሳቦተርስ ዝደገፈ'፡ 'ኣብ ገጹ ዝንቀሳቐሱ ምጭብባጥ' ከምዘድሊ ሓሳብ ኣቕረበ።
translated_question: ሺንሁዋ ብሰንኪ ወገናዊ ጸብጻብ ዝግብኣ ሊበሬሽን እንታይ ይግብኣ እዩ ዝብል ሓሳብ ነይርዎ?

passage: The coverage of the events by the media came under scrutiny during the relay. Chinese media coverage of the torch relay has been distinct in a number of ways from coverage elsewhere. Western reporters in Beijing have described Chinese media coverage as partial and censored (for example when Chinese media did not broadcast Reporters Without Borders' disruption of the torch lighting ceremony), whereas Chinese netizens have in turn accused Western media coverage of being biased. The French newspaper Libération was criticised by the Chinese State press agency Xinhua for its allegedly biased reporting; Xinhua suggested that Libération needed 'a stinging slap in the face' for having 'insulted the Olympic flame' and 'supported a handful of saboteurs'.
question: According to Xinhua, what two actions did Libération allegedly take to warrant such criticism?
mc_answer1: They ignored the protests and downplayed the Olympic spirit
mc_answer2: They insulted the Olympic flame and supported a handful of saboteurs
mc_answer3: They misreported the torch relay route and misquoted officials
mc_answer4: They exaggerated the number of protesters and incited violence
translated_passage: ሽፋን ናይቲ ብማዕከናት ዜና ዝካየዱ ፍጻመታት ኣብ እዋን ሪለይ ኣብ ትሕቲ ምጽራይ ኣትዩ። ቻይናዊ ማዕከናት ዜና ሽፋናት ቶርች ሪለይ ብዝተፈላለየ መንገዲ ካብ ሽፋን ኣብ ካልእ ቦታታት ብዝተፈላለዩ መንገድታት ፍሉይ ኮይኑ ኣሎ። ኣብ ቤጂንግ ዝርከቡ ምዕራባውያን ሪፖርተራት፡ ሽፋን ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይና ከፊላዊን ሳንሱርን ክብሉ ገሊጾም ኣለዉ (ንኣብነት፡ ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይናውያን ንሪፖርተራት ብዘይ ዶባት ብዛዕባ ስነ-ስርዓት መብራህቲ ሽግ ምዝንባዕ ከየፍሕሱ እንከለዉ)፡ ቻይናውያን ኔትዘርስ ግን ብግዲኦም ሽፋን ማዕከናት ዜና ወገናዊ ምዃኑ ከሲሶም ኣለዉ። እታ ናይ ፈረንሳ ጋዜጣ ሊበሬሽን ብኤጀንሲ ፕረስ ግዝኣት ቻይና ሺንሁዋ ብሰንኪ ወገናዊ ጸብጻብ ብዝበሎ ነቐፌታ፤ ሺንሁዋ፡ 'ንሃልሃልታ ኦሎምፒክ ኣጽኒዑ'፡ 'ንኣጻብዕቲ ዝቑጸሩ ሳቦተርስ ዝደገፈ'፡ 'ኣብ ገጹ ዝንቀሳቐሱ ምጭብባጥ' ከምዘድሊ ሓሳብ ኣቕረበ።
translated_question: ሺንዋ ከም ዝበለቶ፡ ሊበሬሽን ከምዚ ዓይነት ነቐፌታ ንምርግጋጽ እንታይ ክልተ ስጉምቲ እዩ ተባሂሉ?
translated_mc_answer1: ነቲ ተቓውሞ ሸለል ኢሎም ንመንፈስ ኦሎምፒክ ኣቃሊሎም ።
translated_mc_answer2: ነቲ ናይ ኦሎምፒክ ሃልሃልታ ጸሪፎም ንኣጻብዕ ዝቑጸሩ ሳቦተርስ ደጊፎም
translated_mc_answer3: ንመስመር ቶርች ሪለይ ብጌጋ ሪፖርት ገይሮም ብጌጋ ተጠቒሶም ዘለዉ ሰበስልጣን
translated_mc_answer4: ቁጽሪ ሰልፈኛታት ኣጋዲዶምዎን ዓመጽ ዝለዓዓሉን ’ ዮም።

passage: The coverage of the events by the media came under scrutiny during the relay. Chinese media coverage of the torch relay has been distinct in a number of ways from coverage elsewhere. Western reporters in Beijing have described Chinese media coverage as partial and censored (for example when Chinese media did not broadcast Reporters Without Borders' disruption of the torch lighting ceremony), whereas Chinese netizens have in turn accused Western media coverage of being biased. The French newspaper Libération was criticised by the Chinese State press agency Xinhua for its allegedly biased reporting; Xinhua suggested that Libération needed 'a stinging slap in the face' for having 'insulted the Olympic flame' and 'supported a handful of saboteurs'.
question: What contrasting viewpoints on media coverage are presented in the passage?
mc_answer1: Chinese media is unbiased while Western media is highly critical
mc_answer2: Western reporters describe Chinese media as partial and censored, while Chinese netizens accuse Western media of bias
mc_answer3: Both Western and Chinese media are praised for their balanced reporting
mc_answer4: Western media is seen as impartial, and Chinese netizens agree with their coverage
translated_passage: ሽፋን ናይቲ ብማዕከናት ዜና ዝካየዱ ፍጻመታት ኣብ እዋን ሪለይ ኣብ ትሕቲ ምጽራይ ኣትዩ። ቻይናዊ ማዕከናት ዜና ሽፋናት ቶርች ሪለይ ብዝተፈላለየ መንገዲ ካብ ሽፋን ኣብ ካልእ ቦታታት ብዝተፈላለዩ መንገድታት ፍሉይ ኮይኑ ኣሎ። ኣብ ቤጂንግ ዝርከቡ ምዕራባውያን ሪፖርተራት፡ ሽፋን ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይና ከፊላዊን ሳንሱርን ክብሉ ገሊጾም ኣለዉ (ንኣብነት፡ ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይናውያን ንሪፖርተራት ብዘይ ዶባት ብዛዕባ ስነ-ስርዓት መብራህቲ ሽግ ምዝንባዕ ከየፍሕሱ እንከለዉ)፡ ቻይናውያን ኔትዘርስ ግን ብግዲኦም ሽፋን ማዕከናት ዜና ወገናዊ ምዃኑ ከሲሶም ኣለዉ። እታ ናይ ፈረንሳ ጋዜጣ ሊበሬሽን ብኤጀንሲ ፕረስ ግዝኣት ቻይና ሺንሁዋ ብሰንኪ ወገናዊ ጸብጻብ ብዝበሎ ነቐፌታ፤ ሺንሁዋ፡ 'ንሃልሃልታ ኦሎምፒክ ኣጽኒዑ'፡ 'ንኣጻብዕቲ ዝቑጸሩ ሳቦተርስ ዝደገፈ'፡ 'ኣብ ገጹ ዝንቀሳቐሱ ምጭብባጥ' ከምዘድሊ ሓሳብ ኣቕረበ።
translated_question: ኣብቲ ክፍሊ ኣብ ሽፋን ሚድያ እንታይ ዓይነት ንጽጽራዊ ኣረኣእያታት ይቐርብ?
translated_mc_answer1: መራኸቢ ብዙሃን ቻይናውያን ወገናዊ ዘይኮኑ ክኾኑ ከለዉ ምዕራባውያን ሚድያታት ድማ ልዑል ወሳኒ ’ ዩ።
translated_mc_answer2: ምዕራባውያን ሪፖርተራት ንማዕከናት ዜና ቻይና ከፊላውን ሳንሱርን ክገልጹ እንከለዉ፡ ቻይናውያን ኔትዘርስ ብማዕከናት ዜና ምዕራባውያን ብኢንጥፍኣት ይኸስስዎ ።
translated_mc_answer3: ምዕራባውያንን ቻይናውያንን ማዕከናት ዜና ብዝተመጣጠነ ጸብጻቦም ንኢዶም ።
translated_mc_answer4: ምዕራባውያን መራኸቢ ብዙሃን ከም ዘይሻራውያን ኮይኖም ይረኣዩ፣ ቻይናውያን ኔትዘርስ ድማ ምስ ሽፋኖም ይሰማምዑ

passage: The coverage of the events by the media came under scrutiny during the relay. Chinese media coverage of the torch relay has been distinct in a number of ways from coverage elsewhere. Western reporters in Beijing have described Chinese media coverage as partial and censored (for example when Chinese media did not broadcast Reporters Without Borders' disruption of the torch lighting ceremony), whereas Chinese netizens have in turn accused Western media coverage of being biased. question: Which example from the passage illustrates an instance of censorship by Chinese media?
mc_answer1: Not broadcasting the torch relay in full
mc_answer3: Not broadcasting Reporters Without Borders' disruption of the torch lighting ceremony
mc_answer4: Limiting coverage to only positive events
translated_passage: ሽፋን ናይቲ ብማዕከናት ዜና ዝካየዱ ፍጻመታት ኣብ እዋን ሪለይ ኣብ ትሕቲ ምጽራይ ኣትዩ። ቻይናዊ ማዕከናት ዜና ሽፋናት ቶርች ሪለይ ብዝተፈላለየ መንገዲ ካብ ሽፋን ኣብ ካልእ ቦታታት ብዝተፈላለዩ መንገድታት ፍሉይ ኮይኑ ኣሎ። ኣብ ቤጂንግ ዝርከቡ ምዕራባውያን ሪፖርተራት፡ ሽፋን ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይና ከፊላዊን ሳንሱርን ክብሉ ገሊጾም ኣለዉ (ንኣብነት፡ ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይናውያን ንሪፖርተራት ብዘይ ዶባት ብዛዕባ ስነ-ስርዓት መብራህቲ ሽግ ምዝንባዕ ከየፍሕሱ እንከለዉ)፡ ቻይናውያን ኔትዘርስ ግን ብግዲኦም ሽፋን ማዕከናት ዜና ወገናዊ ምዃኑ ከሲሶም ኣለዉ። እታ ናይ ፈረንሳ ጋዜጣ ሊበሬሽን ብኤጀንሲ ፕረስ ግዝኣት ቻይና ሺንሁዋ ብሰንኪ ወገናዊ ጸብጻብ ብዝበሎ ነቐፌታ፤ ሺንሁዋ፡ 'ንሃልሃልታ ኦሎምፒክ ኣጽኒዑ'፡ 'ንኣጻብዕቲ ዝቑጸሩ ሳቦተርስ ዝደገፈ'፡ 'ኣብ ገጹ ዝንቀሳቐሱ ምጭብባጥ' ከምዘድሊ ሓሳብ ኣቕረበ።
translated_question: ካብቲ ክፍሊ ኣየናይ ኣብነት እዩ ንሓደ ኣብነት ሳንሱር ብማዕከናት ዜና ቻይና ዘርኢ?
translated_mc_answer1: ነቲ ናይ ሽግ ሪለይ ብሙሉእ ዘይምፍናው .
translated_mc_answer3: ዶብ ብዘይ ምዝንባዕ ስነ ስርዓት መብራህቲ ሽግ ንጋዜጠኛታት ዘይምፍናው
translated_mc_answer4: ሽፋን ኣብ ኣወንታዊ ፍጻመታት ጥራይ ምድራት

passage: The Beijing Olympic Organizing Committee sent out a team of 30 unarmed attendants selected from the People's Armed Police to escort the flame throughout its journey. According to Asian Times, sworn in as the 'Beijing Olympic Games Sacred Flame Protection Unit' during a ceremony in August 2007, their main job is to keep the Olympic flame alight throughout the journey and to assist in transferring the flame between the torches, the lanterns and the cauldrons. They wear matching blue tracksuits and are intended to accompany the torch every step of the way. One of the torch attendants, dubbed 'Second Right Brother,' has developed a significant online fan-base, particularly among China's female netizens.
question: How many unarmed attendants did the Beijing Olympic Organizing Committee send out to escort the flame?
translated_passage: ኣሰናዳኢት ኮሚተ ኦሎምፒክ ቤጂንግ፡ ኣብ ምሉእ ጉዕዞኡ ነቲ ሃልሃልታ ንምዕጃብ ካብ ዕጡቓት ፖሊስ ህዝቢ ዝተመርጸ 30 ዘይተዓጥቁ ኣገልገልቲ ዝሓቖፈት ጋንታ ሰዲዳ። ብመሰረት ታይምስ ታይምስ፡ ኣብ ነሓሰ 2007 ኣብ ዝተኻየደ ስነ-ስርዓት፡ 'ቤጂንግ ኦሎምፒክ ቅድስቲ ሃልሃልታ ኣሃዱ' ዝብል 'ቤጂንግ ኦሎምፒክ ቅድስቲ ሃልሃልታ ዝከላኸል ኣሃዱ' ኢሉ ከምዝመሓለወ፡ እቲ ቀንዲ ስራሖም ኣብ ምሉእ እቲ ጉዕዞ ሃልሃልታ ኦሎምፒክ ክመላለስን ኣብ መንጎ ሽግታት፡ ፋኑሳትን ካውልድሮንን ዘሎ ሃልሃልታ ኣብ ምትሕልላፍ ምሕጋዝን እዩ። ምስ ዝመሳሰሉ ሰማያዊ ትራክሱት ይኽደኑን ኣብ ነፍሲ ወከፍ ስጉምቲ ነቲ ሽግ ንምዕጃብ ዝዓለሙን እዮም። ሓደ ካብቶም ኣገልገልቲ ሽግ፡ ‘ካልኣይ ቅኑዕ ሓው’ ተባሂሉ ዝጽዋዕ፡ ብፍላይ ኣብ መንጎ ደቂ ኣንስትዮ ኔትዘርስ ቻይና፡ ርኡይ ናይ ኦንላይን ደገፍቲ-መሰረት ኣማዕቢሉ።
translated_question: እቲ ሃልሃልታ ንምዕፋን ክንደይ ዘይተዓጥቁ ኣገልገልቲ ኦሎምፒክ ኣዳላዊት ኮሚተ ተላኢኾም?

passage: The Beijing Olympic Organizing Committee sent out a team of 30 unarmed attendants selected from the People's Armed Police to escort the flame throughout its journey. According to Asian Times, sworn in as the 'Beijing Olympic Games Sacred Flame Protection Unit' during a ceremony in August 2007, their main job is to keep the Olympic flame alight throughout the journey and to assist in transferring the flame between the torches, the lanterns and the cauldrons. They wear matching blue tracksuits and are intended to accompany the torch every step of the way. One of the torch attendants, dubbed 'Second Right Brother,' has developed a significant online fan-base, particularly among China's female netizens.
question: From which organization were the attendants selected?

translated_question: እቶም ኣገልገልቲ ካብ ኣየናይ ትካል እዮም ተመሪጾም?

According to Asian Times, sworn in as the 'Beijing Olympic Games Sacred Flame Protection Unit' during a ceremony in August 2007, their main job is to keep the Olympic flame alight throughout the journey and to assist in transferring the flame between the torches, the lanterns and the cauldrons. translated_passage: ኣሰናዳኢት ኮሚተ ኦሎምፒክ ቤጂንግ፡ ኣብ ምሉእ ጉዕዞኡ ነቲ ሃልሃልታ ንምዕጃብ ካብ ዕጡቓት ፖሊስ ህዝቢ ዝተመርጸ 30 ዘይተዓጥቁ ኣገልገልቲ ዝሓቖፈት ጋንታ ሰዲዳ። ብመሰረት ታይምስ ታይምስ፡ ኣብ ነሓሰ 2007 ኣብ ዝተኻየደ ስነ-ስርዓት፡ 'ቤጂንግ ኦሎምፒክ ቅድስቲ ሃልሃልታ ኣሃዱ' ዝብል 'ቤጂንግ ኦሎምፒክ ቅድስቲ ሃልሃልታ ዝከላኸል ኣሃዱ' ኢሉ ከምዝመሓለወ፡ እቲ ቀንዲ ስራሖም ኣብ ምሉእ እቲ ጉዕዞ ሃልሃልታ ኦሎምፒክ ክመላለስን ኣብ መንጎ ሽግታት፡ ፋኑሳትን ካውልድሮንን ዘሎ ሃልሃልታ ኣብ ምትሕልላፍ ምሕጋዝን እዩ። ምስ ዝመሳሰሉ ሰማያዊ ትራክሱት ይኽደኑን ኣብ ነፍሲ ወከፍ ስጉምቲ ነቲ ሽግ ንምዕጃብ ዝዓለሙን እዮም። ሓደ ካብቶም ኣገልገልቲ ሽግ፡ ‘ካልኣይ ቅኑዕ ሓው’ ተባሂሉ ዝጽዋዕ፡ ብፍላይ ኣብ መንጎ ደቂ ኣንስትዮ ኔትዘርስ ቻይና፡ ርኡይ ናይ ኦንላይን ደገፍቲ-መሰረት ኣማዕቢሉ።
translated_question: ቀንዲ ሓላፍነት ናይዞም ኣገልገልቲ እንታይ እዩ?
translated_mc_answer1: ሃልሃልታ ኦሎምፒክ ንኽጸንሕን ነቲ ሃልሃልታ ኣብ ምትሕልላፍ ክሕግዝን ንምርግጋጽ .
translated_mc_answer2: ኣንጻር ክኾኑ ዝኽእሉ ሰባት ውሕስነት ንምሃብ

passage: The Beijing Olympic Organizing Committee sent out a team of 30 unarmed attendants selected from the People's Armed Police to escort the flame throughout its journey. According to Asian Times, sworn in as the 'Beijing Olympic Games Sacred Flame Protection Unit' during a ceremony in August 2007, their main job is to keep the Olympic flame alight throughout the journey and to assist in transferring the flame between the torches, the lanterns and the cauldrons. They wear matching blue tracksuits and are intended to accompany the torch every step of the way. One of the torch attendants, dubbed 'Second Right Brother,' has developed a significant online fan-base, particularly among China's female netizens.
question: What color tracksuits do the attendants wear?
translated_passage: ኣሰናዳኢት ኮሚተ ኦሎምፒክ ቤጂንግ፡ ኣብ ምሉእ ጉዕዞኡ ነቲ ሃልሃልታ ንምዕጃብ ካብ ዕጡቓት ፖሊስ ህዝቢ ዝተመርጸ 30 ዘይተዓጥቁ ኣገልገልቲ ዝሓቖፈት ጋንታ ሰዲዳ። ብመሰረት ታይምስ ታይምስ፡ ኣብ ነሓሰ 2007 ኣብ ዝተኻየደ ስነ-ስርዓት፡ 'ቤጂንግ ኦሎምፒክ ቅድስቲ ሃልሃልታ ኣሃዱ' ዝብል 'ቤጂንግ ኦሎምፒክ ቅድስቲ ሃልሃልታ ዝከላኸል ኣሃዱ' ኢሉ ከምዝመሓለወ፡ እቲ ቀንዲ ስራሖም ኣብ ምሉእ እቲ ጉዕዞ ሃልሃልታ ኦሎምፒክ ክመላለስን ኣብ መንጎ ሽግታት፡ ፋኑሳትን ካውልድሮንን ዘሎ ሃልሃልታ ኣብ ምትሕልላፍ ምሕጋዝን እዩ። ምስ ዝመሳሰሉ ሰማያዊ ትራክሱት ይኽደኑን ኣብ ነፍሲ ወከፍ ስጉምቲ ነቲ ሽግ ንምዕጃብ ዝዓለሙን እዮም። ሓደ ካብቶም ኣገልገልቲ ሽግ፡ ‘ካልኣይ ቅኑዕ ሓው’ ተባሂሉ ዝጽዋዕ፡ ብፍላይ ኣብ መንጎ ደቂ ኣንስትዮ ኔትዘርስ ቻይና፡ ርኡይ ናይ ኦንላይን ደገፍቲ-መሰረት ኣማዕቢሉ።
translated_question: እቶም ኣገልገልቲ እንታይ ዓይነት ሕብራዊ ትራክሱት ይኽደኑ?

passage: The Beijing Olympic Organizing Committee sent out a team of 30 unarmed attendants selected from the People's Armed Police to escort the flame throughout its journey. According to Asian Times, sworn in as the 'Beijing Olympic Games Sacred Flame Protection Unit' during a ceremony in August 2007, their main job is to keep the Olympic flame alight throughout the journey and to assist in transferring the flame between the torches, the lanterns and the cauldrons. They wear matching blue tracksuits and are intended to accompany the torch every step of the way. One of the torch attendants, dubbed 'Second Right Brother,' has developed a significant online fan-base, particularly among China's female netizens.
question: What is the intended role of the attendants in relation to the torch?
mc_answer1: They accompany the torch every step of the way
mc_answer2: They only appear at the start and finish
mc_answer3: They replace the torch during long breaks
mc_answer4: They lead the torch relay route

translated_question: ምስቲ ሽግ ብምትእስሳር እቶም ኣገልገልቲ ዝተሓሰበ ተራ እንታይ እዩ?
translated_mc_answer1: ኣብ ነፍሲ ወከፍ ስጉምቲ መንገዲ ነቲ ሽግ ይዕጅቡ .
translated_mc_answer2: ኣብ መጀመርታን ውድእን ጥራይ እዮም ዝረኣዩ ።
translated_mc_answer3: ኣብ እዋን ነዊሕ ዕረፍቲ ንሽግ ይትክእዎ ።
translated_mc_answer4: ነቲ ናይ ቶርች ሪለይ መንገዲ ይመርሑ .

passage: Interspersed repeats mainly come from transposable elements (TEs), but they also include some protein coding gene families and pseudogenes. Transposable elements are able to integrate into the genome at another site within the cell. It is believed that TEs are an important driving force on genome evolution of higher eukaryotes. TEs can be classified into two categories, Class 1(retrotransposons) and Class 2(DNA transposons).

passage: Comprehensive schools are primarily about providing an entitlement curriculum to all children, without selection whether due to financial considerations or attainment. A consequence of that is a wider ranging curriculum, including practical subjects such as design and technology and vocational learning, which were less common or non-existent in grammar schools. Providing post-16 education cost-effectively becomes more challenging for smaller comprehensive schools, because of the number of courses needed to cover a broader curriculum with comparatively fewer students. This is why schools have tended to get larger and also why many local authorities have organised secondary education into 11–16 schools, with the post-16 provision provided by Sixth Form colleges and Further Education Colleges. Comprehensive schools do not select their intake on the basis of academic achievement or aptitude, but there are demographic reasons why the attainment profiles of different schools vary considerably. In addition, government initiatives such as the City Technology Colleges and Specialist schools programmes have made the comprehensive ideal less certain.
question: According to the passage, what is the primary purpose of comprehensive schools?
mc_answer1: To provide a selective curriculum based on financial considerations
mc_answer2: To provide an entitlement curriculum to all children
mc_answer3: To focus exclusively on academic subjects
translated_passage: ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ብቐንዱ ንኹሎም ህጻናት ናይ መሰል ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ምሃብ ዝምልከት እዩ፣ ብዘይ ምርጫ ብሰንኪ ፋይናንሳዊ ኣብ ግምት ዘእተወ ይኹን ወይ ምብጻሕ። ሳዕቤን ናይዚ ድማ ሰፊሕ ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ኮይኑ፡ ከም ዲዛይንን ቴክኖሎጅን ሞያዊ ትምህርትን ዝኣመሰሉ ግብራዊ ዛዕባታት ሓዊስካ፡ ኣብ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ሰዋስው ውሑድ ወይ ዘይነበረ። ድሕሪ 16 ትምህርቲ ምሃብ ብዋጋ ወጻኢታት ንንኣሽቱ ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ዝያዳ በዳሂ ይኸውን፣ ብሰንኪ እቲ ሰፊሕ ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ምስ ብተነጻጻሪ ውሑድ ተማሃሮ ንምሽፋን ዘድሊ ኮርሳት። ነዚ እዩ ድማ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ክዓብያ ዝገደፋን ከምኡ ውን ብዙሓት ናይ ከባቢ ሰበስልጣን ካልኣይ ደረጃ ትምህርቲ ናብ 11–16 ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ዘዳለዋ፣ ድሕሪ 16 ብሻድሻይ ፎርም ኮለጃትን ተወሳኺ ናይ ትምህርቲ ኮለጃትን ዝወሃብ ድንጋገ። ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ብኣካዳሚያዊ ዓወት ወይ ብቕዓት መሰረት ዝገበረቶ ኣይመርጻን እየን፣ እንተኾነ ግን ናይ ዝተፈላለያ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ናይ ምብጻሕ ፕሮፋይላት ፕሮፋይላት ኣዝዩ ዝፈላለየሉ ዲሞግራፊካዊ ምኽንያታት ኣሎ። ብተወሳኺ፡ ከም ናይ ከተማ ቴክኖሎጂ ኮለጃትን ናይ ስፔሻሊስት ኣብያተ ትምህርትን መደባት ዝኣመሰሉ መንግስታዊ ተበግሶታት፡ ነቲ ኩለመዳያዊ ideal ideas under certain ጌሮምዎ ኣለዉ።
translated_question: ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ ቀንዲ ዕላማ ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ እንታይ እዩ?

Providing post-16 education cost-effectively becomes more challenging for smaller comprehensive schools, because of the number of courses needed to cover a broader curriculum with comparatively fewer students. This is why schools have tended to get larger and also why many local authorities have organised secondary education into 11–16 schools, with the post-16 provision provided by Sixth Form colleges and Further Education Colleges. Comprehensive schools do not select their intake on the basis of academic achievement or aptitude, but there are demographic reasons why the attainment profiles of different schools vary considerably. mc_answer1: A narrower curriculum focused solely on academic subjects
mc_answer2: A wider ranging curriculum including practical subjects like design and technology and vocational learning
translated_passage: ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ብቐንዱ ንኹሎም ህጻናት ናይ መሰል ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ምሃብ ዝምልከት እዩ፣ ብዘይ ምርጫ ብሰንኪ ፋይናንሳዊ ኣብ ግምት ዘእተወ ይኹን ወይ ምብጻሕ። ሳዕቤን ናይዚ ድማ ሰፊሕ ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ኮይኑ፡ ከም ዲዛይንን ቴክኖሎጅን ሞያዊ ትምህርትን ዝኣመሰሉ ግብራዊ ዛዕባታት ሓዊስካ፡ ኣብ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ሰዋስው ውሑድ ወይ ዘይነበረ። ድሕሪ 16 ትምህርቲ ምሃብ ብዋጋ ወጻኢታት ንንኣሽቱ ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ዝያዳ በዳሂ ይኸውን፣ ብሰንኪ እቲ ሰፊሕ ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ምስ ብተነጻጻሪ ውሑድ ተማሃሮ ንምሽፋን ዘድሊ ኮርሳት። ነዚ እዩ ድማ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ክዓብያ ዝገደፋን ከምኡ ውን ብዙሓት ናይ ከባቢ ሰበስልጣን ካልኣይ ደረጃ ትምህርቲ ናብ 11–16 ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ዘዳለዋ፣ ድሕሪ 16 ብሻድሻይ ፎርም ኮለጃትን ተወሳኺ ናይ ትምህርቲ ኮለጃትን ዝወሃብ ድንጋገ። ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ብኣካዳሚያዊ ዓወት ወይ ብቕዓት መሰረት ዝገበረቶ ኣይመርጻን እየን፣ እንተኾነ ግን ናይ ዝተፈላለያ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ናይ ምብጻሕ ፕሮፋይላት ፕሮፋይላት ኣዝዩ ዝፈላለየሉ ዲሞግራፊካዊ ምኽንያታት ኣሎ። ብተወሳኺ፡ ከም ናይ ከተማ ቴክኖሎጂ ኮለጃትን ናይ ስፔሻሊስት ኣብያተ ትምህርትን መደባት ዝኣመሰሉ መንግስታዊ ተበግሶታት፡ ነቲ ኩለመዳያዊ ideal ideas under certain ጌሮምዎ ኣለዉ።
translated_question: ከምቲ ኣብቲ ክፍሊ ዝተጠቕሰ ንኹሎም ህጻናት ናይ መሰል ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ምሃብ ሓደ ሳዕቤን እንታይ እዩ?
translated_mc_answer1: ኣብ ኣካዳሚያዊ ትምህርቲ ጥራይ ዘተኮረ ዝጸበበ ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ
translated_mc_answer2: ከም ዲዛይንን ቴክኖሎጅን ሞያዊ ትምህርትን ዝኣመሰሉ ግብራዊ ዛዕባታት ሓዊሱ ሰፊሕ ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ

passage: Comprehensive schools are primarily about providing an entitlement curriculum to all children, without selection whether due to financial considerations or attainment. A consequence of that is a wider ranging curriculum, including practical subjects such as design and technology and vocational learning, which were less common or non-existent in grammar schools. Providing post-16 education cost-effectively becomes more challenging for smaller comprehensive schools, because of the number of courses needed to cover a broader curriculum with comparatively fewer students. This is why schools have tended to get larger and also why many local authorities have organised secondary education into 11–16 schools, with the post-16 provision provided by Sixth Form colleges and Further Education Colleges. Comprehensive schools do not select their intake on the basis of academic achievement or aptitude, but there are demographic reasons why the attainment profiles of different schools vary considerably. In addition, government initiatives such as the City Technology Colleges and Specialist schools programmes have made the comprehensive ideal less certain.
question: Why is providing post-16 education cost-effectively more challenging for smaller comprehensive schools?
mc_answer1: Because they have too many students
mc_answer2: Because they need to cover a broader curriculum with comparatively fewer students
translated_passage: ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ብቐንዱ ንኹሎም ህጻናት ናይ መሰል ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ምሃብ ዝምልከት እዩ፣ ብዘይ ምርጫ ብሰንኪ ፋይናንሳዊ ኣብ ግምት ዘእተወ ይኹን ወይ ምብጻሕ። ሳዕቤን ናይዚ ድማ ሰፊሕ ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ኮይኑ፡ ከም ዲዛይንን ቴክኖሎጅን ሞያዊ ትምህርትን ዝኣመሰሉ ግብራዊ ዛዕባታት ሓዊስካ፡ ኣብ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ሰዋስው ውሑድ ወይ ዘይነበረ። ድሕሪ 16 ትምህርቲ ምሃብ ብዋጋ ወጻኢታት ንንኣሽቱ ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ዝያዳ በዳሂ ይኸውን፣ ብሰንኪ እቲ ሰፊሕ ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ምስ ብተነጻጻሪ ውሑድ ተማሃሮ ንምሽፋን ዘድሊ ኮርሳት። ነዚ እዩ ድማ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ክዓብያ ዝገደፋን ከምኡ ውን ብዙሓት ናይ ከባቢ ሰበስልጣን ካልኣይ ደረጃ ትምህርቲ ናብ 11–16 ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ዘዳለዋ፣ ድሕሪ 16 ብሻድሻይ ፎርም ኮለጃትን ተወሳኺ ናይ ትምህርቲ ኮለጃትን ዝወሃብ ድንጋገ። ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ብኣካዳሚያዊ ዓወት ወይ ብቕዓት መሰረት ዝገበረቶ ኣይመርጻን እየን፣ እንተኾነ ግን ናይ ዝተፈላለያ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ናይ ምብጻሕ ፕሮፋይላት ፕሮፋይላት ኣዝዩ ዝፈላለየሉ ዲሞግራፊካዊ ምኽንያታት ኣሎ። ብተወሳኺ፡ ከም ናይ ከተማ ቴክኖሎጂ ኮለጃትን ናይ ስፔሻሊስት ኣብያተ ትምህርትን መደባት ዝኣመሰሉ መንግስታዊ ተበግሶታት፡ ነቲ ኩለመዳያዊ ideal ideas under certain ጌሮምዎ ኣለዉ።
translated_question: ስለምንታይ እዩ ድሕሪ 16 ትምህርቲ ንንኣሽቱ ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ብውፅኢታዊ መንገዲ ዝያዳ በዳሂ ዝህብ ዘሎ?
translated_mc_answer2: ምኽንያቱ ብተነጻጻሪ ውሑድ ተማሃሮ ንዝሰፍሐ ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ክሽፍኑ ስለዘድልዮም .

passage: Comprehensive schools are primarily about providing an entitlement curriculum to all children, without selection whether due to financial considerations or attainment. A consequence of that is a wider ranging curriculum, including practical subjects such as design and technology and vocational learning, which were less common or non-existent in grammar schools. Providing post-16 education cost-effectively becomes more challenging for smaller comprehensive schools, because of the number of courses needed to cover a broader curriculum with comparatively fewer students. This is why schools have tended to get larger and also why many local authorities have organised secondary education into 11–16 schools, with the post-16 provision provided by Sixth Form colleges and Further Education Colleges. question: How have many local authorities addressed the challenge of providing post-16 education?
mc_answer1: By merging comprehensive schools with primary schools
mc_answer2: By organizing secondary education into 11–16 schools and using Sixth Form colleges and Further Education Colleges for post-16 provision

translated_question: ብዙሓት ናይቲ ከባቢ ሰበስልጣን ድሕሪ 16 ትምህርቲ ናይ ምሃብ ብድሆ ብኸመይ ከምዝተዛረበ?

translated_mc_answer2: ካልኣይ ደረጃ ትምህርቲ ናብ 11–16 ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ብምውዳብን ሻድሻይ ፎርም ኮለጃትን ተወሳኺ ናይ ትምህርቲ ኮለጃትን ብመጠቀሚ ድሕሪ 16 ድንጋገ

mc_answer2: No, they do not select on that basis
mc_answer3: They select only based on financial ability
translated_passage: ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ብቐንዱ ንኹሎም ህጻናት ናይ መሰል ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ምሃብ ዝምልከት እዩ፣ ብዘይ ምርጫ ብሰንኪ ፋይናንሳዊ ኣብ ግምት ዘእተወ ይኹን ወይ ምብጻሕ። ሳዕቤን ናይዚ ድማ ሰፊሕ ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ኮይኑ፡ ከም ዲዛይንን ቴክኖሎጅን ሞያዊ ትምህርትን ዝኣመሰሉ ግብራዊ ዛዕባታት ሓዊስካ፡ ኣብ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ሰዋስው ውሑድ ወይ ዘይነበረ። ድሕሪ 16 ትምህርቲ ምሃብ ብዋጋ ወጻኢታት ንንኣሽቱ ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ዝያዳ በዳሂ ይኸውን፣ ብሰንኪ እቲ ሰፊሕ ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ምስ ብተነጻጻሪ ውሑድ ተማሃሮ ንምሽፋን ዘድሊ ኮርሳት። ነዚ እዩ ድማ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ክዓብያ ዝገደፋን ከምኡ ውን ብዙሓት ናይ ከባቢ ሰበስልጣን ካልኣይ ደረጃ ትምህርቲ ናብ 11–16 ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ዘዳለዋ፣ ድሕሪ 16 ብሻድሻይ ፎርም ኮለጃትን ተወሳኺ ናይ ትምህርቲ ኮለጃትን ዝወሃብ ድንጋገ። ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ብኣካዳሚያዊ ዓወት ወይ ብቕዓት መሰረት ዝገበረቶ ኣይመርጻን እየን፣ እንተኾነ ግን ናይ ዝተፈላለያ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ናይ ምብጻሕ ፕሮፋይላት ፕሮፋይላት ኣዝዩ ዝፈላለየሉ ዲሞግራፊካዊ ምኽንያታት ኣሎ። ብተወሳኺ፡ ከም ናይ ከተማ ቴክኖሎጂ ኮለጃትን ናይ ስፔሻሊስት ኣብያተ ትምህርትን መደባት ዝኣመሰሉ መንግስታዊ ተበግሶታት፡ ነቲ ኩለመዳያዊ ideal ideas under certain ጌሮምዎ ኣለዉ።
translated_question: ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ብኣካዳሚያዊ ዓወት ወይ ብቕዓት መሰረት ብምግባር ኣመጋግባአን ይመርጻ ድየን?
translated_mc_answer1: እወ፡ ኣብ ኣካዳሚያዊ ውጽኢት ተመርኲሶም እዮም ዝመርጹ ።
translated_mc_answer3: ኣብ ፋይናንሳዊ ዓቕሚ ጥራይ ተመርኲሶም እዮም ዝመርጹ ።

passage: Comprehensive schools are primarily about providing an entitlement curriculum to all children, without selection whether due to financial considerations or attainment. A consequence of that is a wider ranging curriculum, including practical subjects such as design and technology and vocational learning, which were less common or non-existent in grammar schools. Providing post-16 education cost-effectively becomes more challenging for smaller comprehensive schools, because of the number of courses needed to cover a broader curriculum with comparatively fewer students. This is why schools have tended to get larger and also why many local authorities have organised secondary education into 11–16 schools, with the post-16 provision provided by Sixth Form colleges and Further Education Colleges. Comprehensive schools do not select their intake on the basis of academic achievement or aptitude, but there are demographic reasons why the attainment profiles of different schools vary considerably. In addition, government initiatives such as the City Technology Colleges and Specialist schools programmes have made the comprehensive ideal less certain.
question: According to the passage, why do the attainment profiles of different comprehensive schools vary considerably?
mc_answer1: Because of differences in teaching methods
mc_answer3: Because some schools have better facilities
translated_passage: ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ብቐንዱ ንኹሎም ህጻናት ናይ መሰል ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ምሃብ ዝምልከት እዩ፣ ብዘይ ምርጫ ብሰንኪ ፋይናንሳዊ ኣብ ግምት ዘእተወ ይኹን ወይ ምብጻሕ። ሳዕቤን ናይዚ ድማ ሰፊሕ ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ኮይኑ፡ ከም ዲዛይንን ቴክኖሎጅን ሞያዊ ትምህርትን ዝኣመሰሉ ግብራዊ ዛዕባታት ሓዊስካ፡ ኣብ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ሰዋስው ውሑድ ወይ ዘይነበረ። ድሕሪ 16 ትምህርቲ ምሃብ ብዋጋ ወጻኢታት ንንኣሽቱ ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ዝያዳ በዳሂ ይኸውን፣ ብሰንኪ እቲ ሰፊሕ ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ምስ ብተነጻጻሪ ውሑድ ተማሃሮ ንምሽፋን ዘድሊ ኮርሳት። ነዚ እዩ ድማ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ክዓብያ ዝገደፋን ከምኡ ውን ብዙሓት ናይ ከባቢ ሰበስልጣን ካልኣይ ደረጃ ትምህርቲ ናብ 11–16 ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ዘዳለዋ፣ ድሕሪ 16 ብሻድሻይ ፎርም ኮለጃትን ተወሳኺ ናይ ትምህርቲ ኮለጃትን ዝወሃብ ድንጋገ። ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ብኣካዳሚያዊ ዓወት ወይ ብቕዓት መሰረት ዝገበረቶ ኣይመርጻን እየን፣ እንተኾነ ግን ናይ ዝተፈላለያ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ናይ ምብጻሕ ፕሮፋይላት ፕሮፋይላት ኣዝዩ ዝፈላለየሉ ዲሞግራፊካዊ ምኽንያታት ኣሎ። ብተወሳኺ፡ ከም ናይ ከተማ ቴክኖሎጂ ኮለጃትን ናይ ስፔሻሊስት ኣብያተ ትምህርትን መደባት ዝኣመሰሉ መንግስታዊ ተበግሶታት፡ ነቲ ኩለመዳያዊ ideal ideas under certain ጌሮምዎ ኣለዉ።
translated_question: ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ፡ ናይ ዝተፈላለያ ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ናይ ምብጻሕ ፕሮፋይላት ንምንታይ ኣዝዩ ዝፈላለ?
translated_mc_answer3: ምኽንያቱ ገለ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ዝሓሸ መሳለጥያታት ኣለወን .

translated_passage: ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ብቐንዱ ንኹሎም ህጻናት ናይ መሰል ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ምሃብ ዝምልከት እዩ፣ ብዘይ ምርጫ ብሰንኪ ፋይናንሳዊ ኣብ ግምት ዘእተወ ይኹን ወይ ምብጻሕ። ሳዕቤን ናይዚ ድማ ሰፊሕ ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ኮይኑ፡ ከም ዲዛይንን ቴክኖሎጅን ሞያዊ ትምህርትን ዝኣመሰሉ ግብራዊ ዛዕባታት ሓዊስካ፡ ኣብ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ሰዋስው ውሑድ ወይ ዘይነበረ። ድሕሪ 16 ትምህርቲ ምሃብ ብዋጋ ወጻኢታት ንንኣሽቱ ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ዝያዳ በዳሂ ይኸውን፣ ብሰንኪ እቲ ሰፊሕ ስርዓተ ትምህርቲ ምስ ብተነጻጻሪ ውሑድ ተማሃሮ ንምሽፋን ዘድሊ ኮርሳት። ነዚ እዩ ድማ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ክዓብያ ዝገደፋን ከምኡ ውን ብዙሓት ናይ ከባቢ ሰበስልጣን ካልኣይ ደረጃ ትምህርቲ ናብ 11–16 ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ዘዳለዋ፣ ድሕሪ 16 ብሻድሻይ ፎርም ኮለጃትን ተወሳኺ ናይ ትምህርቲ ኮለጃትን ዝወሃብ ድንጋገ። ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ብኣካዳሚያዊ ዓወት ወይ ብቕዓት መሰረት ዝገበረቶ ኣይመርጻን እየን፣ እንተኾነ ግን ናይ ዝተፈላለያ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ናይ ምብጻሕ ፕሮፋይላት ፕሮፋይላት ኣዝዩ ዝፈላለየሉ ዲሞግራፊካዊ ምኽንያታት ኣሎ። ብተወሳኺ፡ ከም ናይ ከተማ ቴክኖሎጂ ኮለጃትን ናይ ስፔሻሊስት ኣብያተ ትምህርትን መደባት ዝኣመሰሉ መንግስታዊ ተበግሶታት፡ ነቲ ኩለመዳያዊ ideal ideas under certain ጌሮምዎ ኣለዉ።

passage: Germany has a comprehensive school known as the Gesamtschule. While some German schools such as the Gymnasium and the Realschule have rather strict entrance requirements, the Gesamtschule does not have such requirements. They offer college preparatory classes for the students who are doing well, general education classes for average students, and remedial courses for those who aren't doing that well. In most cases students attending a Gesamtschule may graduate with the Hauptschulabschluss, the Realschulabschluss or the Abitur depending on how well they did in school.

passage: China: In China, the torch was first welcomed by Politburo Standing Committee member Zhou Yongkang and State Councilor Liu Yandong. It was subsequently passed onto CPC General Secretary Hu Jintao. A call to boycott French hypermart Carrefour from May 1began spreading through mobile text messaging and online chat rooms amongst the Chinese over the weekend from April 12, accusing the company's major shareholder, the LVMH Group, of donating funds to the Dalai Lama. There were also calls to extend the boycott to include French luxury goods and cosmetic products. According to the Washington Times on April 15, however, the Chinese government was attempting to 'calm the situation' through censorship: 'All comments posted on popular Internet forum Sohu.com relating to a boycott of Carrefour have been deleted.' Chinese protesters organized boycotts of the French-owned retail chain Carrefour in major Chinese cities including Kunming, Hefei and Wuhan, accusing the French nation of pro-secessionist conspiracy and anti-Chinese racism. Some burned French flags, some added Nazism's Swastika to the French flag, and spread short online messages calling for large protests in front of French consulates and embassy. The Carrefour boycott was met with anti-boycott demonstrators who insisted on entering one of the Carrefour stores in Kunming, only to be blocked by boycotters wielding large Chinese flags and hit by water bottles. The BBC reported that hundreds of people demonstrated in Beijing, Wuhan, Hefei, Kunming and Qingdao.
question: Who were the first to welcome the torch in China?
mc_answer1: Politburo Standing Committee member Zhou Yongkang and State Councilor Liu Yandong
mc_answer2: CPC General Secretary Hu Jintao and State Councilor Liu Yandong
translated_passage: ቻይና፡ ኣብ ቻይና፡ እቲ ሽግ ንመጀመርያ ግዜ ብኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ዞው ዮንግካንግን ኣባል ባይቶ እታ ግዝኣት ሊዩ ያንዶንግን ተቐባልነት ረኺቡ። ብድሕሪኡ ናብ ዋና ጸሓፊ ሲፒሲ ሁ ጂንታኦ ሓሊፉ። ንፈረንሳዊ ሃይፐርማርት ካረፉር ካብ ግንቦት 12019 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መወዳእታ ሰሙን ካብ ሚያዝያ 12 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መንጎ ቻይናውያን ብሞባይል ቴክሳስን ኦንላይን ቻት ሩም እናተዘርግሐን ንምእጋድ ዝግበር ጻውዒት፡ ነቲ ናይቲ ኩባንያ ዓቢ በዓል ዋና ኣክስዮን ሌቪኤምኤች ግሩፕ፡ ንዳላይ ላማ ገንዘብ ከም ዝለገሰ ከሲሱ። ነቲ ቦይኮት ንምንዋሕ እውን ንፈረንሳውያን ምቾት ዘለዎም ኣቑሑትን መመላኽዒ ፍርያትን ንምሕዋስ ጻውዒታት ነይሩ። ብመሰረት ዋሽንግተን ታይምስ ብ15 ሚያዝያ ግን፡ መንግስቲ ቻይና ብሳንሱር ‘ነቲ ኩነታት’ ከሕልፎ ይፍትን ነይሩ፡ 'ኩሉ ኣብ ህቡብ ናይ ኢንተርነት መድረኽ ሶሁ.ኮም ዝተለጠፈ ኩሉ ርእይቶታት ምስ ምእጋድ ካረፉር ዝተኣሳሰር ተደምሲሱ'ሎ።' ቻይናውያን ሰልፈኛታት ነቲ ብፈረንሳ ዝውነን ሰንሰለት ሸቐጥ ካረፉር ኣብ ዓበይቲ ከተማታት ቻይና ምእጋድ ኣዳለውቲ ኣብ ኩንሚንግ፣ ሄፈይን ዉሃንን ሓዊሱ ንፈረንሳዊት ሃገር ፈረንሳዊ ውዲትን ፀረ ቻይናዊ ዓሌትነትን ብምኽሳስ። ገሊኦም ባንዴራታት ፈረንሳ ኣቃጺሎም፡ ገሊኦም ስዋስቲካ ናዚዝም ኣብ ባንዴራ ፈረንሳ ወሲኾም፡ ኣብ ቅድሚ ቆንስልን ኤምባሲን ፈረንሳ ዓበይቲ ተቓውሞታት ክግበር ዝጽውዑ ሓጸርቲ ናይ ኦንላይን መልእኽትታት ዘርጊሖም። እቲ ካረፉር ቦይኮት ምስ ጸረ-ቦይኮት ሰልፈኛታት ተራኺቡ፡ ኣብ ሓደ ካብተን ኣብ ኩንሚንግ ዝርከባ ድኳናት ካረፉር ክኣቱ ጸኒዑ፡ ዓበይቲ ባንዴራታት ቻይና ብምሓዝን ብጥርሙዝ ማይ ዝሃርምን ቦይኮተር ጥራይ እዩ ተዓጽዩ። ቢቢሲ ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ ኣብ ቤጂንግ፡ ዉሃን፡ ሄፈይ፡ ኩንሚንግን ቺንግዳኦን ኣማኢት ሰባት ከም ዘርኣዩ ጸብጺቡ።
translated_question: ኣብ ቻይና ንዝነበረ ሽግ ንመጀመርያ ግዜ መን እዩ ነይሩ?
translated_mc_answer1: ኣባል ፖሊሊትቡሮ ኣባል ኮሚቴ ዞው ዮንግካንግን ኣባል ቤት ምኽሪ እታ ግዝኣት ሊዩ ያንዶንግን
translated_mc_answer2: ዋና ጸሓፊ CPC ሁ ጂንታኦን ኣባል ባይቶ እታ ግዝኣት ሊዩ ያንዶንግን

passage: China: In China, the torch was first welcomed by Politburo Standing Committee member Zhou Yongkang and State Councilor Liu Yandong. It was subsequently passed onto CPC General Secretary Hu Jintao. A call to boycott French hypermart Carrefour from May 1began spreading through mobile text messaging and online chat rooms amongst the Chinese over the weekend from April 12, accusing the company's major shareholder, the LVMH Group, of donating funds to the Dalai Lama. There were also calls to extend the boycott to include French luxury goods and cosmetic products. According to the Washington Times on April 15, however, the Chinese government was attempting to 'calm the situation' through censorship: 'All comments posted on popular Internet forum Sohu.com relating to a boycott of Carrefour have been deleted.' Chinese protesters organized boycotts of the French-owned retail chain Carrefour in major Chinese cities including Kunming, Hefei and Wuhan, accusing the French nation of pro-secessionist conspiracy and anti-Chinese racism. Some burned French flags, some added Nazism's Swastika to the French flag, and spread short online messages calling for large protests in front of French consulates and embassy. The Carrefour boycott was met with anti-boycott demonstrators who insisted on entering one of the Carrefour stores in Kunming, only to be blocked by boycotters wielding large Chinese flags and hit by water bottles. The BBC reported that hundreds of people demonstrated in Beijing, Wuhan, Hefei, Kunming and Qingdao.
question: Who received the torch after it was initially welcomed in China?
translated_passage: ቻይና፡ ኣብ ቻይና፡ እቲ ሽግ ንመጀመርያ ግዜ ብኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ዞው ዮንግካንግን ኣባል ባይቶ እታ ግዝኣት ሊዩ ያንዶንግን ተቐባልነት ረኺቡ። ብድሕሪኡ ናብ ዋና ጸሓፊ ሲፒሲ ሁ ጂንታኦ ሓሊፉ። ንፈረንሳዊ ሃይፐርማርት ካረፉር ካብ ግንቦት 12019 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መወዳእታ ሰሙን ካብ ሚያዝያ 12 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መንጎ ቻይናውያን ብሞባይል ቴክሳስን ኦንላይን ቻት ሩም እናተዘርግሐን ንምእጋድ ዝግበር ጻውዒት፡ ነቲ ናይቲ ኩባንያ ዓቢ በዓል ዋና ኣክስዮን ሌቪኤምኤች ግሩፕ፡ ንዳላይ ላማ ገንዘብ ከም ዝለገሰ ከሲሱ። ነቲ ቦይኮት ንምንዋሕ እውን ንፈረንሳውያን ምቾት ዘለዎም ኣቑሑትን መመላኽዒ ፍርያትን ንምሕዋስ ጻውዒታት ነይሩ። ብመሰረት ዋሽንግተን ታይምስ ብ15 ሚያዝያ ግን፡ መንግስቲ ቻይና ብሳንሱር ‘ነቲ ኩነታት’ ከሕልፎ ይፍትን ነይሩ፡ 'ኩሉ ኣብ ህቡብ ናይ ኢንተርነት መድረኽ ሶሁ.ኮም ዝተለጠፈ ኩሉ ርእይቶታት ምስ ምእጋድ ካረፉር ዝተኣሳሰር ተደምሲሱ'ሎ።' ቻይናውያን ሰልፈኛታት ነቲ ብፈረንሳ ዝውነን ሰንሰለት ሸቐጥ ካረፉር ኣብ ዓበይቲ ከተማታት ቻይና ምእጋድ ኣዳለውቲ ኣብ ኩንሚንግ፣ ሄፈይን ዉሃንን ሓዊሱ ንፈረንሳዊት ሃገር ፈረንሳዊ ውዲትን ፀረ ቻይናዊ ዓሌትነትን ብምኽሳስ። ገሊኦም ባንዴራታት ፈረንሳ ኣቃጺሎም፡ ገሊኦም ስዋስቲካ ናዚዝም ኣብ ባንዴራ ፈረንሳ ወሲኾም፡ ኣብ ቅድሚ ቆንስልን ኤምባሲን ፈረንሳ ዓበይቲ ተቓውሞታት ክግበር ዝጽውዑ ሓጸርቲ ናይ ኦንላይን መልእኽትታት ዘርጊሖም። እቲ ካረፉር ቦይኮት ምስ ጸረ-ቦይኮት ሰልፈኛታት ተራኺቡ፡ ኣብ ሓደ ካብተን ኣብ ኩንሚንግ ዝርከባ ድኳናት ካረፉር ክኣቱ ጸኒዑ፡ ዓበይቲ ባንዴራታት ቻይና ብምሓዝን ብጥርሙዝ ማይ ዝሃርምን ቦይኮተር ጥራይ እዩ ተዓጽዩ። ቢቢሲ ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ ኣብ ቤጂንግ፡ ዉሃን፡ ሄፈይ፡ ኩንሚንግን ቺንግዳኦን ኣማኢት ሰባት ከም ዘርኣዩ ጸብጺቡ።
translated_question: ኣብ ፈለማ ኣብ ቻይና ተቐባልነት ምስ ረኸበ መን እዩ ሽግ ዝረኸበ?
translated_mc_answer1: ኣባል ቤት ምኽሪ ክልል l iu y press

translated_question: ኣብ ቻይና ዕላማ ናይቲ ናይ ቦይኮት ጻውዒት እዩ ነይሩ?

passage: China: In China, the torch was first welcomed by Politburo Standing Committee member Zhou Yongkang and State Councilor Liu Yandong. It was subsequently passed onto CPC General Secretary Hu Jintao. A call to boycott French hypermart Carrefour from May 1began spreading through mobile text messaging and online chat rooms amongst the Chinese over the weekend from April 12, accusing the company's major shareholder, the LVMH Group, of donating funds to the Dalai Lama. There were also calls to extend the boycott to include French luxury goods and cosmetic products. According to the Washington Times on April 15, however, the Chinese government was attempting to 'calm the situation' through censorship: 'All comments posted on popular Internet forum Sohu.com relating to a boycott of Carrefour have been deleted.' Chinese protesters organized boycotts of the French-owned retail chain Carrefour in major Chinese cities including Kunming, Hefei and Wuhan, accusing the French nation of pro-secessionist conspiracy and anti-Chinese racism. Some burned French flags, some added Nazism's Swastika to the French flag, and spread short online messages calling for large protests in front of French consulates and embassy. The Carrefour boycott was met with anti-boycott demonstrators who insisted on entering one of the Carrefour stores in Kunming, only to be blocked by boycotters wielding large Chinese flags and hit by water bottles. The BBC reported that hundreds of people demonstrated in Beijing, Wuhan, Hefei, Kunming and Qingdao.
question: When did the call to boycott Carrefour begin spreading through mobile text messaging and online chat rooms?
translated_passage: ቻይና፡ ኣብ ቻይና፡ እቲ ሽግ ንመጀመርያ ግዜ ብኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ዞው ዮንግካንግን ኣባል ባይቶ እታ ግዝኣት ሊዩ ያንዶንግን ተቐባልነት ረኺቡ። ብድሕሪኡ ናብ ዋና ጸሓፊ ሲፒሲ ሁ ጂንታኦ ሓሊፉ። ንፈረንሳዊ ሃይፐርማርት ካረፉር ካብ ግንቦት 12019 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መወዳእታ ሰሙን ካብ ሚያዝያ 12 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መንጎ ቻይናውያን ብሞባይል ቴክሳስን ኦንላይን ቻት ሩም እናተዘርግሐን ንምእጋድ ዝግበር ጻውዒት፡ ነቲ ናይቲ ኩባንያ ዓቢ በዓል ዋና ኣክስዮን ሌቪኤምኤች ግሩፕ፡ ንዳላይ ላማ ገንዘብ ከም ዝለገሰ ከሲሱ። ነቲ ቦይኮት ንምንዋሕ እውን ንፈረንሳውያን ምቾት ዘለዎም ኣቑሑትን መመላኽዒ ፍርያትን ንምሕዋስ ጻውዒታት ነይሩ። ብመሰረት ዋሽንግተን ታይምስ ብ15 ሚያዝያ ግን፡ መንግስቲ ቻይና ብሳንሱር ‘ነቲ ኩነታት’ ከሕልፎ ይፍትን ነይሩ፡ 'ኩሉ ኣብ ህቡብ ናይ ኢንተርነት መድረኽ ሶሁ.ኮም ዝተለጠፈ ኩሉ ርእይቶታት ምስ ምእጋድ ካረፉር ዝተኣሳሰር ተደምሲሱ'ሎ።' ቻይናውያን ሰልፈኛታት ነቲ ብፈረንሳ ዝውነን ሰንሰለት ሸቐጥ ካረፉር ኣብ ዓበይቲ ከተማታት ቻይና ምእጋድ ኣዳለውቲ ኣብ ኩንሚንግ፣ ሄፈይን ዉሃንን ሓዊሱ ንፈረንሳዊት ሃገር ፈረንሳዊ ውዲትን ፀረ ቻይናዊ ዓሌትነትን ብምኽሳስ። ገሊኦም ባንዴራታት ፈረንሳ ኣቃጺሎም፡ ገሊኦም ስዋስቲካ ናዚዝም ኣብ ባንዴራ ፈረንሳ ወሲኾም፡ ኣብ ቅድሚ ቆንስልን ኤምባሲን ፈረንሳ ዓበይቲ ተቓውሞታት ክግበር ዝጽውዑ ሓጸርቲ ናይ ኦንላይን መልእኽትታት ዘርጊሖም። እቲ ካረፉር ቦይኮት ምስ ጸረ-ቦይኮት ሰልፈኛታት ተራኺቡ፡ ኣብ ሓደ ካብተን ኣብ ኩንሚንግ ዝርከባ ድኳናት ካረፉር ክኣቱ ጸኒዑ፡ ዓበይቲ ባንዴራታት ቻይና ብምሓዝን ብጥርሙዝ ማይ ዝሃርምን ቦይኮተር ጥራይ እዩ ተዓጽዩ። ቢቢሲ ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ ኣብ ቤጂንግ፡ ዉሃን፡ ሄፈይ፡ ኩንሚንግን ቺንግዳኦን ኣማኢት ሰባት ከም ዘርኣዩ ጸብጺቡ።
translated_question: እቲ ናብ ቦይኮት ካረፉር ዝግበር ጻውዒት መዓስ እዩ ብሞባይል ጽሑፍ መልእኽቲን ብኢንተርነት ቻት ሩምን ክዝርጋሕ ጀሚሩ?

question: What was Carrefour's major shareholder accused of doing?
mc_answer2: Donating funds to the Dalai Lama
translated_passage: ቻይና፡ ኣብ ቻይና፡ እቲ ሽግ ንመጀመርያ ግዜ ብኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ዞው ዮንግካንግን ኣባል ባይቶ እታ ግዝኣት ሊዩ ያንዶንግን ተቐባልነት ረኺቡ። ብድሕሪኡ ናብ ዋና ጸሓፊ ሲፒሲ ሁ ጂንታኦ ሓሊፉ። ንፈረንሳዊ ሃይፐርማርት ካረፉር ካብ ግንቦት 12019 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መወዳእታ ሰሙን ካብ ሚያዝያ 12 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መንጎ ቻይናውያን ብሞባይል ቴክሳስን ኦንላይን ቻት ሩም እናተዘርግሐን ንምእጋድ ዝግበር ጻውዒት፡ ነቲ ናይቲ ኩባንያ ዓቢ በዓል ዋና ኣክስዮን ሌቪኤምኤች ግሩፕ፡ ንዳላይ ላማ ገንዘብ ከም ዝለገሰ ከሲሱ። ነቲ ቦይኮት ንምንዋሕ እውን ንፈረንሳውያን ምቾት ዘለዎም ኣቑሑትን መመላኽዒ ፍርያትን ንምሕዋስ ጻውዒታት ነይሩ። ብመሰረት ዋሽንግተን ታይምስ ብ15 ሚያዝያ ግን፡ መንግስቲ ቻይና ብሳንሱር ‘ነቲ ኩነታት’ ከሕልፎ ይፍትን ነይሩ፡ 'ኩሉ ኣብ ህቡብ ናይ ኢንተርነት መድረኽ ሶሁ.ኮም ዝተለጠፈ ኩሉ ርእይቶታት ምስ ምእጋድ ካረፉር ዝተኣሳሰር ተደምሲሱ'ሎ።' ቻይናውያን ሰልፈኛታት ነቲ ብፈረንሳ ዝውነን ሰንሰለት ሸቐጥ ካረፉር ኣብ ዓበይቲ ከተማታት ቻይና ምእጋድ ኣዳለውቲ ኣብ ኩንሚንግ፣ ሄፈይን ዉሃንን ሓዊሱ ንፈረንሳዊት ሃገር ፈረንሳዊ ውዲትን ፀረ ቻይናዊ ዓሌትነትን ብምኽሳስ። ገሊኦም ባንዴራታት ፈረንሳ ኣቃጺሎም፡ ገሊኦም ስዋስቲካ ናዚዝም ኣብ ባንዴራ ፈረንሳ ወሲኾም፡ ኣብ ቅድሚ ቆንስልን ኤምባሲን ፈረንሳ ዓበይቲ ተቓውሞታት ክግበር ዝጽውዑ ሓጸርቲ ናይ ኦንላይን መልእኽትታት ዘርጊሖም። እቲ ካረፉር ቦይኮት ምስ ጸረ-ቦይኮት ሰልፈኛታት ተራኺቡ፡ ኣብ ሓደ ካብተን ኣብ ኩንሚንግ ዝርከባ ድኳናት ካረፉር ክኣቱ ጸኒዑ፡ ዓበይቲ ባንዴራታት ቻይና ብምሓዝን ብጥርሙዝ ማይ ዝሃርምን ቦይኮተር ጥራይ እዩ ተዓጽዩ። ቢቢሲ ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ ኣብ ቤጂንግ፡ ዉሃን፡ ሄፈይ፡ ኩንሚንግን ቺንግዳኦን ኣማኢት ሰባት ከም ዘርኣዩ ጸብጺቡ።
translated_question: ካረፉር ዝገበሮ ዓቢ በዓል ዋና ኣክስዮን እንታይ እዩ ነይሩ?
translated_mc_answer3: ኣብ ናይ ከባቢ ተቓውሞታት ወፍሪ ምግባር

passage: China: In China, the torch was first welcomed by Politburo Standing Committee member Zhou Yongkang and State Councilor Liu Yandong. It was subsequently passed onto CPC General Secretary Hu Jintao. A call to boycott French hypermart Carrefour from May 1began spreading through mobile text messaging and online chat rooms amongst the Chinese over the weekend from April 12, accusing the company's major shareholder, the LVMH Group, of donating funds to the Dalai Lama. There were also calls to extend the boycott to include French luxury goods and cosmetic products. According to the Washington Times on April 15, however, the Chinese government was attempting to 'calm the situation' through censorship: 'All comments posted on popular Internet forum Sohu.com relating to a boycott of Carrefour have been deleted.' Chinese protesters organized boycotts of the French-owned retail chain Carrefour in major Chinese cities including Kunming, Hefei and Wuhan, accusing the French nation of pro-secessionist conspiracy and anti-Chinese racism. Some burned French flags, some added Nazism's Swastika to the French flag, and spread short online messages calling for large protests in front of French consulates and embassy. The Carrefour boycott was met with anti-boycott demonstrators who insisted on entering one of the Carrefour stores in Kunming, only to be blocked by boycotters wielding large Chinese flags and hit by water bottles. The BBC reported that hundreds of people demonstrated in Beijing, Wuhan, Hefei, Kunming and Qingdao.
question: What additional boycott calls were made by the Chinese regarding French products?
mc_answer2: To extend the boycott to include French luxury goods and cosmetic products
translated_passage: ቻይና፡ ኣብ ቻይና፡ እቲ ሽግ ንመጀመርያ ግዜ ብኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ዞው ዮንግካንግን ኣባል ባይቶ እታ ግዝኣት ሊዩ ያንዶንግን ተቐባልነት ረኺቡ። ብድሕሪኡ ናብ ዋና ጸሓፊ ሲፒሲ ሁ ጂንታኦ ሓሊፉ። ንፈረንሳዊ ሃይፐርማርት ካረፉር ካብ ግንቦት 12019 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መወዳእታ ሰሙን ካብ ሚያዝያ 12 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መንጎ ቻይናውያን ብሞባይል ቴክሳስን ኦንላይን ቻት ሩም እናተዘርግሐን ንምእጋድ ዝግበር ጻውዒት፡ ነቲ ናይቲ ኩባንያ ዓቢ በዓል ዋና ኣክስዮን ሌቪኤምኤች ግሩፕ፡ ንዳላይ ላማ ገንዘብ ከም ዝለገሰ ከሲሱ። ነቲ ቦይኮት ንምንዋሕ እውን ንፈረንሳውያን ምቾት ዘለዎም ኣቑሑትን መመላኽዒ ፍርያትን ንምሕዋስ ጻውዒታት ነይሩ። ብመሰረት ዋሽንግተን ታይምስ ብ15 ሚያዝያ ግን፡ መንግስቲ ቻይና ብሳንሱር ‘ነቲ ኩነታት’ ከሕልፎ ይፍትን ነይሩ፡ 'ኩሉ ኣብ ህቡብ ናይ ኢንተርነት መድረኽ ሶሁ.ኮም ዝተለጠፈ ኩሉ ርእይቶታት ምስ ምእጋድ ካረፉር ዝተኣሳሰር ተደምሲሱ'ሎ።' ቻይናውያን ሰልፈኛታት ነቲ ብፈረንሳ ዝውነን ሰንሰለት ሸቐጥ ካረፉር ኣብ ዓበይቲ ከተማታት ቻይና ምእጋድ ኣዳለውቲ ኣብ ኩንሚንግ፣ ሄፈይን ዉሃንን ሓዊሱ ንፈረንሳዊት ሃገር ፈረንሳዊ ውዲትን ፀረ ቻይናዊ ዓሌትነትን ብምኽሳስ። ገሊኦም ባንዴራታት ፈረንሳ ኣቃጺሎም፡ ገሊኦም ስዋስቲካ ናዚዝም ኣብ ባንዴራ ፈረንሳ ወሲኾም፡ ኣብ ቅድሚ ቆንስልን ኤምባሲን ፈረንሳ ዓበይቲ ተቓውሞታት ክግበር ዝጽውዑ ሓጸርቲ ናይ ኦንላይን መልእኽትታት ዘርጊሖም። እቲ ካረፉር ቦይኮት ምስ ጸረ-ቦይኮት ሰልፈኛታት ተራኺቡ፡ ኣብ ሓደ ካብተን ኣብ ኩንሚንግ ዝርከባ ድኳናት ካረፉር ክኣቱ ጸኒዑ፡ ዓበይቲ ባንዴራታት ቻይና ብምሓዝን ብጥርሙዝ ማይ ዝሃርምን ቦይኮተር ጥራይ እዩ ተዓጽዩ። ቢቢሲ ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ ኣብ ቤጂንግ፡ ዉሃን፡ ሄፈይ፡ ኩንሚንግን ቺንግዳኦን ኣማኢት ሰባት ከም ዘርኣዩ ጸብጺቡ።
translated_question: ቻይናውያን ብዛዕባ ፍርያት ፈረንሳ ብዝምልከት እንታይ ተወሳኺ ናይ ምእጋድ ጻውዒት ተገይሩሎም?
translated_mc_answer2: ነቲ ቦይኮት ንምዝርጋሕ ንፈረንሳውያን ምቾት ዘለዎም ኣቑሑትን ፍርያት መመላኽዒታትን ንምሕዋስ

translated_question: መንግስቲ ቻይና ኣብ Sohu.com ርእይቶታት ብምድምሳስ ነቲ ኩነታት ከህድኦ ይፍትን ከም ዝነበረ ዝገለጸ ማዕከናት ዜና ኣየናይ እዩ?

passage: China: In China, the torch was first welcomed by Politburo Standing Committee member Zhou Yongkang and State Councilor Liu Yandong. It was subsequently passed onto CPC General Secretary Hu Jintao. A call to boycott French hypermart Carrefour from May 1began spreading through mobile text messaging and online chat rooms amongst the Chinese over the weekend from April 12, accusing the company's major shareholder, the LVMH Group, of donating funds to the Dalai Lama. There were also calls to extend the boycott to include French luxury goods and cosmetic products. According to the Washington Times on April 15, however, the Chinese government was attempting to 'calm the situation' through censorship: 'All comments posted on popular Internet forum Sohu.com relating to a boycott of Carrefour have been deleted.' Chinese protesters organized boycotts of the French-owned retail chain Carrefour in major Chinese cities including Kunming, Hefei and Wuhan, accusing the French nation of pro-secessionist conspiracy and anti-Chinese racism. Some burned French flags, some added Nazism's Swastika to the French flag, and spread short online messages calling for large protests in front of French consulates and embassy. The Carrefour boycott was met with anti-boycott demonstrators who insisted on entering one of the Carrefour stores in Kunming, only to be blocked by boycotters wielding large Chinese flags and hit by water bottles. The BBC reported that hundreds of people demonstrated in Beijing, Wuhan, Hefei, Kunming and Qingdao.
question: What action did Chinese authorities reportedly take on Sohu.com in response to boycott-related comments?
mc_answer3: They deleted all comments related to a boycott of Carrefour
mc_answer4: They featured the comments on the homepage
translated_passage: ቻይና፡ ኣብ ቻይና፡ እቲ ሽግ ንመጀመርያ ግዜ ብኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ዞው ዮንግካንግን ኣባል ባይቶ እታ ግዝኣት ሊዩ ያንዶንግን ተቐባልነት ረኺቡ። ብድሕሪኡ ናብ ዋና ጸሓፊ ሲፒሲ ሁ ጂንታኦ ሓሊፉ። ንፈረንሳዊ ሃይፐርማርት ካረፉር ካብ ግንቦት 12019 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መወዳእታ ሰሙን ካብ ሚያዝያ 12 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መንጎ ቻይናውያን ብሞባይል ቴክሳስን ኦንላይን ቻት ሩም እናተዘርግሐን ንምእጋድ ዝግበር ጻውዒት፡ ነቲ ናይቲ ኩባንያ ዓቢ በዓል ዋና ኣክስዮን ሌቪኤምኤች ግሩፕ፡ ንዳላይ ላማ ገንዘብ ከም ዝለገሰ ከሲሱ። ነቲ ቦይኮት ንምንዋሕ እውን ንፈረንሳውያን ምቾት ዘለዎም ኣቑሑትን መመላኽዒ ፍርያትን ንምሕዋስ ጻውዒታት ነይሩ። ብመሰረት ዋሽንግተን ታይምስ ብ15 ሚያዝያ ግን፡ መንግስቲ ቻይና ብሳንሱር ‘ነቲ ኩነታት’ ከሕልፎ ይፍትን ነይሩ፡ 'ኩሉ ኣብ ህቡብ ናይ ኢንተርነት መድረኽ ሶሁ.ኮም ዝተለጠፈ ኩሉ ርእይቶታት ምስ ምእጋድ ካረፉር ዝተኣሳሰር ተደምሲሱ'ሎ።' ቻይናውያን ሰልፈኛታት ነቲ ብፈረንሳ ዝውነን ሰንሰለት ሸቐጥ ካረፉር ኣብ ዓበይቲ ከተማታት ቻይና ምእጋድ ኣዳለውቲ ኣብ ኩንሚንግ፣ ሄፈይን ዉሃንን ሓዊሱ ንፈረንሳዊት ሃገር ፈረንሳዊ ውዲትን ፀረ ቻይናዊ ዓሌትነትን ብምኽሳስ። ገሊኦም ባንዴራታት ፈረንሳ ኣቃጺሎም፡ ገሊኦም ስዋስቲካ ናዚዝም ኣብ ባንዴራ ፈረንሳ ወሲኾም፡ ኣብ ቅድሚ ቆንስልን ኤምባሲን ፈረንሳ ዓበይቲ ተቓውሞታት ክግበር ዝጽውዑ ሓጸርቲ ናይ ኦንላይን መልእኽትታት ዘርጊሖም። እቲ ካረፉር ቦይኮት ምስ ጸረ-ቦይኮት ሰልፈኛታት ተራኺቡ፡ ኣብ ሓደ ካብተን ኣብ ኩንሚንግ ዝርከባ ድኳናት ካረፉር ክኣቱ ጸኒዑ፡ ዓበይቲ ባንዴራታት ቻይና ብምሓዝን ብጥርሙዝ ማይ ዝሃርምን ቦይኮተር ጥራይ እዩ ተዓጽዩ። ቢቢሲ ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ ኣብ ቤጂንግ፡ ዉሃን፡ ሄፈይ፡ ኩንሚንግን ቺንግዳኦን ኣማኢት ሰባት ከም ዘርኣዩ ጸብጺቡ።
translated_question: ሰበስልጣን ቻይና ምስ ቦይኮት ዝተኣሳሰር ርእይቶታት ምላሽ ንምሃብ ምስ sohu.com እንታይ ስጉምቲ ከምዝወሰዱ ይንገር?
translated_mc_answer3: ምስ ቦይኮት ካርፉር ዝተኣሳሰር ኩሉ ርእይቶታት ደምሲሶሞ

translated_passage: ቻይና፡ ኣብ ቻይና፡ እቲ ሽግ ንመጀመርያ ግዜ ብኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ዞው ዮንግካንግን ኣባል ባይቶ እታ ግዝኣት ሊዩ ያንዶንግን ተቐባልነት ረኺቡ። ብድሕሪኡ ናብ ዋና ጸሓፊ ሲፒሲ ሁ ጂንታኦ ሓሊፉ። ንፈረንሳዊ ሃይፐርማርት ካረፉር ካብ ግንቦት 12019 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መወዳእታ ሰሙን ካብ ሚያዝያ 12 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መንጎ ቻይናውያን ብሞባይል ቴክሳስን ኦንላይን ቻት ሩም እናተዘርግሐን ንምእጋድ ዝግበር ጻውዒት፡ ነቲ ናይቲ ኩባንያ ዓቢ በዓል ዋና ኣክስዮን ሌቪኤምኤች ግሩፕ፡ ንዳላይ ላማ ገንዘብ ከም ዝለገሰ ከሲሱ። ነቲ ቦይኮት ንምንዋሕ እውን ንፈረንሳውያን ምቾት ዘለዎም ኣቑሑትን መመላኽዒ ፍርያትን ንምሕዋስ ጻውዒታት ነይሩ። ብመሰረት ዋሽንግተን ታይምስ ብ15 ሚያዝያ ግን፡ መንግስቲ ቻይና ብሳንሱር ‘ነቲ ኩነታት’ ከሕልፎ ይፍትን ነይሩ፡ 'ኩሉ ኣብ ህቡብ ናይ ኢንተርነት መድረኽ ሶሁ.ኮም ዝተለጠፈ ኩሉ ርእይቶታት ምስ ምእጋድ ካረፉር ዝተኣሳሰር ተደምሲሱ'ሎ።' ቻይናውያን ሰልፈኛታት ነቲ ብፈረንሳ ዝውነን ሰንሰለት ሸቐጥ ካረፉር ኣብ ዓበይቲ ከተማታት ቻይና ምእጋድ ኣዳለውቲ ኣብ ኩንሚንግ፣ ሄፈይን ዉሃንን ሓዊሱ ንፈረንሳዊት ሃገር ፈረንሳዊ ውዲትን ፀረ ቻይናዊ ዓሌትነትን ብምኽሳስ። ገሊኦም ባንዴራታት ፈረንሳ ኣቃጺሎም፡ ገሊኦም ስዋስቲካ ናዚዝም ኣብ ባንዴራ ፈረንሳ ወሲኾም፡ ኣብ ቅድሚ ቆንስልን ኤምባሲን ፈረንሳ ዓበይቲ ተቓውሞታት ክግበር ዝጽውዑ ሓጸርቲ ናይ ኦንላይን መልእኽትታት ዘርጊሖም። እቲ ካረፉር ቦይኮት ምስ ጸረ-ቦይኮት ሰልፈኛታት ተራኺቡ፡ ኣብ ሓደ ካብተን ኣብ ኩንሚንግ ዝርከባ ድኳናት ካረፉር ክኣቱ ጸኒዑ፡ ዓበይቲ ባንዴራታት ቻይና ብምሓዝን ብጥርሙዝ ማይ ዝሃርምን ቦይኮተር ጥራይ እዩ ተዓጽዩ። ቢቢሲ ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ ኣብ ቤጂንግ፡ ዉሃን፡ ሄፈይ፡ ኩንሚንግን ቺንግዳኦን ኣማኢት ሰባት ከም ዘርኣዩ ጸብጺቡ።
translated_question: ሰልፈኛታት ከምቲ ኣብቲ ክፍሊ ዝተጠቕሰ ናይ ካረፉር ቦይኮት ኣዳልዮም ኣብ ኣየኖት ዓበይቲ ከተማታት ቻይናውያን ኣዳለውቲ እዮም?
translated_mc_answer3: S ኣዝዩ ናይ ብሓቂ እዩ፣ ንባብን ናንን እዩ .

passage: China: In China, the torch was first welcomed by Politburo Standing Committee member Zhou Yongkang and State Councilor Liu Yandong. It was subsequently passed onto CPC General Secretary Hu Jintao. A call to boycott French hypermart Carrefour from May 1began spreading through mobile text messaging and online chat rooms amongst the Chinese over the weekend from April 12, accusing the company's major shareholder, the LVMH Group, of donating funds to the Dalai Lama. There were also calls to extend the boycott to include French luxury goods and cosmetic products. According to the Washington Times on April 15, however, the Chinese government was attempting to 'calm the situation' through censorship: 'All comments posted on popular Internet forum Sohu.com relating to a boycott of Carrefour have been deleted.' Chinese protesters organized boycotts of the French-owned retail chain Carrefour in major Chinese cities including Kunming, Hefei and Wuhan, accusing the French nation of pro-secessionist conspiracy and anti-Chinese racism. Some burned French flags, some added Nazism's Swastika to the French flag, and spread short online messages calling for large protests in front of French consulates and embassy. The Carrefour boycott was met with anti-boycott demonstrators who insisted on entering one of the Carrefour stores in Kunming, only to be blocked by boycotters wielding large Chinese flags and hit by water bottles. The BBC reported that hundreds of people demonstrated in Beijing, Wuhan, Hefei, Kunming and Qingdao.
question: What actions did some protesters take against French symbols during the boycott?
mc_answer2: They burned French flags and added a swastika to the French flag
mc_answer3: They held a rally in support of French products
translated_passage: ቻይና፡ ኣብ ቻይና፡ እቲ ሽግ ንመጀመርያ ግዜ ብኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ዞው ዮንግካንግን ኣባል ባይቶ እታ ግዝኣት ሊዩ ያንዶንግን ተቐባልነት ረኺቡ። ብድሕሪኡ ናብ ዋና ጸሓፊ ሲፒሲ ሁ ጂንታኦ ሓሊፉ። ንፈረንሳዊ ሃይፐርማርት ካረፉር ካብ ግንቦት 12019 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መወዳእታ ሰሙን ካብ ሚያዝያ 12 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መንጎ ቻይናውያን ብሞባይል ቴክሳስን ኦንላይን ቻት ሩም እናተዘርግሐን ንምእጋድ ዝግበር ጻውዒት፡ ነቲ ናይቲ ኩባንያ ዓቢ በዓል ዋና ኣክስዮን ሌቪኤምኤች ግሩፕ፡ ንዳላይ ላማ ገንዘብ ከም ዝለገሰ ከሲሱ። ነቲ ቦይኮት ንምንዋሕ እውን ንፈረንሳውያን ምቾት ዘለዎም ኣቑሑትን መመላኽዒ ፍርያትን ንምሕዋስ ጻውዒታት ነይሩ። ብመሰረት ዋሽንግተን ታይምስ ብ15 ሚያዝያ ግን፡ መንግስቲ ቻይና ብሳንሱር ‘ነቲ ኩነታት’ ከሕልፎ ይፍትን ነይሩ፡ 'ኩሉ ኣብ ህቡብ ናይ ኢንተርነት መድረኽ ሶሁ.ኮም ዝተለጠፈ ኩሉ ርእይቶታት ምስ ምእጋድ ካረፉር ዝተኣሳሰር ተደምሲሱ'ሎ።' ቻይናውያን ሰልፈኛታት ነቲ ብፈረንሳ ዝውነን ሰንሰለት ሸቐጥ ካረፉር ኣብ ዓበይቲ ከተማታት ቻይና ምእጋድ ኣዳለውቲ ኣብ ኩንሚንግ፣ ሄፈይን ዉሃንን ሓዊሱ ንፈረንሳዊት ሃገር ፈረንሳዊ ውዲትን ፀረ ቻይናዊ ዓሌትነትን ብምኽሳስ። ገሊኦም ባንዴራታት ፈረንሳ ኣቃጺሎም፡ ገሊኦም ስዋስቲካ ናዚዝም ኣብ ባንዴራ ፈረንሳ ወሲኾም፡ ኣብ ቅድሚ ቆንስልን ኤምባሲን ፈረንሳ ዓበይቲ ተቓውሞታት ክግበር ዝጽውዑ ሓጸርቲ ናይ ኦንላይን መልእኽትታት ዘርጊሖም። እቲ ካረፉር ቦይኮት ምስ ጸረ-ቦይኮት ሰልፈኛታት ተራኺቡ፡ ኣብ ሓደ ካብተን ኣብ ኩንሚንግ ዝርከባ ድኳናት ካረፉር ክኣቱ ጸኒዑ፡ ዓበይቲ ባንዴራታት ቻይና ብምሓዝን ብጥርሙዝ ማይ ዝሃርምን ቦይኮተር ጥራይ እዩ ተዓጽዩ። ቢቢሲ ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ ኣብ ቤጂንግ፡ ዉሃን፡ ሄፈይ፡ ኩንሚንግን ቺንግዳኦን ኣማኢት ሰባት ከም ዘርኣዩ ጸብጺቡ።
translated_question: ገለ ሰልፈኛታት ኣብ እዋን ቦይኮት ኣንጻር ምልክታት ፈረንሳ እንታይ ዓይነት ስጉምቲ ወሲዶም?
translated_mc_answer2: ባንዴራታት ፈረንሳ ኣቃጺሎም ኣብ ባንዴራ ፈረንሳ ስዋስቲካ ወሲኾም

mc_answer3: They were blocked by boycotters wielding large Chinese flags and hit by water bottles
mc_answer4: They staged a sit-in inside the store
translated_passage: ቻይና፡ ኣብ ቻይና፡ እቲ ሽግ ንመጀመርያ ግዜ ብኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ዞው ዮንግካንግን ኣባል ባይቶ እታ ግዝኣት ሊዩ ያንዶንግን ተቐባልነት ረኺቡ። ብድሕሪኡ ናብ ዋና ጸሓፊ ሲፒሲ ሁ ጂንታኦ ሓሊፉ። ንፈረንሳዊ ሃይፐርማርት ካረፉር ካብ ግንቦት 12019 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መወዳእታ ሰሙን ካብ ሚያዝያ 12 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መንጎ ቻይናውያን ብሞባይል ቴክሳስን ኦንላይን ቻት ሩም እናተዘርግሐን ንምእጋድ ዝግበር ጻውዒት፡ ነቲ ናይቲ ኩባንያ ዓቢ በዓል ዋና ኣክስዮን ሌቪኤምኤች ግሩፕ፡ ንዳላይ ላማ ገንዘብ ከም ዝለገሰ ከሲሱ። ነቲ ቦይኮት ንምንዋሕ እውን ንፈረንሳውያን ምቾት ዘለዎም ኣቑሑትን መመላኽዒ ፍርያትን ንምሕዋስ ጻውዒታት ነይሩ። ብመሰረት ዋሽንግተን ታይምስ ብ15 ሚያዝያ ግን፡ መንግስቲ ቻይና ብሳንሱር ‘ነቲ ኩነታት’ ከሕልፎ ይፍትን ነይሩ፡ 'ኩሉ ኣብ ህቡብ ናይ ኢንተርነት መድረኽ ሶሁ.ኮም ዝተለጠፈ ኩሉ ርእይቶታት ምስ ምእጋድ ካረፉር ዝተኣሳሰር ተደምሲሱ'ሎ።' ቻይናውያን ሰልፈኛታት ነቲ ብፈረንሳ ዝውነን ሰንሰለት ሸቐጥ ካረፉር ኣብ ዓበይቲ ከተማታት ቻይና ምእጋድ ኣዳለውቲ ኣብ ኩንሚንግ፣ ሄፈይን ዉሃንን ሓዊሱ ንፈረንሳዊት ሃገር ፈረንሳዊ ውዲትን ፀረ ቻይናዊ ዓሌትነትን ብምኽሳስ። ገሊኦም ባንዴራታት ፈረንሳ ኣቃጺሎም፡ ገሊኦም ስዋስቲካ ናዚዝም ኣብ ባንዴራ ፈረንሳ ወሲኾም፡ ኣብ ቅድሚ ቆንስልን ኤምባሲን ፈረንሳ ዓበይቲ ተቓውሞታት ክግበር ዝጽውዑ ሓጸርቲ ናይ ኦንላይን መልእኽትታት ዘርጊሖም። እቲ ካረፉር ቦይኮት ምስ ጸረ-ቦይኮት ሰልፈኛታት ተራኺቡ፡ ኣብ ሓደ ካብተን ኣብ ኩንሚንግ ዝርከባ ድኳናት ካረፉር ክኣቱ ጸኒዑ፡ ዓበይቲ ባንዴራታት ቻይና ብምሓዝን ብጥርሙዝ ማይ ዝሃርምን ቦይኮተር ጥራይ እዩ ተዓጽዩ። ቢቢሲ ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ ኣብ ቤጂንግ፡ ዉሃን፡ ሄፈይ፡ ኩንሚንግን ቺንግዳኦን ኣማኢት ሰባት ከም ዘርኣዩ ጸብጺቡ።
translated_question: ኣብ ኩንሚንግ ዝርከቡ ጸረ-ቦይኮት ሰልፈኛታት ናብ ሓደ ድኳን ካረፉር ክኣትዉ ኣብ ዝጽዕሩሉ እዋን ከመይ ምላሽ ሂቦም?
translated_mc_answer3: ዓበይቲ ባንዴራታት ቻይና ዝሕዙ ቦይኮተር ተዓጊቶም ብጥርሙዝ ማይ ተሃሪሞም ።
translated_mc_answer4: ኣብ ውሽጢ እቲ ድኳን ኮፍ መበሊታት ኣካይዶም ።

passage: China: In China, the torch was first welcomed by Politburo Standing Committee member Zhou Yongkang and State Councilor Liu Yandong. It was subsequently passed onto CPC General Secretary Hu Jintao. A call to boycott French hypermart Carrefour from May 1began spreading through mobile text messaging and online chat rooms amongst the Chinese over the weekend from April 12, accusing the company's major shareholder, the LVMH Group, of donating funds to the Dalai Lama. There were also calls to extend the boycott to include French luxury goods and cosmetic products. According to the Washington Times on April 15, however, the Chinese government was attempting to 'calm the situation' through censorship: 'All comments posted on popular Internet forum Sohu.com relating to a boycott of Carrefour have been deleted.' Chinese protesters organized boycotts of the French-owned retail chain Carrefour in major Chinese cities including Kunming, Hefei and Wuhan, accusing the French nation of pro-secessionist conspiracy and anti-Chinese racism. Some burned French flags, some added Nazism's Swastika to the French flag, and spread short online messages calling for large protests in front of French consulates and embassy. The Carrefour boycott was met with anti-boycott demonstrators who insisted on entering one of the Carrefour stores in Kunming, only to be blocked by boycotters wielding large Chinese flags and hit by water bottles. The BBC reported that hundreds of people demonstrated in Beijing, Wuhan, Hefei, Kunming and Qingdao.
question: Which media outlet reported that hundreds of people demonstrated in cities such as Beijing, Wuhan, Hefei, Kunming, and Qingdao?
translated_passage: ቻይና፡ ኣብ ቻይና፡ እቲ ሽግ ንመጀመርያ ግዜ ብኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ኣባል ፖሊትቡሮ ዞው ዮንግካንግን ኣባል ባይቶ እታ ግዝኣት ሊዩ ያንዶንግን ተቐባልነት ረኺቡ። ብድሕሪኡ ናብ ዋና ጸሓፊ ሲፒሲ ሁ ጂንታኦ ሓሊፉ። ንፈረንሳዊ ሃይፐርማርት ካረፉር ካብ ግንቦት 12019 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መወዳእታ ሰሙን ካብ ሚያዝያ 12 ጀሚሩ ኣብ መንጎ ቻይናውያን ብሞባይል ቴክሳስን ኦንላይን ቻት ሩም እናተዘርግሐን ንምእጋድ ዝግበር ጻውዒት፡ ነቲ ናይቲ ኩባንያ ዓቢ በዓል ዋና ኣክስዮን ሌቪኤምኤች ግሩፕ፡ ንዳላይ ላማ ገንዘብ ከም ዝለገሰ ከሲሱ። ነቲ ቦይኮት ንምንዋሕ እውን ንፈረንሳውያን ምቾት ዘለዎም ኣቑሑትን መመላኽዒ ፍርያትን ንምሕዋስ ጻውዒታት ነይሩ። ብመሰረት ዋሽንግተን ታይምስ ብ15 ሚያዝያ ግን፡ መንግስቲ ቻይና ብሳንሱር ‘ነቲ ኩነታት’ ከሕልፎ ይፍትን ነይሩ፡ 'ኩሉ ኣብ ህቡብ ናይ ኢንተርነት መድረኽ ሶሁ.ኮም ዝተለጠፈ ኩሉ ርእይቶታት ምስ ምእጋድ ካረፉር ዝተኣሳሰር ተደምሲሱ'ሎ።' ቻይናውያን ሰልፈኛታት ነቲ ብፈረንሳ ዝውነን ሰንሰለት ሸቐጥ ካረፉር ኣብ ዓበይቲ ከተማታት ቻይና ምእጋድ ኣዳለውቲ ኣብ ኩንሚንግ፣ ሄፈይን ዉሃንን ሓዊሱ ንፈረንሳዊት ሃገር ፈረንሳዊ ውዲትን ፀረ ቻይናዊ ዓሌትነትን ብምኽሳስ። ገሊኦም ባንዴራታት ፈረንሳ ኣቃጺሎም፡ ገሊኦም ስዋስቲካ ናዚዝም ኣብ ባንዴራ ፈረንሳ ወሲኾም፡ ኣብ ቅድሚ ቆንስልን ኤምባሲን ፈረንሳ ዓበይቲ ተቓውሞታት ክግበር ዝጽውዑ ሓጸርቲ ናይ ኦንላይን መልእኽትታት ዘርጊሖም። እቲ ካረፉር ቦይኮት ምስ ጸረ-ቦይኮት ሰልፈኛታት ተራኺቡ፡ ኣብ ሓደ ካብተን ኣብ ኩንሚንግ ዝርከባ ድኳናት ካረፉር ክኣቱ ጸኒዑ፡ ዓበይቲ ባንዴራታት ቻይና ብምሓዝን ብጥርሙዝ ማይ ዝሃርምን ቦይኮተር ጥራይ እዩ ተዓጽዩ። ቢቢሲ ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ ኣብ ቤጂንግ፡ ዉሃን፡ ሄፈይ፡ ኩንሚንግን ቺንግዳኦን ኣማኢት ሰባት ከም ዘርኣዩ ጸብጺቡ።
translated_question: ኣብ ከም በዓል ቤጂንግ፡ ዉሃን፡ ሄፈይ፡ ኩንሚንግን ቺንግዳኦን ዝኣመሰላ ከተማታት ኣማኢት ሰባት ከም ዝተራእየ ዝገለጹ ኣየኖት ማዕከናት ዜና ጸብጺቦም?

passage: Some advocates for Tibet, Darfur, and the spiritual practice Falun Gong planned to protest the April 9 arrival of the torch in San Francisco. China had already requested the torch route in San Francisco be shortened. On April 7, 2008, two days prior to the actual torch relay, three activists carrying Tibetan flags scaled the suspension cables of the Golden Gate Bridge to unfurl two banners, one saying 'One World, One Dream. Free Tibet', and the other, 'Free Tibet '08'. Among them was San Francisco resident Laurel Sutherlin, who spoke to the local TV station KPIX-CBS5 live from a cellphone, urging the International Olympic Committee to ask China not to allow the torch to go through Tibet. 'Sutherlin said he was worried that the torch's planned route through Tibet would lead to more arrests and Chinese officials would use force to stifle dissent.' The three activists and five supporters face charges related to trespassing, conspiracy and causing a public nuisance.
question: Who planned to protest the April 9 arrival of the torch in San Francisco?
mc_answer2: Advocates for Tibet, Darfur, and Falun Gong
translated_passage: ገለ ንቲቤት፡ ዳርፉርን መንፈሳዊ ልምምድን ተጣበቕቲ ፋሉን ጎንግ፡ ነቲ ብ9 ሚያዝያ ናብ ሳንፍራንሲስኮ ዝኣተወ ሽግ ንምቅዋም መደብ ኣውጺኦም ነይሮም። ቻይና ድሮ ኣብ ሳንፍራንሲስኮ ዝርከብ መስመር ሽግ ክትሕጸር ሓቲታ ነይራ። ብዕለት 7 ሚያዝያ 2008 ክልተ መዓልቲ ቅድሚ እቲ ጭቡጥ ቶርች ሪለይ፡ ሰለስተ ደለይቲ ፍትሒ ቲቤት ባንዴራታት ዝሓዙ ኣክቲቪስትስ ነቲ ክልተ ባነራት ንምፍታሕ ነቲ ናይ ወርቃዊ ኣፍደገ ድልድል ገመዳት ስንጥቕ ዝበለ ገመዳት ስሒቦምዎ፡ እቲ ሓደ 'ዋን ዓለም፡ ሓደ ሕልሚ' ዝብል። ነጻ ቲቤት’፡ እቲ ካልእ ድማ፡ 'ናጻ ቲቤት '08'። ካብዚኦም እቲ ኣብ ሳንፍራንሲስኮ ነባሪ ሎረል ሳዘርሊን ዝርከብ ኮይኑ፡ ንሱ ነቲ ናይቲ ከባቢ መደበር ቴሌቪዥን KPIX-CBS5 ካብ ሞባይል ብቐጥታ ዘዘራረቦ ኮይኑ፡ ንቻይና ብቲቤት ክትሓልፍ ከይትፈቅድ ንቻይና ንቻይና ንቻይና ክትሓቶ ክትሓትት ተማሕጸነት። 'ሱተርሊን፡ እቲ ቶርች ብቲቤት ዝመደቦ መንገዲ፡ ናብ ዝያዳ ማእሰርቲ ከስዕብን ሰበስልጣን ቻይና ንተቓውሞ ንምትፋስ ሓይሊ ከም ዝጥቀሙን ከምዝተጨነቐ ገሊጹ።' እቶም ሰለስተ ደለይቲ ፍትሕን ሓሙሽተ ደገፍትን ምስ ምጥሓስ፣ ውዲትን ጠንቂ ህዝቢ ምዝንጋዕን ዝተኣሳሰር ክሲ የጋጥሞም።
translated_question: ነቲ ብ9 ሚያዝያ ናብ ሳንፍራንሲስኮ ዝኣተወ ሽግ ንምቅዋም ዝሓሰበ መን እዩ?
translated_mc_answer1: ናይ ውሽጢ ዓዲ ወነንቲ ትካላት ንግዲ

passage: Some advocates for Tibet, Darfur, and the spiritual practice Falun Gong planned to protest the April 9 arrival of the torch in San Francisco. China had already requested the torch route in San Francisco be shortened. On April 7, 2008, two days prior to the actual torch relay, three activists carrying Tibetan flags scaled the suspension cables of the Golden Gate Bridge to unfurl two banners, one saying 'One World, One Dream. Free Tibet', and the other, 'Free Tibet '08'. Among them was San Francisco resident Laurel Sutherlin, who spoke to the local TV station KPIX-CBS5 live from a cellphone, urging the International Olympic Committee to ask China not to allow the torch to go through Tibet. 'Sutherlin said he was worried that the torch's planned route through Tibet would lead to more arrests and Chinese officials would use force to stifle dissent.' The three activists and five supporters face charges related to trespassing, conspiracy and causing a public nuisance.
question: What did China request regarding the torch route in San Francisco?
mc_answer3: That it follow a scenic route

translated_mc_answer3: ጽቡቕ ትርኢት ዘለዎ መንገዲ ከም ዝኽተል .

passage: The Argentine, British and Chilean claims all overlap, and have caused friction. On 18 December 2012, the British Foreign and Commonwealth Office named a previously unnamed area Queen Elizabeth Land in tribute to Queen Elizabeth II's Diamond Jubilee. On 22 December 2012, the UK ambassador to Argentina, John Freeman, was summoned to the Argentine government as protest against the claim. Argentine–UK relations had previously been damaged throughout 2012 due to disputes over the sovereignty of the nearby Falkland Islands, and the 30th anniversary of the Falklands War.
question: Which area was named in tribute to Queen Elizabeth II's Diamond Jubilee?
translated_passage: እቲ ኣርጀንቲናዊ፡ እንግሊዝን ቺለውን ኩሉ ከም ዝተደራረቡ ይዛረቡ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ምትፍናን ከም ዘስዓቡ ይገልጹ። ቤት ጽሕፈት ወጻእተኛታትን ኮመንዌልዝን እንግሊዝ ብ18 ታሕሳስ 2012፡ ንንግስቲ ኤልሳቤጥ ዳግማዊት ኢዮቤል ንግስቲ ኤልሳቤጥ ዳግማዊት ንኽብሪ ንኽብሪ፡ ቅድሚ ሕጂ ስሙ ዘይተጠቕሰ ከባቢ ንግስቲ ኤልሳቤጥ መሬት ሰምየ። ብ22 ታሕሳስ 2012 ዓ.ም ኣምባሳደር ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ ኣብ ኣርጀንቲና ጆን ፍሪማን ኣንጻር እቲ ክሲ ተቓውሞ ከም ዝቃወም ናብ መንግስቲ ኣርጀንቲና ተጸዊዑ። ቅድሚ ሕጂ ኣብ ምሉእ 2012 ኣብ ልዕሊ ልኡላውነት ናይተን ኣብ ጥቓኣ ዝርከባ ደሴታት ፋልክላንድ፡ ከምኡ’ውን መበል 30 ዓመት ዝኽሪ ኲናት ፎክላንድስ ዝነበረ ዘይምርድዳእ፡ ኣብ ምሉእ 2012 ዝምድናታት ኣብ ምሉእ 2012 ተበላሽዩ ነይሩ።
translated_question: ኣየናይ ከባቢ እዩ ነቲ ንግስቲ ኤልሳቤጥ ዳግማዊ ዳይመንድ ኢዮቤል ክብሪ ተሰይሙ?

passage: The Argentine, British and Chilean claims all overlap, and have caused friction. On 18 December 2012, the British Foreign and Commonwealth Office named a previously unnamed area Queen Elizabeth Land in tribute to Queen Elizabeth II's Diamond Jubilee. On 22 December 2012, the UK ambassador to Argentina, John Freeman, was summoned to the Argentine government as protest against the claim. Argentine–UK relations had previously been damaged throughout 2012 due to disputes over the sovereignty of the nearby Falkland Islands, and the 30th anniversary of the Falklands War.
question: What action did the UK ambassador to Argentina face on 22 December 2012?
mc_answer1: He was awarded for diplomatic service
mc_answer2: He was summoned to the Argentine government as protest

translated_passage: እቲ ኣርጀንቲናዊ፡ እንግሊዝን ቺለውን ኩሉ ከም ዝተደራረቡ ይዛረቡ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ምትፍናን ከም ዘስዓቡ ይገልጹ። ቤት ጽሕፈት ወጻእተኛታትን ኮመንዌልዝን እንግሊዝ ብ18 ታሕሳስ 2012፡ ንንግስቲ ኤልሳቤጥ ዳግማዊት ኢዮቤል ንግስቲ ኤልሳቤጥ ዳግማዊት ንኽብሪ ንኽብሪ፡ ቅድሚ ሕጂ ስሙ ዘይተጠቕሰ ከባቢ ንግስቲ ኤልሳቤጥ መሬት ሰምየ። ብ22 ታሕሳስ 2012 ዓ.ም ኣምባሳደር ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ ኣብ ኣርጀንቲና ጆን ፍሪማን ኣንጻር እቲ ክሲ ተቓውሞ ከም ዝቃወም ናብ መንግስቲ ኣርጀንቲና ተጸዊዑ። ቅድሚ ሕጂ ኣብ ምሉእ 2012 ኣብ ልዕሊ ልኡላውነት ናይተን ኣብ ጥቓኣ ዝርከባ ደሴታት ፋልክላንድ፡ ከምኡ’ውን መበል 30 ዓመት ዝኽሪ ኲናት ፎክላንድስ ዝነበረ ዘይምርድዳእ፡ ኣብ ምሉእ 2012 ዝምድናታት ኣብ ምሉእ 2012 ተበላሽዩ ነይሩ።

passage: Data on ethnic groups are important for putting into effect a number of federal statutes (i.e., enforcing bilingual election rules under the Voting Rights Act; monitoring and enforcing equal employment opportunities under the Civil Rights Act). Data on Ethnic Groups are also needed by local governments to run programs and meet legislative requirements (i.e., identifying segments of the population who may not be receiving medical services under the Public Health Act; evaluating whether financial institutions are meeting the credit needs of minority populations under the Community Reinvestment Act).
question: Why are ethnic group data considered important as per the passage?
mc_answer2: For enforcing federal statutes and meeting local program requirements
translated_passage: መረዳእታታት ብዛዕባ ብሄራት ብርክት ዝበሉ ናይ ፌደራል ሕግታት ኣብ ግብሪ ንምውዓል ኣገዳሲ እዩ (i.e., ኣብ ትሕቲ ሕጊ መሰል ድምጺ ክልተ ቋንቋታት ዝምልከት ሕግታት ምርጫ ምትግባር፤ ብመሰረት ሕጊ ሲቪላዊ መሰላት ማዕርነት ዕድላት ስራሕ ምክትታልን ምትግባርን)። ዳታ ብዛዕባ ብሄራዊ ጉጅለታት እውን ብከባብያዊ መንግስታት መደባት ንምክያድን ንሓጋጊ ጠለባት ንምምላእን የድሊ (i.e.፣ ብመሰረት ሕጊ ህዝባዊ ጥዕና ሕክምናዊ ኣገልግሎት ዘይቅበሉ ክፋላታት ህዝቢ ምልላይ፤ ፋይናንሳዊ ትካላት ብመሰረት ሕጊ ዳግመ-ወፍሪ ማሕበረሰብ ንውሑዳት ህዝቢ ልቓሕ ድሌታት ዘማልኡ እንተኾይኖም ምግምጋም)።

passage: Rajasthan is known for its traditional, colorful art. The block prints, tie and dye prints, Bagaru prints, Sanganer prints, and Zari embroidery are major export products from Rajasthan. Handicraft items like wooden furniture and crafts, carpets, and blue pottery are commonly found here. Shopping reflects the colorful culture, Rajasthani clothes have a lot of mirror work and embroidery. A Rajasthani traditional dress for females comprises an ankle‑length skirt and a short top, also known as a lehenga or a chaniya choli. A piece of cloth is used to cover the head, both for protection from heat and maintenance of modesty. Rajasthani dresses are usually designed in bright colors like blue, yellow and orange.
question: Which traditional art forms from Rajasthan are mentioned as major exports?
mc_answer2: Block prints, tie and dye prints, Bagaru prints, Sanganer prints, and Zari embroidery
translated_passage: ራጃስታን ብባህላዊን ሕብራዊን ስነ-ጥበቡ ይፍለጥ። እቲ ብሎክ ሕትመት፣ ክራቫታን ቀለም ሕትመት፣ ባጋሩ ሕትመት፣ ሳንጋነር ሕትመት፣ ከምኡውን ዛሪ ጥልፊ ካብ ራጃስታን ዓበይቲ ናይ ሰደድ ፍርያት እዮም። ከም ዕንጨይቲ ዝተሰርሐ ፍርናሽን ኢደ ጥበብን፡ ምንጻፍን ሰማያዊ ሸኽላታትን ዝኣመሰሉ ናይ ኢድ ኢድ ስርሓት ኣቑሑት ኣብዚ ልሙድ እዩ። ዕዳጋ ነቲ ሕብራዊ ባህሊ ዘንጸባርቕ እዩ፣ ራጃስታኒ ክዳውንቲ ብዙሕ መስትያት ስራሕን ጥልፍን ኣለዎ። ሓደ ራጃስታኒ ባህላዊ ክዳን ንኣንስቲ ቁርጭምጭሚት-ንውሓት ስረን ሓጺር ላዕለዋይ ላዕለዋይ ክፋልን ዝሓቖፈ ኮይኑ፡ ብሌሄንጋ ወይ ቻኒያ ቾሊ ተባሂሉ ዝፍለጥ እዩ። ሓደ ቁራጽ ጨርቂ ንርእሲ ንምሽፋን ይጥቀመሉ፣ ክልቲኡ ካብ ሙቐትን ምጽጋን ልክዕነትን ንምክልኻል። ራጃስታኒ ዝበሃሉ ክዳውንቲ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ከም ሰማያዊ፡ ብጫን ኣራንሺን ዝኣመሰሉ ድሙቓት ሕብርታት ዝተነድፉ እዮም።
translated_question: ካብ ራጃስታን ዝመጹ ባህላዊ ስነ-ጥበብ ኣየኖት እዮም ከም ዓበይቲ ሰደድ ዝጥቀሱ?
translated_mc_answer2: ናይ ብሎክ ሕትመት፣ ናይ ክራቫታን ቀለምን ሕትመት፣ ናይ ባጋሩ ሕትመት፣ ናይ ሳንጋነር ሕትመት፣ ከምኡውን ናይ ዛሪ ጥልፊ

passage: Rajasthan is known for its traditional, colorful art. The block prints, tie and dye prints, Bagaru prints, Sanganer prints, and Zari embroidery are major export products from Rajasthan. Handicraft items like wooden furniture and crafts, carpets, and blue pottery are commonly found here. Shopping reflects the colorful culture, Rajasthani clothes have a lot of mirror work and embroidery. A Rajasthani traditional dress for females comprises an ankle‑length skirt and a short top, also known as a lehenga or a chaniya choli. A piece of cloth is used to cover the head, both for protection from heat and maintenance of modesty. Rajasthani dresses are usually designed in bright colors like blue, yellow and orange.
question: What is the traditional dress for Rajasthani females commonly known as?

translated_mc_answer2: ድሙቕ ሕብሪ ከም ሰማያዊ፣ ብጫን ኣራንሺን .

passage: For decades, it was the official policy of the Soviet Union to deny the existence of the secret protocol to the Soviet–German Pact. At the behest of Mikhail Gorbachev, Alexander Nikolaevich Yakovlev headed a commission investigating the existence of such a protocol. In December 1989, the commission concluded that the protocol had existed and revealed its findings to the Congress of People's Deputies of the Soviet Union. As a result, the Congress passed the declaration confirming the existence of the secret protocols, condemning and denouncing them. Both successor‑states of the pact parties have declared the secret protocols to be invalid from the moment they were signed. The Federal Republic of Germany declared this on September 1, 1989 and the Soviet Union on December 24, 1989, following an examination of the microfilmed copy of the German originals.
question: What was the official Soviet policy regarding the secret protocol to the Soviet–German Pact?
translated_passage: ንዓሰርተታት ዓመታት፡ ንህላወ ናይቲ ምስጢራዊ ፕሮቶኮል ውዕል ሶቭየት–ጀርመናዊ ውዕል ምኽልካል ወግዓዊ ፖሊሲ ሕብረት ሶቭየት እዩ ነይሩ። ብትእዛዝ ሚካይል ጎርባቸቭ ኣሌክሳንደር ኒኮላቪች ያኮቭለቭ ከምዚ ዓይነት ፕሮቶኮል ከምዘሎ ዝምርምር ኮሚሽን መራሕቲ ኮሚሽን ኣቕሪባ። ኣብ ታሕሳስ 1989፡ እቲ ኮሚሽን እቲ ፕሮቶኮል ከም ዝነበረ ደምዲሙ፡ ንኮንግረስ ምክትላት ህዝቢ ሶቭየት ንኮንግረስ ርኽበታቱ ከም ዘቃልዐ ደምዲሙ። ከም ውጽኢቱ ድማ እቲ ኮንግረስ ህላወ ናይቶም ምስጢራዊ ፕሮቶኮላት ዘረጋግጽ ኣዋጅ ኣሕሊፉ፣ ይኹንንን ይፈርስን ነበረ። ክልቲኦም ተካኢ‐መንግስታት ናይተን ናይ ውዕል ውድባት፡ ካብታ ዝተፈረማላ ህሞት ጀሚራ፡ ነቲ ምስጢራዊ ፕሮቶኮላት ትኽክል ከምዘይኮነ ኣዊጁ ኣሎ። ፌደራል ሪፓብሊክ ጀርመን ነዚ ኣዊጁ ብ1 መስከረም 1989ን ሕብረት ሶቭየትን ብ24 ታሕሳስ 1989 ብማይክሮፊልማድ ቅዳሕ ናይ ጀርመናውያን ኦሪጅናላት ድሕሪ ምርመራ።
translated_question: ወግዓዊ ፖሊሲ ሶቭየት ብዛዕባ ምስጢራዊ ፕሮቶኮል ውዕል ሶቭየት–ጀርመንስ እንታይ እዩ ነይሩ?

passage: For decades, it was the official policy of the Soviet Union to deny the existence of the secret protocol to the Soviet–German Pact. At the behest of Mikhail Gorbachev, Alexander Nikolaevich Yakovlev headed a commission investigating the existence of such a protocol. In December 1989, the commission concluded that the protocol had existed and revealed its findings to the Congress of People's Deputies of the Soviet Union. As a result, the Congress passed the declaration confirming the existence of the secret protocols, condemning and denouncing them. Both successor‑states of the pact parties have declared the secret protocols to be invalid from the moment they were signed. The Federal Republic of Germany declared this on September 1, 1989 and the Soviet Union on December 24, 1989, following an examination of the microfilmed copy of the German originals.
question: When did the Soviet Union officially declare the existence of the secret protocols?

passage: The tribes were ruled by clans (ród) consisting of people related by blood or marriage and theoretically descending from a common ancestor, giving the ród/clan a highly developed sense of solidarity. The starosta (or starszyna) had judicial and military power over the ród/clan, although this power was often exercised with an assembly of elders. Strongholds called grόd were built where the religious cult was powerful, where trials were conducted, and where clans gathered in the face of danger. The opole was the territory occupied by a single tribe.
question: How were the tribes traditionally governed?
mc_answer2: By clans (ród) led by a starosta
translated_passage: እቶም ቀቢላታት ብደም ወይ ሓዳር ዝተኣሳሰሩ ሰባት ዝቖሙ ዓሌታት (Ród) ይግዝኡን ካብ ሓደ ናይ ሓባር ኣቦሓጎ ብክልሰ-ሓሳብ ዝወረዱን ኮይኖም ንሮድ/ክላን ኣዝዩ ዝማዕበለ ናይ ምትሕግጋዝ ስምዒት ሂቦምዎ። እቲ ስታሮስታ (ወይ ስታርስዚና) ኣብ ልዕሊ ሮድ/ክላን ፍርዳዊን ወተሃደራውን ስልጣን ነይርዎ፣ እዚ ስልጣን እዚ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ምስ ምትእኽኻብ ሽማግለታት ዝፍጸም እኳ እንተነበረ። Grόd ዝበሃል ዕርድታት እቲ ሃይማኖታዊ ኣምልኾ ሓያል ኣብ ዝነበረሉ ቦታ ተሃኒጹ፣ ኣብቲ ፈተናታት ዝተኻየደሉ፣ ኣብ ቅድሚ ሓደጋ ዓሌታት ኣብ ዝተኣከበሉ ቦታ። እቲ ኦፖል ብሓደ ቀቢላ ዝተሓዝአ ግዝኣት እዩ ነይሩ።

translated_passage: እቶም ቀቢላታት ብደም ወይ ሓዳር ዝተኣሳሰሩ ሰባት ዝቖሙ ዓሌታት (Ród) ይግዝኡን ካብ ሓደ ናይ ሓባር ኣቦሓጎ ብክልሰ-ሓሳብ ዝወረዱን ኮይኖም ንሮድ/ክላን ኣዝዩ ዝማዕበለ ናይ ምትሕግጋዝ ስምዒት ሂቦምዎ። እቲ ስታሮስታ (ወይ ስታርስዚና) ኣብ ልዕሊ ሮድ/ክላን ፍርዳዊን ወተሃደራውን ስልጣን ነይርዎ፣ እዚ ስልጣን እዚ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ምስ ምትእኽኻብ ሽማግለታት ዝፍጸም እኳ እንተነበረ። Grόd ዝበሃል ዕርድታት እቲ ሃይማኖታዊ ኣምልኾ ሓያል ኣብ ዝነበረሉ ቦታ ተሃኒጹ፣ ኣብቲ ፈተናታት ዝተኻየደሉ፣ ኣብ ቅድሚ ሓደጋ ዓሌታት ኣብ ዝተኣከበሉ ቦታ። እቲ ኦፖል ብሓደ ቀቢላ ዝተሓዝአ ግዝኣት እዩ ነይሩ።

passage: The topography of the state is roughly defined by the Continental Divide, which splits much of the state into distinct eastern and western regions. Most of Montana's 100 or more named mountain ranges are concentrated in the western half of the state, most of which is geologically and geographically part of the Northern Rocky Mountains. The Absaroka and Beartooth ranges in the south‑central part of the state are technically part of the Central Rocky Mountains. The Rocky Mountain Front is a significant feature in the north‑central portion of the state, and there are a number of isolated island ranges that interrupt the prairie landscape common in the central and eastern parts of the state. About 60 percent of the state is prairie, part of the northern Great Plains.
question: What major natural feature roughly defines the state’s topography?
translated_passage: መልክዓ ምድሪ እታ ግዝኣት ብግምት በቲ ንመብዛሕትኡ ክፋል እታ ግዝኣት ናብ ፍሉያት ምብራቓውያንን ምዕራባውያንን ዞባታት ዝመቓቕል ኣህጉራዊ ምፍልላይ ይግለጽ። መብዛሕትኦም 100 ወይ ልዕሊኡ ስሞም ዝተሰምዩ ሰንሰለታት ኣኽራናት ኣብ ምዕራባዊ ፍርቂ ናይታ ግዝኣት ዝተዋህለሉ ኮይኖም መብዛሕትኦም ብስነ-ምድራዊን ብጂኦግራፍያውን ኣገባብ ኣካል ሰሜናዊ ሮኪ ማውንተይን እዮም። ኣብ ደቡባዊ ማእከላይ ክፋል እታ ግዝኣት ዝርከቡ ናይ ኣሳሮካን ድብን ሰንሰለታት ብቴክኒካዊ መዳይ ኣካል ማእከላይ ሮኪ ማውንተይን እዮም። እቲ ሮኪ ማውንተይን ግንባር ኣብ ሰሜናዊ ማእከላይ ክፋል ናይታ ግዝኣት ትርጉም ዘለዎ መለለዪ ኮይኑ፡ ኣብ ማእከላይን ምብራቓውን ክፋል እታ ግዝኣት ልሙድ ዝኾነ ፕረሪ ላንድስኬፕ ዘቋርጽ ብርክት ዝበሉ ዝተነጸሉ ሰንሰለታት ደሴታት ኣለዉ። ኣስታት 60 ሚእታዊት ናይታ ግዝኣት ፕረሪ ዝበሃል ኣካል ሰሜናዊ ዓቢ ቆላታት እዩ።

passage: Much of the early colonial art stemmed from the codices (Aztec illustrated books), aiming to recover and preserve some Aztec and other Amerindian iconography and history. From then, artistic expressions in Mexico were mostly religious in theme. The Metropolitan Cathedral still displays works by Juan de Rojas, Juan Correa and an oil painting whose authorship has been attributed to Murillo. Secular works of art of this period include the equestrian sculpture of Charles IV of Spain, locally known as El Caballito ('The little horse'). This piece, in bronze, was the work of Manuel Tolsá and it has been placed at the Plaza Tolsá, in front of the Palacio de Minería. Directly in front of this building is the beautiful Museo Nacional de Arte (Munal) (the National Museum of Art).
question: What was the primary theme of early colonial art in Mexico?
translated_passage: መብዛሕትኡ እቲ ናይ መጀመርታ መግዛእታዊ ስነ-ጥበብ ካብቲ ኮዲስ (Aztec Illustrated Books) ዝበሃል፡ ገለ ኣዝቴክን ካልኦት ኣሜሪንዲያን ስእላዊ ስእልታትን ታሪኽን ንምምላስን ንምዕቃብን ዝዓለመ እዩ። ካብ ሽዑ ጀሚሩ ኣብ ሜክሲኮ ስነ-ጥበባዊ መግለጺታት መብዛሕትኡ ኣብ ቴማ ሃይማኖታዊ እዩ ነይሩ። እቲ ሜትሮፖሊታን ካቴድራል ክሳብ ሕጂ ብጁዋን ደ ሮሃስ ስራሓት የቕርብ፣ ጁዋን ኮርያን ሓደ ናይ ዘይቲ ቅብኣን ድማ ጸሓፍቱ ምስ ሙሪሎ ከምዝተመጣጠነ እዩ። ኣብዚ እዋን እዚ ዚርከብ ዓለማዊ ስነ-ጥበባዊ ስርሓት፡ ነቲ ብኤል ካባሊቶ (‘እታ ንእሽቶ ፈረስ’) ዝፍለጥ፡ ቻርለስ ራብዓይ ናይ ስጳኛ ቻርለስ ራብዓይ 1ይ ቻርለስ ራብዓይ ዚብል ቅርጺ ፈረሰኛታት ዚርከቦ ቅርጺ ፈረሰኛታት የጠቓልል። እዛ ኣብ ብሮንዝ ዝተሰርሐት ቁራጽ ስራሕ ማኑኤል ቶልሳ ኮይና ኣብ ቅድሚ ፓላሲዮ ደ ሚነነርያ ኣብ ፕላዛ ቶልሳ ተቐሚጣ ኣላ። ብቐጥታ ኣብ ቅድሚ እዚ ህንጻ እዚ እታ ምጭውቲ ሙሴዮ ናሽናል ደ ኣርተ (ማናል) (ሃገራዊ ቤተ መዘክር ስነ ጥበብ) ኣላ።
translated_question: ኣብ ሜክሲኮ ቀዳማይ መግዛእታዊ ስነ ጥበብ ቀንዲ ቴማ እንታይ እዩ ነይሩ?

translated_passage: መብዛሕትኡ እቲ ናይ መጀመርታ መግዛእታዊ ስነ-ጥበብ ካብቲ ኮዲስ (Aztec Illustrated Books) ዝበሃል፡ ገለ ኣዝቴክን ካልኦት ኣሜሪንዲያን ስእላዊ ስእልታትን ታሪኽን ንምምላስን ንምዕቃብን ዝዓለመ እዩ። ካብ ሽዑ ጀሚሩ ኣብ ሜክሲኮ ስነ-ጥበባዊ መግለጺታት መብዛሕትኡ ኣብ ቴማ ሃይማኖታዊ እዩ ነይሩ። እቲ ሜትሮፖሊታን ካቴድራል ክሳብ ሕጂ ብጁዋን ደ ሮሃስ ስራሓት የቕርብ፣ ጁዋን ኮርያን ሓደ ናይ ዘይቲ ቅብኣን ድማ ጸሓፍቱ ምስ ሙሪሎ ከምዝተመጣጠነ እዩ። ኣብዚ እዋን እዚ ዚርከብ ዓለማዊ ስነ-ጥበባዊ ስርሓት፡ ነቲ ብኤል ካባሊቶ (‘እታ ንእሽቶ ፈረስ’) ዝፍለጥ፡ ቻርለስ ራብዓይ ናይ ስጳኛ ቻርለስ ራብዓይ 1ይ ቻርለስ ራብዓይ ዚብል ቅርጺ ፈረሰኛታት ዚርከቦ ቅርጺ ፈረሰኛታት የጠቓልል። እዛ ኣብ ብሮንዝ ዝተሰርሐት ቁራጽ ስራሕ ማኑኤል ቶልሳ ኮይና ኣብ ቅድሚ ፓላሲዮ ደ ሚነነርያ ኣብ ፕላዛ ቶልሳ ተቐሚጣ ኣላ። ብቐጥታ ኣብ ቅድሚ እዚ ህንጻ እዚ እታ ምጭውቲ ሙሴዮ ናሽናል ደ ኣርተ (ማናል) (ሃገራዊ ቤተ መዘክር ስነ ጥበብ) ኣላ።
translated_question: ኣየናይ ህቡብ ዓለማዊ ስራሕ ኣየናይ እዩ ኣብቲ ከባቢ 'ኤል ካባሊቶ' ተባሂሉ ዝፍለጥ?
translated_mc_answer2: ናይ ቻርለስ ራብዓይ ናይ ስጳኛ ቅርጺ ፈረሰኛ

passage: Much of the early colonial art stemmed from the codices (Aztec illustrated books), aiming to recover and preserve some Aztec and other Amerindian iconography and history. From then, artistic expressions in Mexico were mostly religious in theme. The Metropolitan Cathedral still displays works by Juan de Rojas, Juan Correa and an oil painting whose authorship has been attributed to Murillo. Secular works of art of this period include the equestrian sculpture of Charles IV of Spain, locally known as El Caballito ('The little horse'). This piece, in bronze, was the work of Manuel Tolsá and it has been placed at the Plaza Tolsá, in front of the Palacio de Minería. Directly in front of this building is the beautiful Museo Nacional de Arte (Munal) (the National Museum of Art).
question: Where is the equestrian sculpture ('El Caballito') located?
mc_answer2: At Plaza Tolsá in front of the Palacio de Minería
mc_answer3: In the National Museum of Art
