translated_question: እቲ ናይ ፈረሰኛታት ቅርጺ ('ኤል ካባሊቶ') ኣበይ ይርከብ?
translated_mc_answer2: ኣብ ቶልሳ ፕላዛ ኣብ ቅድሚ ቤተ መንግስቲ ዕደና
translated_mc_answer3: ኣብ ሃገራዊ ቤተ መዘክር ስነ ጥበብ

passage: LeToya Luckett and Roberson became unhappy with Mathew's managing of the band and eventually were replaced by Farrah Franklin and Michelle Williams. Beyoncé experienced depression following the split with Luckett and Roberson after being publicly blamed by the media, critics, and blogs for its cause. Her long‑standing boyfriend left her at this time. The depression was so severe it lasted for a couple of years, during which she occasionally kept herself in her bedroom for days and refused to eat anything. Beyoncé stated that she struggled to speak about her depression because Destiny's Child had just won their first Grammy Award and she feared no one would take her seriously. Beyoncé would later speak of her mother as the person who helped her fight it. Franklin was dismissed, leaving just Beyoncé, Rowland, and Williams.
question: Which members of the band became unhappy and were replaced?
translated_passage: ለቶያ ሉኬትን ሮበርሰንን ምስ ማቴዎስ ማናጅንግ ኦፍ ዘ ፒንድ ሕጉሳት ኮይኖም ኣብ መወዳእታ ብፋራህ ፍራንክሊንን ሚሸል ዊልያምስን ተተኪኦም እዮም። ቢዮንሴ ንዕላማኡ ብማዕከናት ዜናን ነቐፍትንን ብሎግን ብግልጺ ድሕሪ ምውቃስ ምስ ሉኬትን ሮበርሰንን ድሕሪ ምፍንጫል ድሕሪ ምፍንጫል ጭንቀት ኣጋጢምዋ። ኣብዚ ግዜ እዚ ነዊሕ ዝጸንሐ ኣፍቃሪኣ ገዲፍዋ። እቲ ጭንቀት ኣዝዩ ከቢድ ስለ ዝነበረ ንሓደ ክልተ ዓመት ዝጸንሐ ኮይኑ፡ ኣብቲ እዋን’ቲ ሓሓሊፋ ንመዓልታት ኣብ መደቀሲኣ ትጸንሕ ስለ ዝነበረት፡ ዝኾነ ነገር ምብላዕ ኣብያ። ቢዮንሴ ብዛዕባ ጭንቀታ ክትዛረብ ከም ዝተቓለሰት ገሊጻ፡ ምኽንያቱ ውላድ ደስቲኒ ናይ መጀመርታ ሽልማት ግራሚ ስለ ዝዓወተን፡ ዝኾነ ሰብ ብዕቱብ ከይወስዶ ስለ ዝፈርሐትን ገሊጻ። ቢዮንሴ ድሒራ ብዛዕባ ኣዲኣ ከም’ታ ክትቃለሳ ዝሓገዛ ሰብ ትዛረብ ነበረት። ፍራንክሊን ተባሪሩ፡ ቢዮንሴ፡ ሮውላንድን ዊልያምስን ጥራይ ገዲፉ።
translated_question: ኣየኖት ኣባላት ናይታ ባንድ ኣየኖት ሕጉሳት ዘይኮኑን ተተኪኦምን?

translated_passage: ለቶያ ሉኬትን ሮበርሰንን ምስ ማቴዎስ ማናጅንግ ኦፍ ዘ ፒንድ ሕጉሳት ኮይኖም ኣብ መወዳእታ ብፋራህ ፍራንክሊንን ሚሸል ዊልያምስን ተተኪኦም እዮም። ቢዮንሴ ንዕላማኡ ብማዕከናት ዜናን ነቐፍትንን ብሎግን ብግልጺ ድሕሪ ምውቃስ ምስ ሉኬትን ሮበርሰንን ድሕሪ ምፍንጫል ድሕሪ ምፍንጫል ጭንቀት ኣጋጢምዋ። ኣብዚ ግዜ እዚ ነዊሕ ዝጸንሐ ኣፍቃሪኣ ገዲፍዋ። እቲ ጭንቀት ኣዝዩ ከቢድ ስለ ዝነበረ ንሓደ ክልተ ዓመት ዝጸንሐ ኮይኑ፡ ኣብቲ እዋን’ቲ ሓሓሊፋ ንመዓልታት ኣብ መደቀሲኣ ትጸንሕ ስለ ዝነበረት፡ ዝኾነ ነገር ምብላዕ ኣብያ። ቢዮንሴ ብዛዕባ ጭንቀታ ክትዛረብ ከም ዝተቓለሰት ገሊጻ፡ ምኽንያቱ ውላድ ደስቲኒ ናይ መጀመርታ ሽልማት ግራሚ ስለ ዝዓወተን፡ ዝኾነ ሰብ ብዕቱብ ከይወስዶ ስለ ዝፈርሐትን ገሊጻ። ቢዮንሴ ድሒራ ብዛዕባ ኣዲኣ ከም’ታ ክትቃለሳ ዝሓገዛ ሰብ ትዛረብ ነበረት። ፍራንክሊን ተባሪሩ፡ ቢዮንሴ፡ ሮውላንድን ዊልያምስን ጥራይ ገዲፉ።
translated_question: ቢዮንሴ ንጭንቀታ ክትቃለስ ከም ዝሓገዛ መን ይግበኣ?

passage: The main mountain range in the state is the Sierra Madre Occidental reaching a maximum altitude of 10,826 ft (3,300 m) known as Cerro Mohinora. Mountains account for one third of the state's surface area which include large coniferous forests. The climate in the mountainous regions varies; Chihuahua has more forests than any other state in Mexico making the area a bountiful source of wood; the mountainous areas are rich in minerals important to Mexico's mining industry. Precipitation and temperature in the mountainous areas depends on the elevation. Between the months of November and March snow storms are possible in the lower elevations and are frequent in the higher elevations. There are several watersheds located in the Sierra Madre Occidental—all of the water that flows through the state; most of the rivers finally empty into the Río Grande. Temperatures in some canyons in the state reach over 100 °F in the summer while the same areas rarely drop below 32 °F in the winter. Microclimates found in the heart of the Sierra Madre Occidental in the state could be considered tropical, and wild tropical plants have been found in some canyons. La Barranca del Cobre, or Copper Canyon, a spectacular canyon system larger and deeper than the Grand Canyon; the canyon also contains Mexico's two tallest waterfalls: Basaseachic Falls and Piedra Volada. There are two national parks found in the mountainous area of the state: Cumbres de Majalca National Park and Basaseachic Falls National Park.
question: What is the name of the primary mountain range mentioned?
translated_passage: ኣብቲ ግዝኣት ቀንዲ ሰንሰለት ኣኽራናት ሴራ ማድረ ኦክሲደንታል ዝለዓለ ቁመት 10,826 ጫማ (3,300 ሜትር) ብሴሮ ሞሂኖራ ዝፍለጥ እዩ። ኣኽራናት ንሓደ ሲሶ ናይቲ ኣብታ ግዝኣት ዝርከብ ስፍሓት ገጽ መሬት ይሕዙ እሞ እዚ ድማ ሰፊሕ ቈርበት ዘለዎ ጫካታት ዘጠቓልል እዩ። ኣብቲ ኣኽራናዊ ዞባታት ዘሎ ክሊማ ይፈላለ እዩ፤ ቺዋዋ ካብ ዝኾነት ካልእ ግዝኣት ኣብ ሜክሲኮ ዝያዳ ጫካታት ኣለዋ ነቲ ከባቢ ፍንፉን ምንጪ ዕንጨይቲ ትገብሮ፤ እቲ ኣኽራናዊ ከባቢታት ንኢንዱስትሪ ዕደና ሜክሲኮ ኣገደስቲ ዝኾኑ ማዕድናት ዝሃብተሙ እዮም። ኣብቲ ኣኽራናዊ ከባቢታት ዝናብን ሙቐትን ኣብቲ ቁመት ይምርኮስ። ኣብ መንጎ ኣዋርሕ ሕዳርን መጋቢትን ህቦብላ በረድ ኣብ ታሕተዋይ ቁመት ዝከኣል ኮይኑ ኣብ ዝለዓለ ቁመት ብተደጋጋሚ ይርአ። ኣብ ሴራ ማድረ ኦክሲደንታል - ኩሉ እቲ ብመንግስቲ ዝውሕዝ ማይ - ኣብ ሴራ ማድረ ኦክሲደንታል ዝርከቡ ሓያሎ መፋስሳት ኣለዉ፤ መብዛሕትኦም ሩባታት ኣብ መወዳእታ ናብ ሪዮ ግራንዲ ባዶ ይገብሩ። ኣብ ገለ ካንዮናት ኣብቲ ግዝኣት ዘሎ ሙቐት ኣብ ሓጋይ ልዕሊ 100 °F ክበጽሕ እንከሎ፡ ኣብ ክረምቲ ድማ ተመሳሳሊ ከባቢታት ሳሕቲ ትሕቲ 32 °F ዝንኪ እዩ። ኣብቲ ግዝኣት ኣብ ማእከል ሴራ ማድረ ኦክሲደንታል ዝተረኽቡ ማይክሮክላይመትስ ትሮፒካዊ ክቑጸሩ ይኽእሉ እዮም፣ ኣብ ገለ ካንዮናት ድማ ትሮፒካዊ ትሮፒካዊ ተኽልታት ተረኺቦም እዮም። ላ ባራንካ ደል ኮብረ ወይ ኮፐር ካንዮን፡ ካብቲ ግራንድ ካንዮን ዝዓበየን ዝዓሞቐን መስተንክር ስርዓተ ካንዮን፤ እቲ ካንዮን ክልተ ዝነውሐ ፏፏቴታት ሜክሲኮ እውን ዝሓዘ እዩ: ባሳሰቺች ፏፏቴን ፒየድራ ቮላዳን። ኣብቲ ኣኽራናዊ ከባቢ እታ ግዝኣት ክልተ ሃገራዊ መናፈሻታት ተረኺቦም ኣለዉ፡ ሃገራዊ ፓርክ ካምብሬስ ደ ማጃልካን ሃገራዊ ፓርክ ባሳሰቺች ፎልስን።
translated_question: ስም ናይቲ ተጠቒሱ ዘሎ ቀዳማይ ሰንሰለት ኣኽራን እንታይ ይበሃል?

translated_passage: ኣብቲ ግዝኣት ቀንዲ ሰንሰለት ኣኽራናት ሴራ ማድረ ኦክሲደንታል ዝለዓለ ቁመት 10,826 ጫማ (3,300 ሜትር) ብሴሮ ሞሂኖራ ዝፍለጥ እዩ። ኣኽራናት ንሓደ ሲሶ ናይቲ ኣብታ ግዝኣት ዝርከብ ስፍሓት ገጽ መሬት ይሕዙ እሞ እዚ ድማ ሰፊሕ ቈርበት ዘለዎ ጫካታት ዘጠቓልል እዩ። ኣብቲ ኣኽራናዊ ዞባታት ዘሎ ክሊማ ይፈላለ እዩ፤ ቺዋዋ ካብ ዝኾነት ካልእ ግዝኣት ኣብ ሜክሲኮ ዝያዳ ጫካታት ኣለዋ ነቲ ከባቢ ፍንፉን ምንጪ ዕንጨይቲ ትገብሮ፤ እቲ ኣኽራናዊ ከባቢታት ንኢንዱስትሪ ዕደና ሜክሲኮ ኣገደስቲ ዝኾኑ ማዕድናት ዝሃብተሙ እዮም። ኣብቲ ኣኽራናዊ ከባቢታት ዝናብን ሙቐትን ኣብቲ ቁመት ይምርኮስ። ኣብ መንጎ ኣዋርሕ ሕዳርን መጋቢትን ህቦብላ በረድ ኣብ ታሕተዋይ ቁመት ዝከኣል ኮይኑ ኣብ ዝለዓለ ቁመት ብተደጋጋሚ ይርአ። ኣብ ሴራ ማድረ ኦክሲደንታል - ኩሉ እቲ ብመንግስቲ ዝውሕዝ ማይ - ኣብ ሴራ ማድረ ኦክሲደንታል ዝርከቡ ሓያሎ መፋስሳት ኣለዉ፤ መብዛሕትኦም ሩባታት ኣብ መወዳእታ ናብ ሪዮ ግራንዲ ባዶ ይገብሩ። ኣብ ገለ ካንዮናት ኣብቲ ግዝኣት ዘሎ ሙቐት ኣብ ሓጋይ ልዕሊ 100 °F ክበጽሕ እንከሎ፡ ኣብ ክረምቲ ድማ ተመሳሳሊ ከባቢታት ሳሕቲ ትሕቲ 32 °F ዝንኪ እዩ። ኣብቲ ግዝኣት ኣብ ማእከል ሴራ ማድረ ኦክሲደንታል ዝተረኽቡ ማይክሮክላይመትስ ትሮፒካዊ ክቑጸሩ ይኽእሉ እዮም፣ ኣብ ገለ ካንዮናት ድማ ትሮፒካዊ ትሮፒካዊ ተኽልታት ተረኺቦም እዮም። ላ ባራንካ ደል ኮብረ ወይ ኮፐር ካንዮን፡ ካብቲ ግራንድ ካንዮን ዝዓበየን ዝዓሞቐን መስተንክር ስርዓተ ካንዮን፤ እቲ ካንዮን ክልተ ዝነውሐ ፏፏቴታት ሜክሲኮ እውን ዝሓዘ እዩ: ባሳሰቺች ፏፏቴን ፒየድራ ቮላዳን። ኣብቲ ኣኽራናዊ ከባቢ እታ ግዝኣት ክልተ ሃገራዊ መናፈሻታት ተረኺቦም ኣለዉ፡ ሃገራዊ ፓርክ ካምብሬስ ደ ማጃልካን ሃገራዊ ፓርክ ባሳሰቺች ፎልስን።

translated_passage: ኣብቲ ግዝኣት ቀንዲ ሰንሰለት ኣኽራናት ሴራ ማድረ ኦክሲደንታል ዝለዓለ ቁመት 10,826 ጫማ (3,300 ሜትር) ብሴሮ ሞሂኖራ ዝፍለጥ እዩ። ኣኽራናት ንሓደ ሲሶ ናይቲ ኣብታ ግዝኣት ዝርከብ ስፍሓት ገጽ መሬት ይሕዙ እሞ እዚ ድማ ሰፊሕ ቈርበት ዘለዎ ጫካታት ዘጠቓልል እዩ። ኣብቲ ኣኽራናዊ ዞባታት ዘሎ ክሊማ ይፈላለ እዩ፤ ቺዋዋ ካብ ዝኾነት ካልእ ግዝኣት ኣብ ሜክሲኮ ዝያዳ ጫካታት ኣለዋ ነቲ ከባቢ ፍንፉን ምንጪ ዕንጨይቲ ትገብሮ፤ እቲ ኣኽራናዊ ከባቢታት ንኢንዱስትሪ ዕደና ሜክሲኮ ኣገደስቲ ዝኾኑ ማዕድናት ዝሃብተሙ እዮም። ኣብቲ ኣኽራናዊ ከባቢታት ዝናብን ሙቐትን ኣብቲ ቁመት ይምርኮስ። ኣብ መንጎ ኣዋርሕ ሕዳርን መጋቢትን ህቦብላ በረድ ኣብ ታሕተዋይ ቁመት ዝከኣል ኮይኑ ኣብ ዝለዓለ ቁመት ብተደጋጋሚ ይርአ። ኣብ ሴራ ማድረ ኦክሲደንታል - ኩሉ እቲ ብመንግስቲ ዝውሕዝ ማይ - ኣብ ሴራ ማድረ ኦክሲደንታል ዝርከቡ ሓያሎ መፋስሳት ኣለዉ፤ መብዛሕትኦም ሩባታት ኣብ መወዳእታ ናብ ሪዮ ግራንዲ ባዶ ይገብሩ። ኣብ ገለ ካንዮናት ኣብቲ ግዝኣት ዘሎ ሙቐት ኣብ ሓጋይ ልዕሊ 100 °F ክበጽሕ እንከሎ፡ ኣብ ክረምቲ ድማ ተመሳሳሊ ከባቢታት ሳሕቲ ትሕቲ 32 °F ዝንኪ እዩ። ኣብቲ ግዝኣት ኣብ ማእከል ሴራ ማድረ ኦክሲደንታል ዝተረኽቡ ማይክሮክላይመትስ ትሮፒካዊ ክቑጸሩ ይኽእሉ እዮም፣ ኣብ ገለ ካንዮናት ድማ ትሮፒካዊ ትሮፒካዊ ተኽልታት ተረኺቦም እዮም። ላ ባራንካ ደል ኮብረ ወይ ኮፐር ካንዮን፡ ካብቲ ግራንድ ካንዮን ዝዓበየን ዝዓሞቐን መስተንክር ስርዓተ ካንዮን፤ እቲ ካንዮን ክልተ ዝነውሐ ፏፏቴታት ሜክሲኮ እውን ዝሓዘ እዩ: ባሳሰቺች ፏፏቴን ፒየድራ ቮላዳን። ኣብቲ ኣኽራናዊ ከባቢ እታ ግዝኣት ክልተ ሃገራዊ መናፈሻታት ተረኺቦም ኣለዉ፡ ሃገራዊ ፓርክ ካምብሬስ ደ ማጃልካን ሃገራዊ ፓርክ ባሳሰቺች ፎልስን።
translated_question: ካብ ግራንድ ካንዮን ዝዓበየን ዝዓሞቐን ተባሂሉ ዝግለጽ ስርዓተ ካንዮን ኣየናይ እዩ ተጠቒሱ?

passage: One hundred years after the fall of Constantinople in 1453, Pierre Belon described in his work Observations in 1553 that pissasphalto, a mixture of pitch and bitumen, was used in Dubrovnik for tarring of ships from where it was exported to a market place in Venice where it could be bought by anyone. An 1838 edition of Mechanics Magazine cites an early use of asphalt in France. A pamphlet dated 1621, by 'a certain Monsieur d'Eyrinys,' states that he had discovered the existence (of asphaltum) in large quantities in the vicinity of Neufchatel, and that he proposed to use it in a variety of ways – 'principally in the construction of air‑proof granaries, and in protecting, by means of the arches, the water‑courses in the city of Paris from the intrusion of dirt and filth', which at that time made the water unusable. 'He expatiates also on the excellence of this material for forming level and durable terraces' in palaces, 'the notion of forming such terraces in the streets not one likely to cross the brain of a Parisian of that generation'. But it was generally neglected in France until the revolution of 1830. Then, in the 1830s, there was a surge of interest, and asphalt became widely used 'for pavements, flat roofs, and the lining of cisterns, and in England, some use of it had been made for similar purposes'. Its rise in Europe was 'a sudden phenomenon', after natural deposits were found 'in France at Osbann (BasRhin), the Parc (l'Ain) and the Puy-de-la-Poix (Puy-de-Dôme)', although it could also be made artificially.
question: What substance did Pierre Belon report was used in Dubrovnik for tarring ships?
mc_answer2: Pissasphalto (a mixture of pitch and bitumen)
translated_passage: ድሕሪ ሚእቲ ዓመት ድሕሪ ውድቀት ቁስጥንጥንያ ብ1453 ፒየር ቤሎን ኣብ 1553 ኣብ ዝነበረ ናይ ስራሕ ትዕዝብቲ ገሊጽዎ ከም ዝነበረ፡ ፒሳስፋልቶ፡ ፒሳስፋልቶ፡ ዝተሓዋወሰ ድምጺን ቅጥራንን፡ ኣብ ዱብሮቭኒክ፡ ካብቲ ዝለኣኸሉ ቦታ ናብ ዝለኣኸሉ ቦታ ንምቑራጽ ኣብ ዱብሮቭኒክ ከም ዝተጠቕመሉ፡ ብዝኾነ ይኹን ሰብ ክዕደግ ዝኽእለሉ ዕዳጋ ቦታ። ኣብ 1838 ዝወጸ ሕታም መጽሔት መካኒክስ፡ ኣብ ፈረንሳ ንኣስፋልት ብኣግኡ ከም ዝጥቀማ ጠቒሳ። 1621 ብዕለት 1621 ዝተጻሕፈት ፓምፍሌት፡ ብ‘ዝተወሰደ ሞንሲየር ዲ’ኢሪኒስ’፡ ህላወ (ናይ ኣስፋልትተልተም) ብብዝሒ ኣብ ከባቢ ኒውፍቻተል ከም ዝረኸቦን፡ ብዝተፈላለየ መንገዲ ክጥቀመላ ከም ዝሓሰበን - ‘መኣዝን ኣብ ህንፀት ኣየር ኣብ ልዕሊ እቲ ብኸምዚ ዝኣከበን ብኸምዚ ዝከላኸለሉ ምኽንያት፣ ኣብ ልዕሊ እቲ ቐመማት ዝከላኸለሉ፣ ኣብ ልዕሊ እቲ ማይ ዝፍለጠሉ ምኽንያት፣ እቲ ማይ ከም ዝኣተዎን፣ እቲ ማይ ከም ዝሃበን ይገልጽ። ምትእትታው ሓመድን ርስሓትን’፡ ኣብቲ እዋን’ቲ ነቲ ማይ ዘይጥቀመሉ ገበሮ። 'ንሱ'ውን ኣብ ብሉጽነት ናይዚ ንዋት ንምፍጣር ደረጃን ነዊሕ ዝጸንሕ ቴራስን' ኣብ ቤተ መንግስታት፡ 'እቲ ኣብ ጎደናታት ከምዚ ዝኣመሰለ ቴራስ ናይ ምፍጣር ዝብል ኣተሓሳስባ፡ ሓንጎል ናይ ሓደ ናይቲ ወለዶ ፓሪስ ክሰግር ዘይክእል ኣይኮነን' ኢሉ የውጽኦ። ግን ብሓፈሻ ኣብ ፈረንሳ ክሳብ ሰውራ 1830 ሸለል ተባሂሉ።ድሕሪኡ ኣብ 1830ታት ናይ ተገዳስነት ምልዕዓል ነበረ፣ ኣስፋልት ድማ ‘ንጽርግያታት፣ ጸፍሒ ናሕሲ፣ ከምኡውን ንመሸፈኒ ዕንቅርቢታት፣ ኣብ ዓዲ እንግሊዝ ድማ ገለ ኣጠቓቕማኡ ንተመሳሳሊ ዕላማታት ተገይሩሉ’ ብሰፊሑ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ይውዕል ነበረ። ኣብ ኤውሮጳ ዝለዓለሉ ዝነበረ እዋን ‘ሃንደበታዊ ተርእዮ’ እዩ ነይሩ፣ ተፈጥሮኣዊ ቅብኣት ‘ኣብ ፈረንሳ ኣብ ኦስባን (ባስረን)፣ ፓርክ (L'Ain)ን ፑይ-ደ-ላ-ፖይክስ (ፑይ-ደ-ዶም)ን ድሕሪ ምርካቡ፣ ዋላ’ውን ኣርቲፊሻል ክግበር ዝኽእል’ውን እንተኾነ።
translated_question: ፒየር ቤሎን ኣብ ዱብሮቭኒክ ንመራኽብ ቆርቆሮ እንታይ ዓይነት ንጥረ ነገር ተጠቒሙ?

passage: One hundred years after the fall of Constantinople in 1453, Pierre Belon described in his work Observations in 1553 that pissasphalto, a mixture of pitch and bitumen, was used in Dubrovnik for tarring of ships from where it was exported to a market place in Venice where it could be bought by anyone. An 1838 edition of Mechanics Magazine cites an early use of asphalt in France. A pamphlet dated 1621, by 'a certain Monsieur d'Eyrinys,' states that he had discovered the existence (of asphaltum) in large quantities in the vicinity of Neufchatel, and that he proposed to use it in a variety of ways – 'principally in the construction of air‑proof granaries, and in protecting, by means of the arches, the water‑courses in the city of Paris from the intrusion of dirt and filth', which at that time made the water unusable. 'He expatiates also on the excellence of this material for forming level and durable terraces' in palaces, 'the notion of forming such terraces in the streets not one likely to cross the brain of a Parisian of that generation'. But it was generally neglected in France until the revolution of 1830. Then, in the 1830s, there was a surge of interest, and asphalt became widely used 'for pavements, flat roofs, and the lining of cisterns, and in England, some use of it had been made for similar purposes'. Its rise in Europe was 'a sudden phenomenon', after natural deposits were found 'in France at Osbann (BasRhin), the Parc (l'Ain) and the Puy-de-la-Poix (Puy-de-Dôme)', although it could also be made artificially.
question: According to the pamphlet, what was a proposed use for asphaltum?
mc_answer2: For constructing air‑proof granaries and protecting water‑courses
translated_passage: ድሕሪ ሚእቲ ዓመት ድሕሪ ውድቀት ቁስጥንጥንያ ብ1453 ፒየር ቤሎን ኣብ 1553 ኣብ ዝነበረ ናይ ስራሕ ትዕዝብቲ ገሊጽዎ ከም ዝነበረ፡ ፒሳስፋልቶ፡ ፒሳስፋልቶ፡ ዝተሓዋወሰ ድምጺን ቅጥራንን፡ ኣብ ዱብሮቭኒክ፡ ካብቲ ዝለኣኸሉ ቦታ ናብ ዝለኣኸሉ ቦታ ንምቑራጽ ኣብ ዱብሮቭኒክ ከም ዝተጠቕመሉ፡ ብዝኾነ ይኹን ሰብ ክዕደግ ዝኽእለሉ ዕዳጋ ቦታ። ኣብ 1838 ዝወጸ ሕታም መጽሔት መካኒክስ፡ ኣብ ፈረንሳ ንኣስፋልት ብኣግኡ ከም ዝጥቀማ ጠቒሳ። 1621 ብዕለት 1621 ዝተጻሕፈት ፓምፍሌት፡ ብ‘ዝተወሰደ ሞንሲየር ዲ’ኢሪኒስ’፡ ህላወ (ናይ ኣስፋልትተልተም) ብብዝሒ ኣብ ከባቢ ኒውፍቻተል ከም ዝረኸቦን፡ ብዝተፈላለየ መንገዲ ክጥቀመላ ከም ዝሓሰበን - ‘መኣዝን ኣብ ህንፀት ኣየር ኣብ ልዕሊ እቲ ብኸምዚ ዝኣከበን ብኸምዚ ዝከላኸለሉ ምኽንያት፣ ኣብ ልዕሊ እቲ ቐመማት ዝከላኸለሉ፣ ኣብ ልዕሊ እቲ ማይ ዝፍለጠሉ ምኽንያት፣ እቲ ማይ ከም ዝኣተዎን፣ እቲ ማይ ከም ዝሃበን ይገልጽ። ምትእትታው ሓመድን ርስሓትን’፡ ኣብቲ እዋን’ቲ ነቲ ማይ ዘይጥቀመሉ ገበሮ። 'ንሱ'ውን ኣብ ብሉጽነት ናይዚ ንዋት ንምፍጣር ደረጃን ነዊሕ ዝጸንሕ ቴራስን' ኣብ ቤተ መንግስታት፡ 'እቲ ኣብ ጎደናታት ከምዚ ዝኣመሰለ ቴራስ ናይ ምፍጣር ዝብል ኣተሓሳስባ፡ ሓንጎል ናይ ሓደ ናይቲ ወለዶ ፓሪስ ክሰግር ዘይክእል ኣይኮነን' ኢሉ የውጽኦ። ግን ብሓፈሻ ኣብ ፈረንሳ ክሳብ ሰውራ 1830 ሸለል ተባሂሉ።ድሕሪኡ ኣብ 1830ታት ናይ ተገዳስነት ምልዕዓል ነበረ፣ ኣስፋልት ድማ ‘ንጽርግያታት፣ ጸፍሒ ናሕሲ፣ ከምኡውን ንመሸፈኒ ዕንቅርቢታት፣ ኣብ ዓዲ እንግሊዝ ድማ ገለ ኣጠቓቕማኡ ንተመሳሳሊ ዕላማታት ተገይሩሉ’ ብሰፊሑ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ይውዕል ነበረ። ኣብ ኤውሮጳ ዝለዓለሉ ዝነበረ እዋን ‘ሃንደበታዊ ተርእዮ’ እዩ ነይሩ፣ ተፈጥሮኣዊ ቅብኣት ‘ኣብ ፈረንሳ ኣብ ኦስባን (ባስረን)፣ ፓርክ (L'Ain)ን ፑይ-ደ-ላ-ፖይክስ (ፑይ-ደ-ዶም)ን ድሕሪ ምርካቡ፣ ዋላ’ውን ኣርቲፊሻል ክግበር ዝኽእል’ውን እንተኾነ።
translated_question: ብመሰረት እቲ ፓምፍሌት ንኣስፋልትም ዝቐረበ ኣጠቓቕማ እንታይ እዩ ነይሩ?

passage: One hundred years after the fall of Constantinople in 1453, Pierre Belon described in his work Observations in 1553 that pissasphalto, a mixture of pitch and bitumen, was used in Dubrovnik for tarring of ships from where it was exported to a market place in Venice where it could be bought by anyone. An 1838 edition of Mechanics Magazine cites an early use of asphalt in France. A pamphlet dated 1621, by 'a certain Monsieur d'Eyrinys,' states that he had discovered the existence (of asphaltum) in large quantities in the vicinity of Neufchatel, and that he proposed to use it in a variety of ways – 'principally in the construction of air‑proof granaries, and in protecting, by means of the arches, the water‑courses in the city of Paris from the intrusion of dirt and filth', which at that time made the water unusable. 'He expatiates also on the excellence of this material for forming level and durable terraces' in palaces, 'the notion of forming such terraces in the streets not one likely to cross the brain of a Parisian of that generation'. But it was generally neglected in France until the revolution of 1830. Then, in the 1830s, there was a surge of interest, and asphalt became widely used 'for pavements, flat roofs, and the lining of cisterns, and in England, some use of it had been made for similar purposes'. Its rise in Europe was 'a sudden phenomenon', after natural deposits were found 'in France at Osbann (BasRhin), the Parc (l'Ain) and the Puy-de-la-Poix (Puy-de-Dôme)', although it could also be made artificially.
question: When did asphalt see a surge in use in France?
translated_passage: ድሕሪ ሚእቲ ዓመት ድሕሪ ውድቀት ቁስጥንጥንያ ብ1453 ፒየር ቤሎን ኣብ 1553 ኣብ ዝነበረ ናይ ስራሕ ትዕዝብቲ ገሊጽዎ ከም ዝነበረ፡ ፒሳስፋልቶ፡ ፒሳስፋልቶ፡ ዝተሓዋወሰ ድምጺን ቅጥራንን፡ ኣብ ዱብሮቭኒክ፡ ካብቲ ዝለኣኸሉ ቦታ ናብ ዝለኣኸሉ ቦታ ንምቑራጽ ኣብ ዱብሮቭኒክ ከም ዝተጠቕመሉ፡ ብዝኾነ ይኹን ሰብ ክዕደግ ዝኽእለሉ ዕዳጋ ቦታ። ኣብ 1838 ዝወጸ ሕታም መጽሔት መካኒክስ፡ ኣብ ፈረንሳ ንኣስፋልት ብኣግኡ ከም ዝጥቀማ ጠቒሳ። 1621 ብዕለት 1621 ዝተጻሕፈት ፓምፍሌት፡ ብ‘ዝተወሰደ ሞንሲየር ዲ’ኢሪኒስ’፡ ህላወ (ናይ ኣስፋልትተልተም) ብብዝሒ ኣብ ከባቢ ኒውፍቻተል ከም ዝረኸቦን፡ ብዝተፈላለየ መንገዲ ክጥቀመላ ከም ዝሓሰበን - ‘መኣዝን ኣብ ህንፀት ኣየር ኣብ ልዕሊ እቲ ብኸምዚ ዝኣከበን ብኸምዚ ዝከላኸለሉ ምኽንያት፣ ኣብ ልዕሊ እቲ ቐመማት ዝከላኸለሉ፣ ኣብ ልዕሊ እቲ ማይ ዝፍለጠሉ ምኽንያት፣ እቲ ማይ ከም ዝኣተዎን፣ እቲ ማይ ከም ዝሃበን ይገልጽ። ምትእትታው ሓመድን ርስሓትን’፡ ኣብቲ እዋን’ቲ ነቲ ማይ ዘይጥቀመሉ ገበሮ። 'ንሱ'ውን ኣብ ብሉጽነት ናይዚ ንዋት ንምፍጣር ደረጃን ነዊሕ ዝጸንሕ ቴራስን' ኣብ ቤተ መንግስታት፡ 'እቲ ኣብ ጎደናታት ከምዚ ዝኣመሰለ ቴራስ ናይ ምፍጣር ዝብል ኣተሓሳስባ፡ ሓንጎል ናይ ሓደ ናይቲ ወለዶ ፓሪስ ክሰግር ዘይክእል ኣይኮነን' ኢሉ የውጽኦ። ግን ብሓፈሻ ኣብ ፈረንሳ ክሳብ ሰውራ 1830 ሸለል ተባሂሉ።ድሕሪኡ ኣብ 1830ታት ናይ ተገዳስነት ምልዕዓል ነበረ፣ ኣስፋልት ድማ ‘ንጽርግያታት፣ ጸፍሒ ናሕሲ፣ ከምኡውን ንመሸፈኒ ዕንቅርቢታት፣ ኣብ ዓዲ እንግሊዝ ድማ ገለ ኣጠቓቕማኡ ንተመሳሳሊ ዕላማታት ተገይሩሉ’ ብሰፊሑ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ይውዕል ነበረ። ኣብ ኤውሮጳ ዝለዓለሉ ዝነበረ እዋን ‘ሃንደበታዊ ተርእዮ’ እዩ ነይሩ፣ ተፈጥሮኣዊ ቅብኣት ‘ኣብ ፈረንሳ ኣብ ኦስባን (ባስረን)፣ ፓርክ (L'Ain)ን ፑይ-ደ-ላ-ፖይክስ (ፑይ-ደ-ዶም)ን ድሕሪ ምርካቡ፣ ዋላ’ውን ኣርቲፊሻል ክግበር ዝኽእል’ውን እንተኾነ።
translated_question: ኣስፋልት ኣብ ፈረንሳ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ዝወዓላ ክለዓላ መዓስ እያ ርእያ?

passage: New Haven has been depicted in a number of movies. Scenes in the film All About Eve (1950) are set at the Taft Hotel (now Taft Apartments) on the corner of College and Chapel streets, and the history of New Haven theaters as Broadway 'tryouts' is depicted in the Fred Astaire film The Band Wagon (1953). The city was fictionally portrayed in the Steven Spielberg movie Amistad (1997) concerning the events around the mutiny trial of that ship's rebelling captives. New Haven was also fictionalized in the movie The Skulls (2000), which focused on conspiracy theories surrounding the real-life Skull and Bones secret society which is located in New Haven.
question: Which film features scenes set at the Taft Hotel in New Haven?
translated_passage: ኒው ሄቨን ኣብ ብርክት ዝበሉ ፊልምታት ተሳኢላ ኣላ። ኣብታ ፊልም ኦል ብዛዕባ ሄዋን (1950) ኣብ ታፍት ሆቴል (ሕጂ ታፍት ኣፓርታማታት) ኣብ መኣዝን ጎደናታት ኮለጅን ቤተ ጸሎትን ተቐሚጦም ኣለዉ፣ ታሪኽ ኒው ሄቨን ትያትራት ድማ ብሮድዌይ ‘Tryouts’ ኣብ ፊልም ፍረድ ኣስታር እታ ባንድ ዋጎን (1953) ተሳኢላ ኣላ። እታ ከተማ ኣብ ስቲቨን ስፒልበርግ ፊልም ኣሚስታድ (1997) ብዛዕባ ኣብ ዙርያ እቲ ናይ ናዕቢ ፈተነ ናይቲ ናዕቢ ምሩኻት ናዕቢ ዝፍጠሩ ፍጻመታት ብልበወለድ ተሳቲፋ። ኒው ሄቨን ኣብታ ፊልም ዘ ስኩልስ (2000) እውን ልብወለዳዊት እያ ነይራ፣ ንሳ ድማ ኣብ ከባቢ ነቲ ኣብ ኒው ሄቨን ዝርከብ ናይ ሓቂ ህይወት ርእሲ ምራኽን ኣዕጽምቲ ምስጢራዊ ማሕበርን ኣብ ውዲታዊ ክልሰ-ሓሳባት ዘተኮረ እዩ።
translated_question: ኣብ ኒው ሄቨን ኣብ ዝርከብ ታፍት ሆቴል ዝተቐመጡ ትርኢታት እያ?

translated_passage: ኒው ሄቨን ኣብ ብርክት ዝበሉ ፊልምታት ተሳኢላ ኣላ። ኣብታ ፊልም ኦል ብዛዕባ ሄዋን (1950) ኣብ ታፍት ሆቴል (ሕጂ ታፍት ኣፓርታማታት) ኣብ መኣዝን ጎደናታት ኮለጅን ቤተ ጸሎትን ተቐሚጦም ኣለዉ፣ ታሪኽ ኒው ሄቨን ትያትራት ድማ ብሮድዌይ ‘Tryouts’ ኣብ ፊልም ፍረድ ኣስታር እታ ባንድ ዋጎን (1953) ተሳኢላ ኣላ። እታ ከተማ ኣብ ስቲቨን ስፒልበርግ ፊልም ኣሚስታድ (1997) ብዛዕባ ኣብ ዙርያ እቲ ናይ ናዕቢ ፈተነ ናይቲ ናዕቢ ምሩኻት ናዕቢ ዝፍጠሩ ፍጻመታት ብልበወለድ ተሳቲፋ። ኒው ሄቨን ኣብታ ፊልም ዘ ስኩልስ (2000) እውን ልብወለዳዊት እያ ነይራ፣ ንሳ ድማ ኣብ ከባቢ ነቲ ኣብ ኒው ሄቨን ዝርከብ ናይ ሓቂ ህይወት ርእሲ ምራኽን ኣዕጽምቲ ምስጢራዊ ማሕበርን ኣብ ውዲታዊ ክልሰ-ሓሳባት ዘተኮረ እዩ።
translated_question: ንኒው ሄቨን ትያትራት ከም ናይ ብሮድዌይ ፈተነታት ብምግላጽ እትፍለጥ ፊልም ኣየነይቲ?

passage: New Haven has been depicted in a number of movies. Scenes in the film All About Eve (1950) are set at the Taft Hotel (now Taft Apartments) on the corner of College and Chapel streets, and the history of New Haven theaters as Broadway 'tryouts' is depicted in the Fred Astaire film The Band Wagon (1953). The city was fictionally portrayed in the Steven Spielberg movie Amistad (1997) concerning the events around the mutiny trial of that ship's rebelling captives. New Haven was also fictionalized in the movie The Skulls (2000), which focused on conspiracy theories surrounding the real-life Skull and Bones secret society which is located in New Haven.
question: Which film focuses on conspiracy theories about Skull and Bones in New Haven?

passage: Double deck elevators are used in the Taipei 101 office tower. Tenants of even‑numbered floors first take an escalator (or an elevator from the parking garage) to the 2nd level, where they will enter the upper deck and arrive at their floors. The lower deck is turned off during low‑volume hours, and the upper deck can act as a single‑level elevator stopping at all adjacent floors. For example, the 85th floor restaurants can be accessed from the 60th floor sky‑lobby. Restaurant customers must clear their reservations at the reception counter on the 2nd floor. A bank of express elevators stop only on the sky lobby levels (36 and 60, upper‑deck car), where tenants can transfer to 'local' elevators.
question: What type of elevator system is employed in Taipei 101?
translated_passage: ድርብ ዲክ ሊፍት ኣብ ታይፐይ 101 ቤት ጽሕፈት ግምቢ ይጥቀሙ። even‐numbered laders ተኻረይቲ መጀመርያ መሳልል (ወይ ካብቲ መኪና ዝዕቆበሉ ጋራጅ ሊፍት) ናብ 2ይ ደረጃ ይወስዱ፣ ኣብኡ ድማ ናብቲ ላዕለዋይ ደርቢ ኣትዮም ኣብ ደርብታቶም ክበጽሑ እዮም። እቲ ታሕተዋይ ደርቢ ኣብ ትሑት ቮሉም ሰዓታት ይጠፍእ፣ እቲ ላዕለዋይ ደርቢ ድማ ኣብ ኩሉ ተቐራረብቲ ደርብታት ደው ኢሉ ከም ሓደ ደረጃ ሊፍት ኮይኑ ክሰርሕ ይኽእል። ንኣብነት መበል 85 ደርቢ ቤት መግቢ ካብ መበል 60 ደርቢ ስካይ‐ሎቢ ክትረኽቦ ትኽእል ኢኻ። ዓማዊል ቤት መግቢ ኣብ 2ይ ደርቢ ኣብቲ ናይ መቐበሊ ቆጸራ ዕቃበታት ከጽርዩ ኣለዎም። ሓደ ባንክ ናይ ኤክስፕረስ ሊፍት ኣብ ስካይ ሎቢ ደረጃታት (36ን 60ን 60 ላዕለዋይ ዴክ መኪና) ጥራይ ደው ይብል፣ ኣብኡ ተኻረይቲ ናብ 'ከባብያዊ' ሊፍት ክሰጋገሩ ይኽእሉ።
translated_question: ኣብ ታይፐይ 101 እንታይ ዓይነት ናይ ሊፍት ስርዓት ይሰርሕ?

passage: The Presbyterian Church in Vanuatu is the largest denomination in the country, with approximately one‑third of the population of Vanuatu members of the church. The PCV was taken to Vanuatu by missionaries from Scotland. The PCV (Presbyterian Church of Vanuatu) is headed by a moderator with offices in Port Vila. The PCV is particularly strong in the provinces of Tafea, Shefa, and Malampa. The Province of Sanma is mainly Presbyterian with a strong Roman Catholic minority in the Francophone areas of the province. There are some Presbyterian people, but no organised Presbyterian churches in Penama and Torba, both of which are traditionally Anglican. Vanuatu is the only country in the South Pacific with a significant Presbyterian heritage and membership. The PCV is a founding member of the Vanuatu Christian Council (VCC). The PCV runs many primary schools and Onesua secondary school. The church is strong in the rural villages.
question: Which church is noted as the largest denomination in Vanuatu?

passage: The Presbyterian Church in Vanuatu is the largest denomination in the country, with approximately one‑third of the population of Vanuatu members of the church. The PCV was taken to Vanuatu by missionaries from Scotland. The PCV (Presbyterian Church of Vanuatu) is headed by a moderator with offices in Port Vila. The PCV is particularly strong in the provinces of Tafea, Shefa, and Malampa. The Province of Sanma is mainly Presbyterian with a strong Roman Catholic minority in the Francophone areas of the province. There are some Presbyterian people, but no organised Presbyterian churches in Penama and Torba, both of which are traditionally Anglican. Vanuatu is the only country in the South Pacific with a significant Presbyterian heritage and membership. The PCV is a founding member of the Vanuatu Christian Council (VCC). The PCV runs many primary schools and Onesua secondary school. The church is strong in the rural villages.

passage: It has been said that GE got into computer manufacturing because in the 1950s they were the largest user of computers outside the United States federal government, aside from being the first business in the world to own a computer. Its major appliance manufacturing plant 'Appliance Park' was the first non‑governmental site to host one. However, in 1970, GE sold its computer division to Honeywell, exiting the computer manufacturing industry, though it retained its timesharing operations for some years afterwards. GE was a major provider of computer timesharing services, through General Electric Information Services (GEIS, now GXS), offering online computing services that included GEnie.
question: Why did GE initially enter computer manufacturing?
mc_answer2: Because they were the largest user of computers outside the US government
translated_passage: ጂኢ ኣብ 1950ታት ካብ ፌደራል መንግስቲ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ወጻኢ ዝዓበየ ተጠቃሚ ኮምፒዩተራት ስለዝነበሩ፡ ኣብ ዓለምና ናይ መጀመርታ ንግዲ ኮምፒተር ዝውንን ዝነበረ ናይ መጀመርታ ንግዲ ካብ ምዃን ወጻኢ ኣብ ምፍራይ ኮምፒተር ከም ዝኣተወ ይንገር። እቲ ዓቢ ናይ መሳርሒታት ምፍራይ መፍረያታ 'Appliance Park' ናይ መጀመርታ ዘይመንግስታዊ ቦታ ኮይኑ ሓደ ንምእንጋድ እዩ። ይኹን እምበር ኣብ 1970 ጂኢ ንሃኒዌል ዝኸውን ክፍሊ ኮምፒተር ንሃኒዌል ሸይጡ፣ ዋላ እኳ ንገለ ዓመታት ናይ ግዜ ምቁራፅ ስርሒታቱ እንተዓቀበ፣ ካብቲ ናይ ኮምፒተር ማኑፋክቸሪንግ ኢንዱስትሪ ወጺኡ። ጂኢ ዓቢ ኣቕራቢ ናይ ኮምፒተር ታይምስ ምክራይ ኣገልግሎት እዩ ነይሩ፣ ብመንገዲ ጀነራል ኤሌክትሪክ ኢንፎርሜሽን ሰርቪስስ (GEIS, Now GXS)፣ ንጂን ዘጠቓለለ ናይ ኦንላይን ናይ ኮምፒዩተር ኣገልግሎት ዝህብ።
translated_question: ጂኢ ኣብ መጀመርታ ኣብ ምፍራይ ኮምፒተር ኣትዩ?
translated_mc_answer2: ካብ መንግስቲ ኣሜሪካ ወጻኢ ዝዓበየ ተጠቃሚ ኮምፒዩተራት ስለዝነበራ .

mc_answer3: It was the largest computer manufacturer

translated_passage: ጂኢ ኣብ 1950ታት ካብ ፌደራል መንግስቲ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ወጻኢ ዝዓበየ ተጠቃሚ ኮምፒዩተራት ስለዝነበሩ፡ ኣብ ዓለምና ናይ መጀመርታ ንግዲ ኮምፒተር ዝውንን ዝነበረ ናይ መጀመርታ ንግዲ ካብ ምዃን ወጻኢ ኣብ ምፍራይ ኮምፒተር ከም ዝኣተወ ይንገር። እቲ ዓቢ ናይ መሳርሒታት ምፍራይ መፍረያታ 'Appliance Park' ናይ መጀመርታ ዘይመንግስታዊ ቦታ ኮይኑ ሓደ ንምእንጋድ እዩ። ይኹን እምበር ኣብ 1970 ጂኢ ንሃኒዌል ዝኸውን ክፍሊ ኮምፒተር ንሃኒዌል ሸይጡ፣ ዋላ እኳ ንገለ ዓመታት ናይ ግዜ ምቁራፅ ስርሒታቱ እንተዓቀበ፣ ካብቲ ናይ ኮምፒተር ማኑፋክቸሪንግ ኢንዱስትሪ ወጺኡ። ጂኢ ዓቢ ኣቕራቢ ናይ ኮምፒተር ታይምስ ምክራይ ኣገልግሎት እዩ ነይሩ፣ ብመንገዲ ጀነራል ኤሌክትሪክ ኢንፎርሜሽን ሰርቪስስ (GEIS, Now GXS)፣ ንጂን ዘጠቓለለ ናይ ኦንላይን ናይ ኮምፒዩተር ኣገልግሎት ዝህብ።
translated_question: ብዛዕባ GE’s Appliance Park እንታይ ትርጉም ነይርዎ?
translated_mc_answer2: ኮምፒተር ንምእንጋድ ናይ መጀመርታ ዘይመንግስታዊ መርበብ ሓበሬታ እዩ ነይሩ።
translated_mc_answer3: እቲ ዝዓበየ ኣፍራዪ ኮምፒተር እዩ ነይሩ።
translated_mc_answer4: ብመንግስቲ ዝውነን መጽናዕታዊ ትካል እዩ ነይሩ።

passage: Some symbiotic relationships are obligate, meaning that both symbionts entirely depend on each other for survival. For example, many lichens consist of fungal and photosynthetic symbionts that cannot live on their own. Others are facultative (optional): they can, but do not have to live with the other organism.
question: What does an obligate symbiotic relationship imply?
mc_answer1: It allows each organism to live independently
mc_answer2: Both symbionts completely depend on each other for survival
translated_passage: ገለ ሲምብዮቲክ ዝምድናታት ግዴታ ኣለዎም፣ እዚ ማለት ክልቲኦም ሲምቢዮንት ምሉእ ብምሉእ ኣብ ነንሕድሕዶም ንህይወት ዝምርኮሱ እዮም። ንኣብነት ብዙሓት ላይከንስ ብባዕሎም ክነብሩ ዘይክእሉ ፋንጋስን ፎቶሲንተቲክን ሲምቢዮንት ዝሓቖፉ እዮም። ካልኦት ድማ ፋኩልታቲቭ (ኣማራጺ) እዮም: ክኽእሉ ይኽእሉ እዮም፡ ምስ ካልእ ፍጡር ግን ክነብሩ ኣየድልዮምን እዩ።
translated_question: ግዴታ ዘለዎ ናይ ሲምብዮቲክ ዝምድና እንታይ ዘመልክት እዩ?
translated_mc_answer1: ነፍሲ ወከፍ ህይወታዊ ብናጻ ክነብር የኽእሎ .
translated_mc_answer2: ክልቲኦም ሲምቢዮንት ንህይወት ምሉእ ብምሉእ ኣብ ነንሕድሕዶም ይምርኮሱ .
translated_mc_answer3: ሓደ ናይ መጻምድቲ ረብሓ ጥራይ እዩ

passage: There is little consensus on the precise beginning of the Age of Enlightenment; the beginning of the 18th century (1701) or the middle of the 17th century (1650) are often used as epochs. French historians usually place the period, called the Siècle des Lumières (Century of Enlightenings), between 1715 and 1789, from the beginning of the reign of Louis XV until the French Revolution. If taken back to the mid‑17th century, the Enlightenment would trace its origins to Descartes' Discourse on Method, published in 1637. In France, many cited the publication of Isaac Newton's Principia Mathematica in 1687. It is argued by several historians and philosophers that the beginning of the Enlightenment is when Descartes shifted the epistemological basis from external authority to internal certainty by his cogito ergo sum published in 1637. As to its end, most scholars use the last years of the century, often choosing the French Revolution of 1789 or the beginning of the Napoleonic Wars (1804–15) as a convenient point in time with which to date the end of the Enlightenment.
question: According to French historians, when does the Age of Enlightenment span?
translated_passage: ኣብ ልክዕ መጀመርታ ዘመነ ምብራህ ብዙሕ ምርድዳእ የለን፤ መጀመርታ መበል 18 ክፍለ ዘመን (1701) ወይ መፋርቕ መበል 17 ክፍለ ዘመን (1650) መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ከም ዘመን ይጥቀሙ። መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ፈረንሳውያን ጸሓፍቲ ታሪኽ ነቲ ሲክል ደስ ሉሚየረስ (ክሳብ ብርሃን) ዝበሃል ዝነበረ እዋን የቐምጥዎ፣ ኣብ መንጎ 1715ን 1789ን፣ ካብ መጀመርታ ንግስነት ሉዊስ ኤክስቪ ክሳብ ሰውራ ፈረንሳ። ናብ መፋርቕ መበል 17 ክፍለ ዘመን እንተተመሊሱ፡ እቲ ምብራህ መበቆሉ ካብቲ ኣብ 1637 ዝተሓትመ ዲካርተስ ዲስኩርስ ዲስኩርስ ዝሰርሖ ዲስኮርትስ ክስዕብ እዩ።ኣብ ፈረንሳ፡ ብዙሓት ንሕትመት ኢሳቕ ኒውተን ዝሃቦም ፕሪንሲፒያ ፕሪንሲፒያ ሒሳብ 1687 ጠቒሶም።እዚ ድማ ኣብ 1687 ዝነበረ ናይ ኢሳቕ ኒውተን ሒሳብ ጠቒሶም። ውሽጣዊ ርግጸኝነት ብኮጊቶ ኤርጎ ድምር ኣብ 1637 ዝተሓትመ።ብክንደይ፡ መብዛሕትኦም ምሁራት ናይ መወዳእታ ዓመታት ናይቲ ክፍለ ዘመን ይጥቀሙ፡ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ድማ ነቲ ኣብ 1789 ዝነበረ ሰውራ ፈረንሳ ወይ መጀመርታ ናይ ናፖልዮናዊ ውግኣት (1804–15) ከም ምቹእ ነጥቢ ኣብ ግዜ ይመርጹ።
translated_question: ብመሰረት ታሪኽ ታሪኽ ፈረንሳ፡ ዕድመ ምብራህ መዓስ እዩ?

passage: There is little consensus on the precise beginning of the Age of Enlightenment; the beginning of the 18th century (1701) or the middle of the 17th century (1650) are often used as epochs. French historians usually place the period, called the Siècle des Lumières (Century of Enlightenings), between 1715 and 1789, from the beginning of the reign of Louis XV until the French Revolution. If taken back to the mid‑17th century, the Enlightenment would trace its origins to Descartes' Discourse on Method, published in 1637. In France, many cited the publication of Isaac Newton's Principia Mathematica in 1687. It is argued by several historians and philosophers that the beginning of the Enlightenment is when Descartes shifted the epistemological basis from external authority to internal certainty by his cogito ergo sum published in 1637. As to its end, most scholars use the last years of the century, often choosing the French Revolution of 1789 or the beginning of the Napoleonic Wars (1804–15) as a convenient point in time with which to date the end of the Enlightenment.
question: Which work by Descartes is cited as marking the origins of the Enlightenment?
mc_answer2: Discourse on Method (and cogito ergo sum)
translated_passage: ኣብ ልክዕ መጀመርታ ዘመነ ምብራህ ብዙሕ ምርድዳእ የለን፤ መጀመርታ መበል 18 ክፍለ ዘመን (1701) ወይ መፋርቕ መበል 17 ክፍለ ዘመን (1650) መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ከም ዘመን ይጥቀሙ። መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ፈረንሳውያን ጸሓፍቲ ታሪኽ ነቲ ሲክል ደስ ሉሚየረስ (ክሳብ ብርሃን) ዝበሃል ዝነበረ እዋን የቐምጥዎ፣ ኣብ መንጎ 1715ን 1789ን፣ ካብ መጀመርታ ንግስነት ሉዊስ ኤክስቪ ክሳብ ሰውራ ፈረንሳ። ናብ መፋርቕ መበል 17 ክፍለ ዘመን እንተተመሊሱ፡ እቲ ምብራህ መበቆሉ ካብቲ ኣብ 1637 ዝተሓትመ ዲካርተስ ዲስኩርስ ዲስኩርስ ዝሰርሖ ዲስኮርትስ ክስዕብ እዩ።ኣብ ፈረንሳ፡ ብዙሓት ንሕትመት ኢሳቕ ኒውተን ዝሃቦም ፕሪንሲፒያ ፕሪንሲፒያ ሒሳብ 1687 ጠቒሶም።እዚ ድማ ኣብ 1687 ዝነበረ ናይ ኢሳቕ ኒውተን ሒሳብ ጠቒሶም። ውሽጣዊ ርግጸኝነት ብኮጊቶ ኤርጎ ድምር ኣብ 1637 ዝተሓትመ።ብክንደይ፡ መብዛሕትኦም ምሁራት ናይ መወዳእታ ዓመታት ናይቲ ክፍለ ዘመን ይጥቀሙ፡ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ድማ ነቲ ኣብ 1789 ዝነበረ ሰውራ ፈረንሳ ወይ መጀመርታ ናይ ናፖልዮናዊ ውግኣት (1804–15) ከም ምቹእ ነጥቢ ኣብ ግዜ ይመርጹ።
translated_question: ኣየናይ ስራሕ ብዲስካርትስ ከም ምልክት መበቆል ናይቲ ምብራህ ምልክት ተባሂሉ ዝጥቀስ?
translated_mc_answer2: ዲስኩር ኣብ ሜላ (ከምኡውን ኮጊቶ ኤርጎ ድምር)

passage: There is little consensus on the precise beginning of the Age of Enlightenment; the beginning of the 18th century (1701) or the middle of the 17th century (1650) are often used as epochs. French historians usually place the period, called the Siècle des Lumières (Century of Enlightenings), between 1715 and 1789, from the beginning of the reign of Louis XV until the French Revolution. If taken back to the mid‑17th century, the Enlightenment would trace its origins to Descartes' Discourse on Method, published in 1637. In France, many cited the publication of Isaac Newton's Principia Mathematica in 1687. It is argued by several historians and philosophers that the beginning of the Enlightenment is when Descartes shifted the epistemological basis from external authority to internal certainty by his cogito ergo sum published in 1637. As to its end, most scholars use the last years of the century, often choosing the French Revolution of 1789 or the beginning of the Napoleonic Wars (1804–15) as a convenient point in time with which to date the end of the Enlightenment.
question: What event is often used as a convenient marker for the end of the Enlightenment?

passage: Many Islamic anti‑Masonic arguments are closely tied to both antisemitism and Anti‑Zionism, though other criticisms are made such as linking Freemasonry to al‑Masih ad‑Dajjal (the false Messiah). Some Muslim anti‑Masons argue that Freemasonry promotes the interests of the Jews around the world and that one of its aims is to destroy the Al‑Aqsa Mosque in order to rebuild the Temple of Solomon in Jerusalem. In article 28 of its Covenant, Hamas states that Freemasonry, Rotary, and other similar groups 'work in the interest of Zionism and according to its instructions ...'
question: What do some Muslim anti‑Masons claim about Freemasonry?
mc_answer1: That it is a benign social club
mc_answer2: That it promotes the interests of Zionism
mc_answer3: That it has no political influence
translated_passage: ብዙሓት እስላማዊ ጸረ-ማሶናዊ ስነ-ሞጎት ምስ ክልቲኡ ጸረ-ሴማውነትን ጸረ-ጽግያትን ብቐረባ ዝተኣሳሰሩ እዮም፡ ዋላ እኳ ካልኦት ነቐፌታታት ከም ፍሪሜሶን ምስ ኣል‐ማሲህ ኣድ‐ዳጅጃል (እቲ ናይ ሓሶት መሲሕ) ምትእስሳር ዝኣመሰለ ምትእስሳር ዝኣመሰሉ እንተኾኑ። ገለ ናይ ኣስላም ጸረ-መዝገብ፡ ፍሪሜሶን ንረብሓ ኣይሁድ ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ከም ዘተባብዕን ሓደ ካብ ዕላምኡ ድማ ኣብ ኢየሩሳሌም ቤተ መቕደስ ሰሎሞን ዳግማይ ንምህናጽ መስጊድ ኣል‐ኣቕሳ ምጥፋእ ምዃኑን ይምጉቱ። ኣብ ዓንቀፅ 28 ቃል ኪዳኑ ሓማስ ፍሪሜሶን፣ ሮታሪን ካልኦት ተመሳሰልቲ ጉጅለታትን 'ንረብሓ ጽዮንነትን ብመሰረት መምርሕታቱን ከም ዝሰርሕ ...' ይገልጽ።

translated_passage: ብዙሓት እስላማዊ ጸረ-ማሶናዊ ስነ-ሞጎት ምስ ክልቲኡ ጸረ-ሴማውነትን ጸረ-ጽግያትን ብቐረባ ዝተኣሳሰሩ እዮም፡ ዋላ እኳ ካልኦት ነቐፌታታት ከም ፍሪሜሶን ምስ ኣል‐ማሲህ ኣድ‐ዳጅጃል (እቲ ናይ ሓሶት መሲሕ) ምትእስሳር ዝኣመሰለ ምትእስሳር ዝኣመሰሉ እንተኾኑ። ገለ ናይ ኣስላም ጸረ-መዝገብ፡ ፍሪሜሶን ንረብሓ ኣይሁድ ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ከም ዘተባብዕን ሓደ ካብ ዕላምኡ ድማ ኣብ ኢየሩሳሌም ቤተ መቕደስ ሰሎሞን ዳግማይ ንምህናጽ መስጊድ ኣል‐ኣቕሳ ምጥፋእ ምዃኑን ይምጉቱ። ኣብ ዓንቀፅ 28 ቃል ኪዳኑ ሓማስ ፍሪሜሶን፣ ሮታሪን ካልኦት ተመሳሰልቲ ጉጅለታትን 'ንረብሓ ጽዮንነትን ብመሰረት መምርሕታቱን ከም ዝሰርሕ ...' ይገልጽ።
translated_question: ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ፡ ፍሪሜሶን ንምልላይ ዝዓለመ ረብሓታት ኣየናይ ጉጅለ እዩ?

passage: Many Islamic anti‑Masonic arguments are closely tied to both antisemitism and Anti‑Zionism, though other criticisms are made such as linking Freemasonry to al‑Masih ad‑Dajjal (the false Messiah). Some Muslim anti‑Masons argue that Freemasonry promotes the interests of the Jews around the world and that one of its aims is to destroy the Al‑Aqsa Mosque in order to rebuild the Temple of Solomon in Jerusalem. In article 28 of its Covenant, Hamas states that Freemasonry, Rotary, and other similar groups 'work in the interest of Zionism and according to its instructions ...'
question: Along with Freemasonry, what other group is mentioned as working in the interest of Zionism according to article 28 of Hamas' Covenant?

translated_mc_answer4: ካብዞም ኣብ ላዕሊ ዝተጠቕሱ ዋላ ሓደ

passage: Last but not least the electric double‑layer capacitor (now Supercapacitors) were invented. In 1957 H. Becker developed a 'Low voltage electrolytic capacitor with porous carbon electrodes'. He believed that the energy was stored as a charge in the carbon pores used in his capacitor as in the pores of the etched foils of electrolytic capacitors. Because the double layer mechanism was not known by him at the time, he wrote in the patent: 'It is not known exactly what is taking place in the component if it is used for energy storage, but it leads to an extremely high capacity.'
question: Who developed the low voltage electrolytic capacitor with porous carbon electrodes in 1957?
translated_passage: ኣብ መወዳእታ ግን እቲ ኤለክትሪካዊ ድርብ ንጣር ካፓሲተር (ሕጂ ሱፐርካፓሲተራት) ተማሂዙ። ኣብ 1957 ኤች ቤከር 'ትሑት ቮልቴጅ ኤሌክትሮላይቲክ ካፓሲተር ምስ ፖሮስ ካርቦን ኤሌክትሮድስ' ኣማዕቢሉ። እቲ ጸዓት ኣብቲ ኣብ ካፓሲተር ዝጥቀመሉ ዝነበረ ካርቦን መንደቕ ከም ቻርጅ ከም ቻርጅ ከም ቻርጅ ከም ዝዕቀብ ይኣምን ነበረ፡ ከምቲ ኣብ መንደቕ ናይቶም ዝተቐርጹ ፎይላት ናይ ኤሌክትሮላይቲክ ካፓሲተራት። እቲ ድርብ ንጣብ መካኒዝም ኣብቲ እዋን ብእኡ ስለዘይፍለጥ፡ ኣብቲ ፓተንት ከምዚ ኢሉ ጽሒፉ፡ ‘ንጸዓት ንምኽዛን ዝውዕል እንተኾይኑ ኣብቲ ክፍሊ እንታይ ይካየድ ከምዘሎ ብልክዕ ኣይፍለጥን’ዩ፡ ግን ከኣ ናብ ኣዝዩ ልዑል ዓቕሚ ይመርሕ።’
translated_question: መን እዩ ነቲ ትሑት ቮልቴጅ ዘለዎ ኤሌክትሮላይቲክ ካፓሲተር ምስ ፖሮስ ካርቦን ኤሌክትሮድ ኣብ 1957 ዘማዕበሎ?

passage: Last but not least the electric double‑layer capacitor (now Supercapacitors) were invented. In 1957 H. Becker developed a 'Low voltage electrolytic capacitor with porous carbon electrodes'. He believed that the energy was stored as a charge in the carbon pores used in his capacitor as in the pores of the etched foils of electrolytic capacitors. Because the double layer mechanism was not known by him at the time, he wrote in the patent: 'It is not known exactly what is taking place in the component if it is used for energy storage, but it leads to an extremely high capacity.'
question: According to Becker, where is the energy stored in his capacitor?
mc_answer2: As a charge in the carbon pores

passage: Last but not least the electric double‑layer capacitor (now Supercapacitors) were invented. In 1957 H. Becker developed a 'Low voltage electrolytic capacitor with porous carbon electrodes'. He believed that the energy was stored as a charge in the carbon pores used in his capacitor as in the pores of the etched foils of electrolytic capacitors. Because the double layer mechanism was not known by him at the time, he wrote in the patent: 'It is not known exactly what is taking place in the component if it is used for energy storage, but it leads to an extremely high capacity.'
question: Why did H. Becker mention uncertainty in his patent?
mc_answer1: Because he wanted to mislead competitors
mc_answer2: Because the double‑layer mechanism was not yet discovered
mc_answer3: Because he intended to hide the technology
mc_answer4: Because he was not a trained engineer

translated_mc_answer2: ምኽንያቱ እቲ ድርብ ንጣር መካኒዝም ገና ስለዘይተረኽበ .
translated_mc_answer3: ምኽንያቱ ነቲ ቴክኖሎጂ ክሕባእ ስለ ዝሓሰበ .

passage: There are two broad categories of public funding, direct, which entails a monetary transfer to a party, and indirect, which includes broadcasting time on state media, use of the mail service or supplies. According to the Comparative Data from the ACE Electoral Knowledge Network, out of a sample of over 180 nations, 25% of nations provide no direct or indirect public funding, 58% provide direct public funding and 60% of nations provide indirect public funding. Some countries provide both direct and indirect public funding to political parties. Funding may be equal for all parties or depend on the results of previous elections or the number of candidates participating in an election. Frequently parties rely on a mix of private and public funding and are required to disclose their finances to the Election management body.
question: What are the two broad categories of public funding mentioned?
translated_passage: ክልተ ሰፋሕቲ ምድባት ናይ ህዝባዊ ምወላ ኣለዉ፣ ቀጥታዊ፣ ናብ ሓደ ወገን ገንዘባዊ ዝውውር ዘጠቓልል፣ ከምኡውን ዘይቀጥታዊ፣ እዚ ድማ ኣብ መንግስታዊ መራኸቢ ብዙሃን ናይ ፈነወ ግዜ፣ ኣጠቓቕማ ኣገልግሎት ፖስታ ወይ ቀረብ ዘጠቓልል እዩ። ብመሰረት እቲ ካብ ACE Electoral Knowledge Network ዝተረኽበ ንጽጽራዊ መረዳእታ፡ ካብ ልዕሊ 180 ሃገራት ዝተወሰደ ናሙና፡ 25% ሃገራት ቀጥታዊ ወይ ዘይቀጥታዊ ህዝባዊ ምወላ ኣይህባን፡ 58% ቀጥታዊ ህዝባዊ ምወላ ዝህባ 60% ሃገራት ድማ ዘይቀጥታዊ መንግስታዊ ምወላ ይህባ። ገለ ሃገራት ንፖለቲካዊ ውድባት ቀጥታውን ዘይቀጥታውን ህዝባዊ ምወላ ይህባ። ምወላ ንኹሎም ውድባት ማዕረ ክኸውን ይኽእል ወይ ድማ ኣብ ውጽኢት ናይቲ ዝሓለፈ ምርጫ ወይ ኣብ ምርጫ ዝሳተፉ ሕጹያት ዝምርኮስ ክኸውን ይኽእል። ብተደጋጋሚ ውድባት ኣብ ዝተሓዋወሰ ናይ ውልቃውን መንግስታውን ምወላ ዝምርኮሱ ኮይኖም ፋይናንሶም ናብ ኣካል ምሕደራ ምርጫ ክገልጹ ይግደዱ።

passage: There are two broad categories of public funding, direct, which entails a monetary transfer to a party, and indirect, which includes broadcasting time on state media, use of the mail service or supplies. According to the Comparative Data from the ACE Electoral Knowledge Network, out of a sample of over 180 nations, 25% of nations provide no direct or indirect public funding, 58% provide direct public funding and 60% of nations provide indirect public funding. Some countries provide both direct and indirect public funding to political parties. Funding may be equal for all parties or depend on the results of previous elections or the number of candidates participating in an election. Frequently parties rely on a mix of private and public funding and are required to disclose their finances to the Election management body.
question: According to the ACE Electoral Knowledge Network, what percentage of nations provide direct public funding?

passage: Asked about the liberal, non‑democratic rule by a Chilean interviewer, Hayek is translated from German to Spanish to English as having said, 'As long term institutions, I am totally against dictatorships. But a dictatorship may be a necessary system for a transitional period. [...] Personally I prefer a liberal dictatorship to democratic government devoid of liberalism. My personal impression – and this is valid for South America – is that in Chile, for example, we will witness a transition from a dictatorial government to a liberal government.' In a letter to the London Times, he defended the Pinochet regime and said that he had 'not been able to find a single person even in much maligned Chile who did not agree that personal freedom was much greater under Pinochet than it had been under Allende.' Hayek admitted that 'it is not very likely that this will succeed, even if, at a particular point in time, it may be the only hope there is.', he explained, however, 'It is not certain hope, because it will always depend on the goodwill of an individual, and there are very few individuals one can trust. But if it is the sole opportunity which exists at a particular moment it may be the best solution despite this. And only if and when the dictatorial government is visibly directing its steps towards limited democracy'.
question: What type of dictatorship does Hayek claim to prefer?
translated_passage: ብዛዕባ እቲ ብሊበራላዊ፡ ዘይዲሞክራስያዊ ምሕደራ ብሓደ ቺለዊ ሓታቲ ተሓቲቱ፡ ሃየክ ካብ ጀርመናዊ ናብ ስጳኛ ናብ እንግሊዝኛ ተተርጒሙ፡ ከም ዝበሎ፡ 'ከም ናይ ነዊሕ ግዜ ትካላት፡ ፍጹም ኣንጻር ምልኪ እየ ዝጻረር እየ። ምልኪ ግን ንመሰጋገሪ ግዜ ኣድላዪ ስርዓት ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ። [...] ብውልቀይ ካብ ሊበራሊዝም ዝጎደሎ ዲሞክራስያዊ መንግስቲ ሊበራላዊ ምልካዊ ስርዓት እመርጽ። ውልቃዊ ጦብላሕታይ – እዚ ድማ ንደቡብ ኣመሪካ ቅኑዕ እዩ – ኣብ ቺለ ንኣብነት ካብ ውልቀ-መላኺ መንግስቲ ናብ ሊበራላዊ መንግስቲ ምስግጋር ክንምስክር ኢና ዝብል እዩ።’ ናብ ለንደን ታይምስ ኣብ ዝጸሓፎ ደብዳበ፡ ነቲ ስርዓት ፒኖቸት ተኸላኺሉ፡ ‘ኣብ ትሕቲ ፒኖቸት ካብቲ ኣብ ትሕቲ ኣለንድ ዝነበረ ኣዝዩ ዝዓበየ ምዃኑ ኣብ ትሕቲ ፒኖቸት ኣዝዩ ዝዓበየ ምዃኑ ኣብ ብዙሕ ዘይተሰማምዐ ቺለ ከይተረፈ ‘ንጽል ሰብ ክረክብ ከም ዘይከኣለ’ ኢሉ። ሃየክ ‘እዚ ዋላ’ውን ኣብ ሓደ ፍሉይ ነጥቢ፡ እቲ እንኮ ተስፋ ክህሉ ዝኽእል እንተኾነ፡ እዚ ናይ ምዕዋት ተኽእሎኡ ብዙሕ ኣይኮነን’ ኢሉ ተኣሚኑ።’ ገሊጹ፡ እንተኾነ ግን ‘ኩሉ ግዜ ኣብ ሰናይ ድሌት ናይ ሓደ ውልቀሰብ ስለ ዝምርኮስ፡ ሓደ ሰብ ክኣምኖ ዝኽእል ኣዝዩ ውሑድ ስለ ዝኾነ፡ ርግጸኛ ተስፋ ኣይኮነን፡ ምኽንያቱ። ኣብ ሓደ ፍሉይ ህሞት ዝህሉ እንኮ ዕድል እንተኾይኑ ግን እዚ እናሃለወ እቲ ዝበለጸ ፍታሕ ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ። ከምኡ’ውን እቲ ምልካዊ መንግስቲ ንውሱን ዲሞክራሲ ስጉምቱ ብግልጺ ዘቕንዕ እንተኾይኑን ምስ ዝኸውንን ጥራይ’ዩ።

mc_answer2: It was much greater under Pinochet
mc_answer4: It was worse in both cases
translated_passage: ብዛዕባ እቲ ብሊበራላዊ፡ ዘይዲሞክራስያዊ ምሕደራ ብሓደ ቺለዊ ሓታቲ ተሓቲቱ፡ ሃየክ ካብ ጀርመናዊ ናብ ስጳኛ ናብ እንግሊዝኛ ተተርጒሙ፡ ከም ዝበሎ፡ 'ከም ናይ ነዊሕ ግዜ ትካላት፡ ፍጹም ኣንጻር ምልኪ እየ ዝጻረር እየ። ምልኪ ግን ንመሰጋገሪ ግዜ ኣድላዪ ስርዓት ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ። [...] ብውልቀይ ካብ ሊበራሊዝም ዝጎደሎ ዲሞክራስያዊ መንግስቲ ሊበራላዊ ምልካዊ ስርዓት እመርጽ። ውልቃዊ ጦብላሕታይ – እዚ ድማ ንደቡብ ኣመሪካ ቅኑዕ እዩ – ኣብ ቺለ ንኣብነት ካብ ውልቀ-መላኺ መንግስቲ ናብ ሊበራላዊ መንግስቲ ምስግጋር ክንምስክር ኢና ዝብል እዩ።’ ናብ ለንደን ታይምስ ኣብ ዝጸሓፎ ደብዳበ፡ ነቲ ስርዓት ፒኖቸት ተኸላኺሉ፡ ‘ኣብ ትሕቲ ፒኖቸት ካብቲ ኣብ ትሕቲ ኣለንድ ዝነበረ ኣዝዩ ዝዓበየ ምዃኑ ኣብ ትሕቲ ፒኖቸት ኣዝዩ ዝዓበየ ምዃኑ ኣብ ብዙሕ ዘይተሰማምዐ ቺለ ከይተረፈ ‘ንጽል ሰብ ክረክብ ከም ዘይከኣለ’ ኢሉ። ሃየክ ‘እዚ ዋላ’ውን ኣብ ሓደ ፍሉይ ነጥቢ፡ እቲ እንኮ ተስፋ ክህሉ ዝኽእል እንተኾነ፡ እዚ ናይ ምዕዋት ተኽእሎኡ ብዙሕ ኣይኮነን’ ኢሉ ተኣሚኑ።’ ገሊጹ፡ እንተኾነ ግን ‘ኩሉ ግዜ ኣብ ሰናይ ድሌት ናይ ሓደ ውልቀሰብ ስለ ዝምርኮስ፡ ሓደ ሰብ ክኣምኖ ዝኽእል ኣዝዩ ውሑድ ስለ ዝኾነ፡ ርግጸኛ ተስፋ ኣይኮነን፡ ምኽንያቱ። ኣብ ሓደ ፍሉይ ህሞት ዝህሉ እንኮ ዕድል እንተኾይኑ ግን እዚ እናሃለወ እቲ ዝበለጸ ፍታሕ ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ። ከምኡ’ውን እቲ ምልካዊ መንግስቲ ንውሱን ዲሞክራሲ ስጉምቱ ብግልጺ ዘቕንዕ እንተኾይኑን ምስ ዝኸውንን ጥራይ’ዩ።
translated_question: ብመሰረት ሓበሬታ ሃየክ፡ ኣብ ትሕቲ ፒኖቸት ውልቃዊ ናጽነት ምስቲ ኣብ ትሕቲ ኣለንደ ዝነበረ ብኸመይ እዩ ተነጻጺሩ?
translated_mc_answer2: ኣብ ትሕቲ ፒኖቸት ኣዝዩ ዝዓበየ እዩ ነይሩ።
translated_mc_answer4: ኣብ ክልቲኡ ’ ውን ዝኸፍአ ’ ዩ ነይሩ።

passage: Asked about the liberal, non‑democratic rule by a Chilean interviewer, Hayek is translated from German to Spanish to English as having said, 'As long term institutions, I am totally against dictatorships. But a dictatorship may be a necessary system for a transitional period. [...] Personally I prefer a liberal dictatorship to democratic government devoid of liberalism. My personal impression – and this is valid for South America – is that in Chile, for example, we will witness a transition from a dictatorial government to a liberal government.' In a letter to the London Times, he defended the Pinochet regime and said that he had 'not been able to find a single person even in much maligned Chile who did not agree that personal freedom was much greater under Pinochet than it had been under Allende.' Hayek admitted that 'it is not very likely that this will succeed, even if, at a particular point in time, it may be the only hope there is.', he explained, however, 'It is not certain hope, because it will always depend on the goodwill of an individual, and there are very few individuals one can trust. But if it is the sole opportunity which exists at a particular moment it may be the best solution despite this. And only if and when the dictatorial government is visibly directing its steps towards limited democracy'.
question: What does Hayek say about the likelihood of a dictatorship serving as a transitional institution?
mc_answer2: It is not very likely to succeed
translated_passage: ብዛዕባ እቲ ብሊበራላዊ፡ ዘይዲሞክራስያዊ ምሕደራ ብሓደ ቺለዊ ሓታቲ ተሓቲቱ፡ ሃየክ ካብ ጀርመናዊ ናብ ስጳኛ ናብ እንግሊዝኛ ተተርጒሙ፡ ከም ዝበሎ፡ 'ከም ናይ ነዊሕ ግዜ ትካላት፡ ፍጹም ኣንጻር ምልኪ እየ ዝጻረር እየ። ምልኪ ግን ንመሰጋገሪ ግዜ ኣድላዪ ስርዓት ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ። [...] ብውልቀይ ካብ ሊበራሊዝም ዝጎደሎ ዲሞክራስያዊ መንግስቲ ሊበራላዊ ምልካዊ ስርዓት እመርጽ። ውልቃዊ ጦብላሕታይ – እዚ ድማ ንደቡብ ኣመሪካ ቅኑዕ እዩ – ኣብ ቺለ ንኣብነት ካብ ውልቀ-መላኺ መንግስቲ ናብ ሊበራላዊ መንግስቲ ምስግጋር ክንምስክር ኢና ዝብል እዩ።’ ናብ ለንደን ታይምስ ኣብ ዝጸሓፎ ደብዳበ፡ ነቲ ስርዓት ፒኖቸት ተኸላኺሉ፡ ‘ኣብ ትሕቲ ፒኖቸት ካብቲ ኣብ ትሕቲ ኣለንድ ዝነበረ ኣዝዩ ዝዓበየ ምዃኑ ኣብ ትሕቲ ፒኖቸት ኣዝዩ ዝዓበየ ምዃኑ ኣብ ብዙሕ ዘይተሰማምዐ ቺለ ከይተረፈ ‘ንጽል ሰብ ክረክብ ከም ዘይከኣለ’ ኢሉ። ሃየክ ‘እዚ ዋላ’ውን ኣብ ሓደ ፍሉይ ነጥቢ፡ እቲ እንኮ ተስፋ ክህሉ ዝኽእል እንተኾነ፡ እዚ ናይ ምዕዋት ተኽእሎኡ ብዙሕ ኣይኮነን’ ኢሉ ተኣሚኑ።’ ገሊጹ፡ እንተኾነ ግን ‘ኩሉ ግዜ ኣብ ሰናይ ድሌት ናይ ሓደ ውልቀሰብ ስለ ዝምርኮስ፡ ሓደ ሰብ ክኣምኖ ዝኽእል ኣዝዩ ውሑድ ስለ ዝኾነ፡ ርግጸኛ ተስፋ ኣይኮነን፡ ምኽንያቱ። ኣብ ሓደ ፍሉይ ህሞት ዝህሉ እንኮ ዕድል እንተኾይኑ ግን እዚ እናሃለወ እቲ ዝበለጸ ፍታሕ ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ። ከምኡ’ውን እቲ ምልካዊ መንግስቲ ንውሱን ዲሞክራሲ ስጉምቱ ብግልጺ ዘቕንዕ እንተኾይኑን ምስ ዝኸውንን ጥራይ’ዩ።
translated_question: ሃየክ ብዛዕባ ከም መሰጋገሪ ትካል ኮይኑ ዘገልግል ምልካዊ ስርዓት እንታይ ይብል?

passage: Besides parents, Liu Shaokun (刘绍坤), a Sichuan school teacher, was detained on June 25, 2008 for 'disseminating rumors and destroying social order' about the Sichuan earthquake. Liu’s family was later told that he was being investigated on suspicion of the crime of inciting subversion. Liu had travelled to the Shifang, taken photos of collapsed school buildings, and put them online. He had also expressed his anger at 'the shoddy tofu‑dregs buildings' (豆腐渣工程) in a media interview. He was ordered to serve one year of re‑education through labor (RTL). According to Human Rights in China, Liu has been released to serve his RTL sentence outside of the labor camp.
question: For what reason was Liu Shaokun detained?
mc_answer2: For disseminating rumors and destroying social order
translated_passage: ብዘይካ ወለዲ ሊዩ ሻውኩን (刘绍坤) መምህር ቤት ትምህርቲ ሲቹዋን፡ ብዛዕባ ምንቅጥቃጥ ምድሪ ሲቹዋን 'ምዝርግሑን ማሕበራዊ ትእዛዝ ብምጥፋእን' ብ25 ሰነ 2008 ብ25 ሰነ 2008 ተኣሲሩ። ስድራቤት ሊዩ ድሒሮም፡ ነቲ ኣብ ምንቅጥቃጥ ዝድርኽ ገበን ብምጥንቃቕ ይምርመር ከምዘሎ ተነጊርዎም። ሊዩ ናብ ሺፋንግ ተጓዒዙ፡ ነቲ ዝፈረሰ ህንጻታት ቤት ትምህርቲ ስእሊ ወሲዱ ኣብ መስመር ኣእትዩ ነበረ። ብተወሳኺ ኣብ ናይ ሚድያ ቃለ መሕትት ኣብ 'The Shoddy Tofu‐Dregs Buildings' (豆腐渣工程) ቁጥዓኡ ገሊጹ ነይሩ። ብጉልበት (RTL) ኣቢሉ ንሓደ ዓመት ዳግመ-ትምህርቲ ከገልግል ተኣዚዙ። ኣብ ቻይና ሰብኣዊ መሰላት ከም ዝብሎ፡ ሊዩ ካብቲ ናይ ዕዮ መዓስከር ወጻኢ ናይ RTL ፍርዱ ንምግልጋል ተፈቲሑ።
translated_question: ሊዩ ሻኩን እንታይ ምኽንያት እዩ ተኣሲሩ?

passage: Besides parents, Liu Shaokun (刘绍坤), a Sichuan school teacher, was detained on June 25, 2008 for 'disseminating rumors and destroying social order' about the Sichuan earthquake. Liu’s family was later told that he was being investigated on suspicion of the crime of inciting subversion. Liu had travelled to the Shifang, taken photos of collapsed school buildings, and put them online. He had also expressed his anger at 'the shoddy tofu‑dregs buildings' (豆腐渣工程) in a media interview. He was ordered to serve one year of re‑education through labor (RTL). According to Human Rights in China, Liu has been released to serve his RTL sentence outside of the labor camp.
question: What specific activity contributed to Liu Shaokun’s detention?
mc_answer2: He took and posted photos of collapsed school buildings
translated_passage: ብዘይካ ወለዲ ሊዩ ሻውኩን (刘绍坤) መምህር ቤት ትምህርቲ ሲቹዋን፡ ብዛዕባ ምንቅጥቃጥ ምድሪ ሲቹዋን 'ምዝርግሑን ማሕበራዊ ትእዛዝ ብምጥፋእን' ብ25 ሰነ 2008 ብ25 ሰነ 2008 ተኣሲሩ። ስድራቤት ሊዩ ድሒሮም፡ ነቲ ኣብ ምንቅጥቃጥ ዝድርኽ ገበን ብምጥንቃቕ ይምርመር ከምዘሎ ተነጊርዎም። ሊዩ ናብ ሺፋንግ ተጓዒዙ፡ ነቲ ዝፈረሰ ህንጻታት ቤት ትምህርቲ ስእሊ ወሲዱ ኣብ መስመር ኣእትዩ ነበረ። ብተወሳኺ ኣብ ናይ ሚድያ ቃለ መሕትት ኣብ 'The Shoddy Tofu‐Dregs Buildings' (豆腐渣工程) ቁጥዓኡ ገሊጹ ነይሩ። ብጉልበት (RTL) ኣቢሉ ንሓደ ዓመት ዳግመ-ትምህርቲ ከገልግል ተኣዚዙ። ኣብ ቻይና ሰብኣዊ መሰላት ከም ዝብሎ፡ ሊዩ ካብቲ ናይ ዕዮ መዓስከር ወጻኢ ናይ RTL ፍርዱ ንምግልጋል ተፈቲሑ።
translated_question: እንታይ ፍሉይ ንጥፈት ኣብ ምእሳር ሊዩ ሻኩን ኣበርክቶ ገይሩ?
translated_mc_answer2: ዝተፈረሰ ህንጻታት ቤት ትምህርቲ ስእሊ ወሲዱን ፖስት ገይሩን ።

passage: In 1816, Byron, Percy Bysshe Shelley and his wife Mary Shelley visited Geneva and all three were inspired by the scenery in their writings. During these visits Shelley wrote the poem 'Mont Blanc', Byron wrote 'The Prisoner of Chillon' and the dramatic poem Manfred, and Mary Shelley, who found the scenery overwhelming, conceived the idea for the novel Frankenstein in her villa on the shores of Lake Geneva in the midst of a thunderstorm. When Coleridge travelled to Chamonix, he declaimed, in defiance of Shelley, who had signed himself 'Atheos' in the guestbook of the Hotel de Londres near Montenvers, 'Who would be, who could be an atheist in this valley of wonders'. By the mid‑19th century scientists began to arrive en masse to study the geology and ecology of the region.
question: Which literary figures visited Geneva in 1816 and were inspired by its scenery?
mc_answer2: Byron, Percy Bysshe Shelley, and Mary Shelley
translated_passage: ብ1816 ባይሮን፡ ፐርሲ ባይሽ ሸሊን በዓልቲ ቤቱ ሜሪ ሸሊን ንጀነቫ በጺሖም ሰለስቲኦም በቲ ኣብ ጽሑፋቶም ዝነበረ ትርኢት ተደሪኾም እዮም። ኣብዚ ምብጻሕ ሸሊ እታ ግጥሚ 'ሞንት ብላንክ' ጽሒፋ፡ ባይሮን፡ 'እቲ እሱር ቺሎን'ን እታ ድራማዊት ግጥሚ ማንፍረድን ጽሒፋ፡ እታ ትርኢት ልዕሊ ዓቕማ ዝረኸበት ሜሪ ሸሊ፡ ነቲ ኣብ ገማግም ቀላይ ጀነቫ ዝነበረላ ልብ-ወለድ ኣብ ማእከል ነንቱር ስቶርም ዝነበረ ሓሳብ ንልብ-ወለድ ጠንሲባ። ኮለሪጅ ናብ ቻሞኒክስ ምስ ተጓዕዘ፡ ነቲ ኣብ መጽሓፍ ኣጋይሽ ናይቲ ኣብ ጥቓ ሞንተንቨርስ ዝርከብ ሆቴል ደ ሎንድረስ ንርእሱ ‘ኣቴዮስ’ ዝፈረመ ሸሊ ብምጽራር፡ ‘መን ምኾነ፡ መን ክኸውን ይኽእል፡ ኣብዚ ጐልጐል ተኣምራት ኣምላኽ ዘይብሉ ክኸውን ይኽእል’ ኢሉ ስሒቡ። ኣብ መፋርቕ 19 ክፍለ ዘመን ተመራመርቲ ስነ-ፍልጠት ስነ-ምድሪን ስነ-ህይወትን ናይቲ ዞባ ንምጽናዕ ብጅምላ ክመጹ ጀመሩ።
translated_question: ኣየኖት ስነ-ጽሑፋዊ ኣሃዛት ብ1816 ናብ ጀነቫ በጺሖም በቲ ትርኢታታ ዝተደፋፍኡ?
translated_mc_answer2: ባይሮን፡ ፐርሲ ባይሽ ሸሊን ሜሪ ሸሊን

passage: In 1816, Byron, Percy Bysshe Shelley and his wife Mary Shelley visited Geneva and all three were inspired by the scenery in their writings. During these visits Shelley wrote the poem 'Mont Blanc', Byron wrote 'The Prisoner of Chillon' and the dramatic poem Manfred, and Mary Shelley, who found the scenery overwhelming, conceived the idea for the novel Frankenstein in her villa on the shores of Lake Geneva in the midst of a thunderstorm. When Coleridge travelled to Chamonix, he declaimed, in defiance of Shelley, who had signed himself 'Atheos' in the guestbook of the Hotel de Londres near Montenvers, 'Who would be, who could be an atheist in this valley of wonders'. By the mid‑19th century scientists began to arrive en masse to study the geology and ecology of the region.
question: Which work did Byron write during his visit to Geneva?
translated_passage: ብ1816 ባይሮን፡ ፐርሲ ባይሽ ሸሊን በዓልቲ ቤቱ ሜሪ ሸሊን ንጀነቫ በጺሖም ሰለስቲኦም በቲ ኣብ ጽሑፋቶም ዝነበረ ትርኢት ተደሪኾም እዮም። ኣብዚ ምብጻሕ ሸሊ እታ ግጥሚ 'ሞንት ብላንክ' ጽሒፋ፡ ባይሮን፡ 'እቲ እሱር ቺሎን'ን እታ ድራማዊት ግጥሚ ማንፍረድን ጽሒፋ፡ እታ ትርኢት ልዕሊ ዓቕማ ዝረኸበት ሜሪ ሸሊ፡ ነቲ ኣብ ገማግም ቀላይ ጀነቫ ዝነበረላ ልብ-ወለድ ኣብ ማእከል ነንቱር ስቶርም ዝነበረ ሓሳብ ንልብ-ወለድ ጠንሲባ። ኮለሪጅ ናብ ቻሞኒክስ ምስ ተጓዕዘ፡ ነቲ ኣብ መጽሓፍ ኣጋይሽ ናይቲ ኣብ ጥቓ ሞንተንቨርስ ዝርከብ ሆቴል ደ ሎንድረስ ንርእሱ ‘ኣቴዮስ’ ዝፈረመ ሸሊ ብምጽራር፡ ‘መን ምኾነ፡ መን ክኸውን ይኽእል፡ ኣብዚ ጐልጐል ተኣምራት ኣምላኽ ዘይብሉ ክኸውን ይኽእል’ ኢሉ ስሒቡ። ኣብ መፋርቕ 19 ክፍለ ዘመን ተመራመርቲ ስነ-ፍልጠት ስነ-ምድሪን ስነ-ህይወትን ናይቲ ዞባ ንምጽናዕ ብጅምላ ክመጹ ጀመሩ።
translated_question: ባይሮን ኣብ ጀነቫ ኣብ ዝገበሮ ዑደት ኣየናይ ስራሕ እዩ ጸሓፈ?

passage: Schwarzenegger's endorsement in the Republican primary of the 2008 U.S. presidential election was highly sought; despite being good friends with candidates Rudy Giuliani and Senator John McCain, Schwarzenegger remained neutral throughout 2007 and early 2008. Giuliani dropped out of the presidential race on January 30, 2008, largely because of a poor showing in Florida, and endorsed McCain. Later that night, Schwarzenegger was in the audience at a Republican debate at the Ronald Reagan Presidential Library in California. The following day, he endorsed McCain, joking, 'It's Rudy's fault!' (in reference to his friendships with both candidates and that he could not make up his mind). Schwarzenegger's endorsement was thought to be a boost for Senator McCain's campaign; both spoke about their concerns for the environment and economy.
question: Which primary did Schwarzenegger’s endorsement influence?
translated_passage: ሽዋርዘነገር ኣብ 2008 ዓ.ም.ፈ ፕረዚደንታዊ ምርጫ ኣሜሪካ ኣብ ዝተኻየደ ሪፓብሊካዊ መባእታዊ መባእታዊ ምርጫ ዝሃቦ ድጋፍ ኣዝዩ ተደላዪ እዩ ነይሩ፤ ሩዲ ጁልያኒን ሰነተር ጆን ማኬንን ጽቡቕ ዕርክነት እኳ እንተሃለዎ፡ ሽዋርዘነገር ኣብ ምሉእ 2007ን መጀመርታ 2008ን ገለልተኛ ኮይኑ ጸኒሑ።ጁልያኒ ካብቲ ኣብ 30 ጥሪ 2008 ዝነበረ ፕረዚደንታዊ ውድድር ኣውዲቑ፡ ብዓቢኡ ኣብ ፍሎሪዳ ብዘጋጠሞ ድኹም ምርኢት ንማኬን ኣውዲቑ። ድሕሪ ቀትሪ ሽዋርዘነገር ኣብ ካሊፎርንያ ኣብ ዝርከብ ፕረዚደንታዊ ቤተ መጻሕፍቲ ሮናልድ ሬጋን ኣብ ዝተኻየደ ሪፓብሊካዊ ክትዕ ኣብ ተዓዘብቲ ነበረ። ንጽባሒቱ ድማ ንማኬን ደጊፉ፡ 'ናይ ሩዲ ጌጋ'ዩ!' (ምስ ክልቲኦም ሕጹያት ዝነበሮ ዕርክነት ብምጥቃስን ኣእምሮኡ ክሕዝ ከም ዘይክእልን ብምጥቃስ)። ሽዋርዘነገር ዝሃቦ ድጋፍ ንወፍሪ ሰነተር ማኬን ድፍኢት ከም ዝነበረ ይግመት ነይሩ፤ ክልቲኦም ብዛዕባ ኣከባብን ቁጠባን ዘለዎም ስክፍታ ተዛሪቦም።
translated_question: ሽዋርዘነገር ኣብ ምድጋፍ ዘሕለፎ ምድጋፍ ኣየናይ እዩ ነይሩ?

passage: Schwarzenegger's endorsement in the Republican primary of the 2008 U.S. presidential election was highly sought; despite being good friends with candidates Rudy Giuliani and Senator John McCain, Schwarzenegger remained neutral throughout 2007 and early 2008. Giuliani dropped out of the presidential race on January 30, 2008, largely because of a poor showing in Florida, and endorsed McCain. Later that night, Schwarzenegger was in the audience at a Republican debate at the Ronald Reagan Presidential Library in California. The following day, he endorsed McCain, joking, 'It's Rudy's fault!' (in reference to his friendships with both candidates and that he could not make up his mind). Schwarzenegger's endorsement was thought to be a boost for Senator McCain's campaign; both spoke about their concerns for the environment and economy.
question: What humorous remark did Schwarzenegger make regarding his endorsement?
mc_answer3: He declared, 'I endorse both candidates equally'

(ምስ ክልቲኦም ሕጹያት ዝነበሮ ዕርክነት ብምጥቃስን ኣእምሮኡ ክሕዝ ከም ዘይክእልን ብምጥቃስ)። ሽዋርዘነገር ዝሃቦ ድጋፍ ንወፍሪ ሰነተር ማኬን ድፍኢት ከም ዝነበረ ይግመት ነይሩ፤ ክልቲኦም ብዛዕባ ኣከባብን ቁጠባን ዘለዎም ስክፍታ ተዛሪቦም።
translated_question: ሽዋርዘነገር ብዛዕባ ምድጋፉ ብዛዕባ እንታይ ዓይነት ዋዛ ዝመልኦ ርእይቶ ኣቕሪቡ?

(ምስ ክልቲኦም ሕጹያት ዝነበሮ ዕርክነት ብምጥቃስን ኣእምሮኡ ክሕዝ ከም ዘይክእልን ብምጥቃስ)። ሽዋርዘነገር ዝሃቦ ድጋፍ ንወፍሪ ሰነተር ማኬን ድፍኢት ከም ዝነበረ ይግመት ነይሩ፤ ክልቲኦም ብዛዕባ ኣከባብን ቁጠባን ዘለዎም ስክፍታ ተዛሪቦም።
translated_question: ሩዲ ጁሊያኒ ኣየናይ ሕጹይ እዩ ድሕሪ ምውዳቑ ደጊፉ?

passage: The most important existing communal shelters were the London Underground stations. Although many civilians had used them as such during the First World War, the government in 1939 refused to allow the stations to be used as shelters so as not to interfere with commuter and troop travel, and the fears that occupants might refuse to leave. Underground officials were ordered to lock station entrances during raids; but by the second week of heavy bombing the government relented and ordered the stations to be opened. Each day orderly lines of people queued until 4 pm, when they were allowed to enter the stations. In mid‑September 1940 about 150,000 a night slept in the Underground, although by the winter and spring months the numbers had declined to 100,000 or less. Noises of battle were muffled and sleep was easier in the deepest stations, but many were killed from direct hits on several stations.
question: What served as the primary communal shelter in London during heavy bombing?
translated_passage: እተን ኣዝየን ኣገደስቲ ዝነበራ ናይ ሓባር መዕቆቢታት፡ ኣብ ለንደን ትሕቲ መሬት ዝርከባ መደበራት እየን ነይረን። ብዙሓት ሲቪላውያን ኣብ ቀዳማይ ኲናት ዓለም ከምኡ ተጠቒሞም እኳ እንተነበሩ፡ መንግስቲ ኣብ 1939 ግን ኣብ መገሻን ሰራዊትን ጉዕዞ ንኸይኣትዉን፡ እቶም ተቐማጦ ምውጻእ ኣብዩ። ኣብ ትሕቲ መሬት ዝነበሩ ሰበስልጣን ኣብ እዋን ወራራት መእተዊ ጣብያ ክዓጽዉ ተኣዚዞም፤ ኣብ ካልኣይ ሰሙን ከቢድ ቦምባታት ግን መንግስቲ ዕረፍቲ ብምሃብ ነተን መደበራት ክኽፈታ ኣዘዛ። ኣብ ነፍሲ ወከፍ መዓልቲ ስርዓት ዘለዎም መስመራት ሰባት ክሳብ ሰዓት 4 ድሕሪ ቀትሪ ሪጋ ይሕዙ ነበሩ፣ ኣብቲ እዋን ናብ ጣብያታት ክኣትዉ ይፍቀደሎም ነበረ። ኣብ መፋርቕ መስከረም 1940 ኣስታት 150,000 ኣብ ሓደ ለይቲ ኣብ ትሕቲ መሬት ደቂሱ ነበረ፣ ዋላ እኳ ኣብ ክረምትን ጽድያን ኣዋርሕ እቲ ቁጽርታት ናብ 100,000 ወይ ትሕቲኡ እንተወረደ። ድምጺ ውግእ ተዓብሊሉ ኣብተን ዝዓሞቐ ጣብያታት ድቃስ ዝቐለለ እኳ እንተነበረ፡ ብዙሓት ግን ኣብ ሓያሎ ጣብያታት ካብ ቀጥታዊ ምህራም ተቐቲሎም።

passage: The most important existing communal shelters were the London Underground stations. Although many civilians had used them as such during the First World War, the government in 1939 refused to allow the stations to be used as shelters so as not to interfere with commuter and troop travel, and the fears that occupants might refuse to leave. Underground officials were ordered to lock station entrances during raids; but by the second week of heavy bombing the government relented and ordered the stations to be opened. Each day orderly lines of people queued until 4 pm, when they were allowed to enter the stations. In mid‑September 1940 about 150,000 a night slept in the Underground, although by the winter and spring months the numbers had declined to 100,000 or less. Noises of battle were muffled and sleep was easier in the deepest stations, but many were killed from direct hits on several stations.

passage: The Navy was modernized in the 1880s, and by the 1890s had adopted the naval power strategy of Captain Alfred Thayer Mahan—as indeed did every major navy. The old sailing ships were replaced by modern steel battleships, bringing them in line with the navies of Britain and Germany. In 1907, most of the Navy's battleships, with several support vessels, dubbed the Great White Fleet, were featured in a 14‑month circumnavigation of the world. Ordered by President Theodore Roosevelt, it was a mission designed to demonstrate the Navy's capability to extend to the global theater.
question: Which strategy did the Navy adopt in the 1890s under Captain Mahan’s influence?

passage: The Navy was modernized in the 1880s, and by the 1890s had adopted the naval power strategy of Captain Alfred Thayer Mahan—as indeed did every major navy. The old sailing ships were replaced by modern steel battleships, bringing them in line with the navies of Britain and Germany. In 1907, most of the Navy's battleships, with several support vessels, dubbed the Great White Fleet, were featured in a 14‑month circumnavigation of the world. Ordered by President Theodore Roosevelt, it was a mission designed to demonstrate the Navy's capability to extend to the global theater.
question: What was the Great White Fleet?
mc_answer2: A fleet of modern steel battleships circumnavigating the world

passage: Muhammad Ali Pasha evolved the military from one that convened under the tradition of the corvée to a great modernised army. He introduced conscription of the male peasantry in 19th century Egypt, and took a novel approach to create his great army, strengthening it with numbers and in skill. Education and training of the new soldiers was not an option; the new concepts were furthermore enforced by isolation. The men were held in barracks to avoid distraction of their growth as a military unit to be reckoned with. The resentment for the military way of life eventually faded from the men and a new ideology took hold, one of nationalism and pride. It was with the help of this newly reborn martial unit that Muhammad Ali imposed his rule over Egypt.
question: What significant reform did Muhammad Ali Pasha introduce in Egypt?
translated_passage: መሓመድ ዓሊ ፓሻ ንወተሃደራት ካብቲ ኣብ ትሕቲ ትውፊት ኮርቨይ ናብ ሓደ ዓቢ ዘመናዊ ሰራዊት ዝተጸውዐ እዩ ኣማዕበሎ። ኣብ መበል 19 ክፍለ ዘመን ግብጺ ናይተን ደቂ ተባዕትዮ ሓረስቶት ምውዳብ ኣተኣታትዩ፣ ዓቢ ሰራዊቱ ንምፍጣር ድማ ልብወለዳዊ ኣገባብ ወሲዱ፣ ብቁጽርን ብውሕልነትን እናኣገልገለ። ትምህርትን ስልጠናን ናይቶም ሓደስቲ ወተሃደራት ኣማራጺ ኣይነበረን፤ እቶም ሓደስቲ ኣምር ካብዚ ሓሊፉ ብተናጸል ዝተተግበረ እዩ። እቶም ሰብኡት ከም ወተሃደራዊ ኣሃዱ ዝግለጸሉ ወተሃደራዊ ኣሃዱ ዕብየቶም ከይትዛንብ ኣብ ድፋዕ ተኣሲሮም ነይሮም። እቲ ንወተሃደራዊ ኣገባብ ህይወት ዝነበረ ቂምታ ኣብ መወዳእታ ካብቶም ሰብኡት ዝሃሰሰ ኮይኑ ሓድሽ ስነ-ሓሳብ ድማ ተኻየደ፣ ሓደ ናይ ሃገራውነትን ትዕቢትን ነበረ። ብሓገዝ እዛ መሓመድ ዓሊ ኣብ ልዕሊ ግብጺ ዝነበረ ምሕደራ ዘንበረት ብሓገዝ እዛ ሓዳስ ዳግማይ ዝተወልደት ወተሃደራዊ ኣሃዱ።

passage: The Alps are a classic example of what happens when a temperate area at lower altitude gives way to higher‑elevation terrain. Elevations around the world that have cold climates similar to those of the polar regions have been called Alpine. A rise from sea level into the upper regions of the atmosphere causes the temperature to decrease (see adiabatic lapse rate). The effect of mountain chains on prevailing winds is to carry warm air belonging to the lower region into an upper zone, where it expands in volume at the cost of a proportionate loss of temperature, often accompanied by precipitation in the form of snow or rain. The height of the Alps is sufficient to divide the weather patterns in Europe into a wet north and a dry south because moisture is sucked from the air as it flows over the high peaks.
question: What happens to temperature as elevation rises?
translated_passage: እቶም ኣልፕስ ኣብ ታሕተዋይ ቁመት ዝርከብ ምዉቕ ከባቢ ንዝለዓለ-ኤለቨሽን መሬት መንገዲ ክህብ ከሎ እንታይ ከም ዘጋጥም ክላሲካል ኣብነት እዮም። ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ምስ ናይ ፖላር ዞባታት ዝመሳሰል ዝሑል ክሊማ ዘለዎ ቁመት ኣልፓይን ተባሂሎም ይጽውዑ ኣለዉ። ካብ ጽፍሒ ባሕሪ ናብ ላዕለዎት ከባቢታት ከባቢ ኣየር ምውሳኽ ሙቐት ክጎድል ይገብር (ናይ ኣድያባቲክ ላፕስ ፍጥነት ርአ)። ጽልዋ ሰንሰለት ኣኽራን ኣብ ዝሰፍሐ ንፋሳት፡ ኣብ ታሕተዋይ ዞባ ዝርከብ ውዑይ ኣየር ናብ ላዕለዋይ ዞባ ምጽዓን ኮይኑ፡ ኣብኡ ድማ ብዓቐን ብዓቐን ብመጠን ብመጠን ብመልክዕ በረድ ወይ ዝናብ ብዝዘንብ ዝዘንብ ሙቐት ይሰፍሕ። ቁመት ኣልፕስ ኣብ ኤውሮጳ ንዘሎ ቅዲ ኩነታት ኣየር ኣብ ርጥብ ዝበለ ሰሜንን ደረቕ ደቡብን ንምምቃል እኹል እዩ ምኽንያቱ ርስሓት ኣብ ልዕሊ እቲ ልዑል ጫፋት እናፈሰሰ ካብ ኣየር ስለዝመጠጠ።

passage: The Alps are a classic example of what happens when a temperate area at lower altitude gives way to higher‑elevation terrain. Elevations around the world that have cold climates similar to those of the polar regions have been called Alpine. A rise from sea level into the upper regions of the atmosphere causes the temperature to decrease (see adiabatic lapse rate). The effect of mountain chains on prevailing winds is to carry warm air belonging to the lower region into an upper zone, where it expands in volume at the cost of a proportionate loss of temperature, often accompanied by precipitation in the form of snow or rain. The height of the Alps is sufficient to divide the weather patterns in Europe into a wet north and a dry south because moisture is sucked from the air as it flows over the high peaks.

passage: Google does not provide detailed figures for YouTube's running costs, and YouTube's revenues in 2007 were noted as 'not material' in a regulatory filing. In June 2008, a Forbes magazine article projected the 2008 revenue at $200 million, noting progress in advertising sales. In January 2012, it was estimated that visitors to YouTube spent an average of 15 minutes a day on the site, in contrast to the four or five hours a day spent by a typical U.S. citizen watching television. In 2012, YouTube's revenue from its ads program was estimated at 3.7 billion. In 2013 it nearly doubled and was estimated to hit 5.6 billion dollars according to eMarketer, while others estimated 4.7 billion.
question: What was YouTube’s estimated ad revenue in 2012?
translated_passage: ጉግል ንናይ ዩቱብ ናይ ምጉያይ ወጻኢታት ዝርዝር ኣሃዝ ኣይህብን እዩ፣ ኣብ 2007 ኣብ ዩቱብ ዝረኸቦ ኣታዊታት ድማ ኣብ ምቁጽጻራዊ ፋይል ‘ንዋታዊ ዘይኮነ’ ተባሂሉ ተገሊጹ። ኣብ ሰነ 2008፡ ሓደ ጽሑፍ መጽሔት ፎርብስ፡ ነቲ ኣብ 2008 ዝረኸቦ ኣታዊ 200 ሚልዮን ዶላር ምዃኑ ብምግላጽ፡ ኣብ መሸጣ መወዓውዒታት ዝረአ ዘሎ ምዕባለታት ኣመልኪቱ። ኣብ ጥሪ 2012፡ በጻሕቲ ዩቱብ ኣብ መዓልቲ ብማእከላይ ገምጋም 15 ደቓይቕ ኣብቲ ቦታ ከም ዘሕለፉ ተገሚቱ፡ እዚ ድማ ብኣንጻር እቲ ኣብ መዓልቲ ኣርባዕተ ወይ ሓሙሽተ ሰዓታት ኣብ ሓደ ልሙድ ዜጋ ኣመሪካ ተለቪዥን ዝከታተል ዘሕለፎ እዩ። ኣብ 2012፡ ዩቱብ ካብቲ ናይ መወዓውዒ መደባቱ ዝረኸቦ ኣታዊ 3.7 ቢልዮን ከምዝነበረ ተገሚቱ። ኣብ 2013 ዳርጋ ብዕጽፊ ከምዝወሰኸን 5.6 ቢልዮን ዶላር ከምዝወረደን ብመሰረት ኢማርኬተር ክበጽሕ እንከሎ፡ ካልኦት ድማ 4.7 ቢልዮን ከምዝኾነ ተገሚቱ።

passage: The economy of Himachal Pradesh is currently the third‑fastest growing economy in India. passage: In the 16th century, Count Hieronymus Schlick of Bohemia began minting coins known as Joachimstalers (from German thal, meaning 'valley'), named for Joachimstal, the valley where the silver was mined. Joachimstaler was later shortened to the German Taler, a word that eventually found its way into many European languages as daler or tallér, and into English as the dollar. Alternatively, thaler is said to come from the German coin Guldengroschen ('great guilder').
question: What were the coins originally called that later evolved into the term 'dollar'?
translated_passage: ኣብ መበል 16 ክፍለ ዘመን ቆጸራ ሂሮኒሙስ ሽሊክ ካብ ቦሄምያ ዮኣኪምስታለርስ (ካብ ጀርመናዊ ታል ማለት ‘ቫሊ’) ተባሂሉ ዝፍለጥ ሳንቲም ምቕራብ ጀመረ፣ እዚ ድማ ብሩር ዝዕደነሉ ጎልጎል ተሰይሙ። ዮኣቺምስታለር ድሒሩ ናብቲ ጀርመናዊ ታለር ተሓጺሩ፣ ኣብ መወዳእታ ናብ ብዙሓት ቋንቋታት ኤውሮጳ ከም ዳለር ወይ ታሌር መንገዳ ዝረኸበት ቃል፣ ከም ዶላር ድማ ናብ እንግሊዝኛ ትኣቱ ነበረት። ከም ኣማራጺ ድማ ታለር ካብ ጀርመናዊት ሳንቲም ጉልደንግሮሸን ከም እትመጽእ ይንገር (‘ዓቢ ጓይላ’)።

translated_passage: ኣብ መበል 16 ክፍለ ዘመን ቆጸራ ሂሮኒሙስ ሽሊክ ካብ ቦሄምያ ዮኣኪምስታለርስ (ካብ ጀርመናዊ ታል ማለት ‘ቫሊ’) ተባሂሉ ዝፍለጥ ሳንቲም ምቕራብ ጀመረ፣ እዚ ድማ ብሩር ዝዕደነሉ ጎልጎል ተሰይሙ። ዮኣቺምስታለር ድሒሩ ናብቲ ጀርመናዊ ታለር ተሓጺሩ፣ ኣብ መወዳእታ ናብ ብዙሓት ቋንቋታት ኤውሮጳ ከም ዳለር ወይ ታሌር መንገዳ ዝረኸበት ቃል፣ ከም ዶላር ድማ ናብ እንግሊዝኛ ትኣቱ ነበረት። ከም ኣማራጺ ድማ ታለር ካብ ጀርመናዊት ሳንቲም ጉልደንግሮሸን ከም እትመጽእ ይንገር (‘ዓቢ ጓይላ’)።
translated_question: ኣብ መወዳእታ ‘ታለር’ ኣብ ኣየናይ ዘመናዊ ናይ ባጤራ ቃል ከም ዝማዕበለ?

passage: In the 16th century, Count Hieronymus Schlick of Bohemia began minting coins known as Joachimstalers (from German thal, meaning 'valley'), named for Joachimstal, the valley where the silver was mined. Joachimstaler was later shortened to the German Taler, a word that eventually found its way into many European languages as daler or tallér, and into English as the dollar. Alternatively, thaler is said to come from the German coin Guldengroschen ('great guilder').
question: The word 'thaler' is also connected to which alternative coin name?
